22b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo / /de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang
22b8('dul ba): bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang
23a1('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
23a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
23a3('dul ba): bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de bzhin du nyi ma gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du
23a4('dul ba): 'das so/ /yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas de rnams kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas de dag gis gtses par gyur nas dge slong rnams
23a5('dul ba): la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bdag cag gi nye du dag skrur mchis te de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin du stsol bas khyed cag dang de rnams la khyad par rngo mi thog na/ kye
23a6('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyis zhal ta kho na mdzod cig / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das
23a7('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas
23a8('dul ba): de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug pa 'tshed pa'i zhal ta byas pa las lhas char phab pas de ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
23b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng g.yogs med par btso bar mi bya'o/ /sgo khang dang khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang khyams su btso bar mi bya'o/ /
23b2('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas kyi gzhir mi rung ba ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ steng g.yogs med pa dang / sgo khang dang / khyams dang / bsro khang dang / khrus
23b3('dul ba): khang dang / rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gi gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo / /gzhi bcu po 'di dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas
23b4('dul ba): kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o/ /zhal ta byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // sdom ni/ nad bu can dang zas dag dang / /g.yar tshus lhag pa dag dang yang / /
23b5('dul ba): tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang / /pad ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /mnyan yod na dge slong nad bu can zhig yod pa des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo la
23b6('dul ba): sman ston cig / des nad kyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/ 'phags pa thug pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /sman
23b7('dul ba): pas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/ /des skabs de dge slong rnams la'o/ /dge slong
23b8('dul ba): rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas thug pa 'thung shig ces zer na sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste de la
24a1('dul ba): 'gyod pa mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no/ /de nas sman pas 'ongs nas
24a2('dul ba): dris pa 'phags pa khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs mi bde'o/ /ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so/ /ci 'dra ba zhig /grang mo'o/ /'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/ /
24a3('dul ba): sang ni dron mo gsol cig /de nas nad g.yog gis blangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed nas des de la bsros te byin no/ /de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang des smras pa/ mi bde'o/ /ci thug pa ma gsol tam/
24a4('dul ba): 'thungs so/ /ci 'dra ba zhig /grang mo zhig bsros nas so/ /'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/ /de grangs te bsros pa lags kyis sang ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod la gsol cig /de nas de'i nad
24a5('dul ba): g .yog gis 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa las de nas khwa'i rtug pas de ma rung bar byas pas dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
24a6('dul ba): la'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas
24a7('dul ba): bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dra ba dang ji tsam pa ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba'i gnas lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtod pa'i mtha'
24a8('dul ba): can dang / ba nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o/ /de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas gnas rtsom pa na der thog mar gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas
24b1('dul ba): su 'gyur ro zhes sems bskyed cing tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o/ /sems gtod pa'i mtha' can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas der thog mar gzhi rdo
24b2('dul ba): ba 'drin pa na nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur bar nges par zung shig nges par zung shig ces bya ste/ 'di ni sems gtod pa'i
24b3('dul ba): mtha' can zhes bya'o/ /ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad par gses pa ste/ 'di ni ba nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o/ /gnas stong pa gang zhe na/ spangs pa'i gnas te 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o/ /
24b4('dul ba): bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bskos pa'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas
24b5('dul ba): pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o/ /bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge
24b6('dul ba): slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas
24b7('dul ba): thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
24b8('dul ba): mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/
25a1('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/
25a2('dul ba): de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad
25a3('dul ba): lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod
25a4('dul ba): cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de
25a5('dul ba): bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos pa der gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang / mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can
25a6('dul ba): gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /yangs pa can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas de yang za bar byed do/ /
25a7('dul ba): gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi za bas khyer te 'ongs nas yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do/ /dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang mu stegs can rnams smod par byed/
25a8('dul ba): gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag sde dpon seng ge'i ched du byas te sha khyer te 'ongs na ni des de dag ma zos la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi ched
25b1('dul ba): du byas pa'i sha ni zos so zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs
25b2('dul ba): pa gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ched du byas par mngon du mthong ba rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no zhes thos pa dang / rang nyid kyi blo la rnam par
25b3('dul ba): rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam du rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /dge slong dag ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa
25b4('dul ba): gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyod kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar
25b5('dul ba): bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa skyes pa tshul las 'di ni bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /
25b6('dul ba): mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas de rnams glos phab ste 'dug pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa la ci'i slad du
25b7('dul ba): glos phab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bsod snyoms lto 'grangs par mi rnyed pas kho bo cag ltogs te nyam chung bas des
25b8('dul ba): na glos phab ste 'dug go/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ste zhal tshus mi gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod
26a1('dul ba): do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta
26a2('dul ba): bur dge slong rnams kyis g.yar tshus bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras
26a3('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza'
26a4('dul ba): bar 'dod na 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di
26a5('dul ba): lta bur 'dod na sngar blangs zin to snyam du soms la sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa
26a6('dul ba): can rnams kyis dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la 'gron du bos nas de rnams kyis zos pa dang bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed
26a7('dul ba): kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyis snoms te bzhud la phyis gsol cig / de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo / /dong nas de yang za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
26a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin no snyam du bsams
26b1('dul ba): nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas la 'gron du bos te de rnams kyis zos nas bca' ba la sogs pa cung
26b2('dul ba): zad cig lhag ste/ dge slong rnams dong ba dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang ba lags te/ 'tshal te mchis la khyod kho na la dbul lo zhes de
26b3('dul ba): rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su
26b4('dul ba): gnang ste/ mu ge'i dgon pa sdug bsngal 'di lta bur sngar yongs su btang ba'o snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis
26b5('dul ba): nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di dag ni rnyed dka' ba yin pas 'phags pa rnams la 'bul lo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spang ba byas pa
26b6('dul ba): rnams la de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du
26b7('dul ba): ma byung ba de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas khyed rnams kyang da ni yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag gi dge ba'i
26b8('dul ba): shul rgyags dang bral te 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar bgyi 'am/ de lta bas na thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
27a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de la tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin te/ rgun 'brum dang / bal po
27a2('dul ba): se'u dang / 'bra go dang / sta rga dang / yon tshe dang / shing tog u ra ma na dang / shing tog u ru ma yi ka dang / shing tog ni ko tsa dang / shing tog ba b+hu dang / shing tog sin tsi ka'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /bram ze dang khyim
27a3('dul ba): bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / chu nas skyes pa dag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas zin to zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
27a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de la chu nas skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ud pa la'i
27a5('dul ba): rtsa ba dang / pad ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku mu da'i sa bon dang / pad ma'i sa bon no/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to/ /de'i rim gro
27a6('dul ba): byed pa tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi blos ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyis/ ma la bdag gis dri'o snyam nas des
27a7('dul ba): sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na de'i sman ston cig /des smras pa 'phags pa pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang
27a8('dul ba): ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pad ma'i rtsa ba phal pa'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas ji ltar sems mnyam par
27b1('dul ba): bzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang /
27b2('dul ba): de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir byon/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs nas de la sman pas pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to/ /
27b3('dul ba): klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltar na re shig gzhes shig /de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad ma'i rtsa ba dag bton cing pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad ma'i 'dab ma'i
27b4('dul ba): skyo rar gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos pad ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa la lta bar brtsams pa dang de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/
27b5('dul ba): 'phags pa ci gzigs pad ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas
27b6('dul ba): lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sman
27b7('dul ba): pas bstan pa bzhin pad ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to/ /klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad ma'i rtsa ba khur cig bkur nas mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal
27b8('dul ba): byed kyi tshal du song la gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi mdun du zhog la shog shig / de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i mthus mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad
28a1('dul ba): ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi bal glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na bal glang mo de las bal glang phrug gu
28a2('dul ba): gcig 'brangs te 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra 'byin to/ /de nas bal glang mo de skrag pas gcin rtug shor nas bal glang phrug gu bor te bros so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi ched du
28a3('dul ba): tshal du song ba las bal glang phrug gu de mthong nas khyim du blangs te bsnun gsos bskyed de/ nor gyis bskyangs pas ming nor skyong nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so/ /kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po
28a4('dul ba): la nor skyong skyes su bskur ba la/ de mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa'i skye bos nor gyis bskyangs pas na nor skyong zhes 'don to/ /pad ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos zos/ kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA
28a5('dul ba): ri'i bus/ kha cig ni dge 'dun la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang bar byas nas kyang za bar 'dod na bdag cag gis spang bar byas so zhes ma zos pa'i skabs de dge
28a6('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' bas de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo / /pad ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par
28a7('dul ba): dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces
28a8('dul ba): bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran mo'o/ /khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar ji ltar shes she na/ gal te bang mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas na mthong ma thag kho nar dgang
28b1('dul ba): bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so/ /lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa ni brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i rked pa las lnga
28b2('dul ba): brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi tshe brgya 'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi bu ni de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du dri sbyar na brgya stong
28b3('dul ba): khyed par 'gyur te/ lug gi mna' ma ni de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi bran pho ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang gi tshe zhing la rol gcig rmos pa de'i tshe zhing la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/ lug gi bran pho ni de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi bran mo ni ji ltar bsod nams che bar
28b4('dul ba): shes she na/ de gang gi tshe 'bras gtun gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
28b5('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed
28b6('dul ba): du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig ces sgo shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das
28b7('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni chos gos rnams long shig /tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
28b8('dul ba): dge slong de rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba/ 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa
29a1('dul ba): de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'khob tu dong ba las de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa de rnams kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rod rod por gyur nas bdag
29a2('dul ba): cag sngon ni dge sbyong gau ta mas yul dbus nas spyugs so/ /de gal te 'dir 'ongs na gdon mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas kyang spyugs par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo/ /de rnams rigs kyi khyim
29a3('dul ba): dag tu dong nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig /chos thob par gyur cig /'phags pa dag de ci lags shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o/ /ci'i slad du re shig khyed cag gi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis
29a4('dul ba): ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa dag bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing du ma zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med
29a5('dul ba): par byed cing 'ong ngo / /'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus kho nar gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig ma bzhud cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug
29a6('dul ba): khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btub bo/ /'phags pa dag gsungs shig mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas
29a7('dul ba): phyung la grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du tshud cig rtswa sngon po rnams rngos shig / 'dug gnas rnams ni shig cig /me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni chod cig /chu rnams ni dug lhugs shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/
29a8('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang thams cad bgyi'o/ /de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/ rtswa sngon po rnams
29b1('dul ba): ni brngas/ 'dug gnas rnams ni bshig /me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ni bcad/ chu rnams ni dug blugs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma
29b2('dul ba): yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bla na med pa'i ye
29b3('dul ba): shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong rgyu zhing gshegs par bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad
29b4('dul ba): par bya'o snyam nas des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ song la chu dug can rnams skoms shig /char 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang / khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas
29b5('dul ba): khong shig / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la yang bsko ba/ khyed kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob shig /de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni chu dug can rnams bskams so/ /char 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus
29b6('dul ba): ni der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas ljongs rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis
29b7('dul ba): grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsogs nas de rnams kyis rtog chen dag mngags te ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig / de rnams dong ba las ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas slar
29b8('dul ba): 'ongs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ljongs rnams 'di lta bur 'byor cing rgyas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo / /mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis mthong ngam/ re shig gang
30a1('dul ba): zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyur bar byed pa des/ khyed cag sgyur bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/ khyed cag rnam pa thams cad du bltas zin te/ blta ba'i tha ma byas nas 'gro'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
30a2('dul ba): dag bzhugs shig / khyed cag la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/ mu stegs can
30a3('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kar Sha pA Na drug bcus gcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go/ /de rnams kyis kyang
30a4('dul ba): khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo
30a5('dul ba): grong khyer bzang byed du bag mar btang ba de ra ba'i kha na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das mun khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab
30a6('dul ba): tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na bdag mar me thogs la 'babs pa zhig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas them skas zhig sprul to/ /de nas de snying dga' ba dang
30a7('dul ba): mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las babs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te chos mnyan
30a8('dul ba): pa'i phyir 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do zhes bya
30b1('dul ba): ba nas/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang de la nga na re nad med
30b2('dul ba): par gyur cig ces smros la 'di skad ces kyang smros shig / khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho nar nga 'dir 'ongs na khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pas glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de ci ga rigs sam/ gal te tshogs kyis khrims
30b3('dul ba): su bca' ba byas so zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya 'am stong 'ged par btang na yang gang ba nyid du 'dug cing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na khyod kar Sha pA Na drug bcu byin
30b4('dul ba): nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes smros shig / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas khyim bdag
30b5('dul ba): lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis
30b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir gshegs na khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba ci ga rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma
30b7('dul ba): la blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pas gcad do zhes dam bcas so/ /khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya
30b8('dul ba): pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya 'am stong 'ged par btang na yang gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu byin nas khyod 'ong bar mi nus sam zhes gsung ngo / /des bsams pa/
31a1('dul ba): 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o snyam nas/ des kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
31a2('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
31a3('dul ba): dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
31a4('dul ba): byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang ci ga 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur
31a5('dul ba): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod las brten nas phal cher kun gyis 'thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
31a6('dul ba): byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kAr ShA pa Na'i phung po bcer te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/ /mtshungs pa med pa
31a7('dul ba): gser gyi mdog can lta 'dod pa/ /de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byos la/ /myur du dengs shig de yi nor ni kho bos gzhal/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur
31a8('dul ba): ram/ des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta bas na tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa tshogs kho nas bshig tu zad mod/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod de rnams kyis khrims su
31b1('dul ba): bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so/ /de nas phan tshun sdos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas ra ba dral nas srog chags brgya stong phrag
31b2('dul ba): du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo / /de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar 'dug go/ /
31b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas sems can du ma dag gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/
31b4('dul ba): de thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// //
31b5('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring po zhig tu chos bshad pas gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
31b6('dul ba): 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to/ /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags/ bcom ldan
31b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dang / bu ram dang / hwags dang / sha khar dang / btung ba dag go/ /de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur
31b8('dul ba): du sta gon gyis shig / de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i
32a1('dul ba): btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang skal ba ji
32a2('dul ba): lta ba bzhin du btul te gshegs pa na khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul gyi snyun rgyags kyi zong kar Sha pA Na dag bzhes shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan
32a3('dul ba): 'das kyis kar Sha pA Na blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba byed pas so/ /rung ba byed pa med nas bcom ldan
32a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul
32a5('dul ba): len par gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye ba 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs te gsungs kyis
32a6('dul ba): mi blang ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o/ /khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
32a7('dul ba): blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'am dge tshul med na/ dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas
32a8('dul ba): rang nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag
32b1('dul ba): la lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis
32b2('dul ba): brlab bo zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab
32b3('dul ba): par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye ba 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang smyung ba byas pa dang / nad pa dang / dge skos dang / lag gi blas so/ /dge slong
32b4('dul ba): ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las lam gyis ngal nas bza' bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
32b5('dul ba): dge slong dag zas de zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus pas 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs nas bza' bar bya'o/ /phye rnams kyi gang yin pa de ni chus bkrus nas bza'
32b6('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /kha cig zhu bar gyur pa de bkrur ma rung ste zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smyug ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o/ /'on kyang zas med par bya ma nus nas/
32b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par bsal te/ chu'i nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas de tshags kyis btsags la btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas
32b8('dul ba): the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag lug dang / lug gi mchis 'brang dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran
33a1('dul ba): mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na de drug bsod nams chen por gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyi ma mnyes par ni ma
33a2('dul ba): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge
33a3('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas thur mas 'tsho ba'i
33a4('dul ba): mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /mu ge rnam pa gsum ni za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / thur mas 'tsho ba'o/ /de la za ma tog ces bya ba ni za ma tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag
33a5('dul ba): blugs te ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzhag nas bdag cag shi nas 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste/ 'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za ma tog ces bya'o/ /rus gong dkar
33a6('dul ba): po gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams kyi rus pa dag bsdus nas re shig btsos te/ ji tsam na rus pa de dkar por gyur pa dang / de nas de'i khu ba 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni rus gong dkar po dang 'brel bas rus gong dkar po zhes
33a7('dul ba): bya'o/ /thur mas 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul gyi ser ga nas 'bru'i 'brum bu dag thur mas brus nas chu mang po'i snod du btsos nas 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs
33a8('dul ba): pas byin gyis bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer pa dag nyon cig /ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung bstan
33b1('dul ba): gyis/ khyed las gang dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni 'khod cig /gang dag la med pa de dag ni gar dga' bar deng la mu ge med cing lo legs par gyur nas slar gshegs shig /de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing
33b2('dul ba): nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/ des mngan bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ dpon po mchis so/ /
33b3('dul ba): de de nyid na gnas pa las mu ge de brgyud ma kho nar byung bas de'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su zad pas 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar gyur te bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so/ /de nas khyim bdag des bang mdzod rnams phyags
33b4('dul ba): pa las/ 'bras bre'u chung gang zhig byung nas/ de'i chung mas snod du blugs te btsos so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du
33b5('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang bA rA Na sIr phyin nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms
33b6('dul ba): la zhugs pa na khyim bdag des kyang bza' ba bsdogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de yang rim bzhin du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas de'i khyim du phyin to/ /khyim bdag des de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong ngo / /
33b7('dul ba): mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ 'di bdag gis zos kyang gdon mi za bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gi skal ba rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no snyam nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo kho bo'i skal
33b8('dul ba): ba ni rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim thab mi za na bdag gis ci ste bza' snyam nas des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi skal ba yang 'di la dbul lo/ /de bzhin du bu dang / mna'
34a1('dul ba): ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mos kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi skal ba yongs su btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis
34a2('dul ba): ni ma yin pas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /
34a3('dul ba): so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas shing rtsa ba nas bcad de 'gyel ba bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam ci 'dod pa gdab par rtsom ste/ khyim bdag gis smon lam btab
34a4('dul ba): pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te bang ba dang mdzod stong pa dag la bltas na mthong ba de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig /'di lta bu'i chos rnams
34a5('dul ba): kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig / chung mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba
34a6('dul ba): b yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te gcig cig gi don du snod du btsos pa de brgya 'am stong gis zos kyang ji srid bdag gis sbyor ba ma btang ba'i bar du yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing 'di
34a7('dul ba): lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig / bus smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa
34a8('dul ba): 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gi rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa gal te brgya 'am stong 'god par btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig /
34b1('dul ba): mna' mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas
34b2('dul ba): dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na des brgya 'am stong byugs kyang ji srid sbyor ba ma btang gi bar du zad par mi 'gyur zhing /
34b3('dul ba): 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig /bran phos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon
34b4('dul ba): gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te zhing rol gcig rmos na rol bdun rmos par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par
34b5('dul ba): du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig / bran mos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
34b6('dul ba): gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te snod gang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa
34b7('dul ba): rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig / de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis
34b8('dul ba): chas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po tshangs byin steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste 'dug pa las/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi steng du babs nas/ des gyen du blta bar brtsams
35a1('dul ba): pa las rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas de 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gshol chen pos yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod
35a2('dul ba): rnams la bltas pa dang / ji tsam na gang bar mthong ngo / /des chung ma la smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i smon lam ni rdzogs par gyur gyis da khyed cag gi blta'o/ /de nas bran mos 'bras snod gang tsam drus na bdun
35a3('dul ba): tsam du 'phel bar gyur to/ /chung mas gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug /nye 'khor gyi srog chags stong phrag du mas zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/ /de nas khyim
35a4('dul ba): bdag des bA rA Na sIr dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer ba de shog shig /bA rA Na sIr sgra gsal ba dang sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas des smras pa/ shes ldan
35a5('dul ba): dag sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bya bas mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye ba lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams
35a6('dul ba): cad shi zin pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag de khug shig /de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad
35a7('dul ba): shi zin pa de'i tshe khyod kyis mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ lha su'i mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye/ 'on kyang de ring kho nar sa bon stsal ba'i 'bras bu de nyid du grub lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig /des
35a8('dul ba): skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyoms phul lam/ lha bdag gis phul lo/ /de yang lhag par dad par gyur nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/
35b1('dul ba): kye ma'o yon tan las byung ba'i/ /skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing / /de la sa bon btab pa yi/ /'bras bu de nyid thob par gyur/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma dang /
35b2('dul ba): khyim bdag gi bu dang / khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang / khyim bdag gi bran pho dang / khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag lug dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug
35b3('dul ba): gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no/ /'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas drug char yang bsod nams chen por gyur
35b4('dul ba): cing nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing / rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong bas ches khyad par 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ni ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag
35b5('dul ba): pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin pas zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /
35b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// // sdom ni/ ke na'i bu yis btung ba blangs/ /ka shi'i tshong rdal nas thug dang / /sdig can du ni bca' ba dang / /'gyod dang sbyar ba'i zas dag go/ /bcom
35b7('dul ba): ldan 'das yul a du ma'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu gnas ni yul a du ma na 'dug go/ /nyin par ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
35b8('dul ba): pa/ ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams la chos bshad na der ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong ke na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas rdzing bu
36a1('dul ba): dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na der thul bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
36a2('dul ba): 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa bltas na/
36a3('dul ba): bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
36a4('dul ba): chen po lnga rtsen la bsgo ba lnga rtsen song la rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi 'gram du bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shoms te/ 'dus pa chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mdangs 'phrogs par mi 'gyur bar drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ma
36a5('dul ba): gcig kyang skos shig / des rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srungs ma bzhag nas gnas shom par rtsom pa na de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke na'i bu ca
36a6('dul ba): co'i sgras langs nas srungs ma de la dris pa/ ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig des smras pa/ gdan shom par byed pa'i 'o/ /ci kho bo'i phyir ram/ khyod kyi phyir ni ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir
36a7('dul ba): yin no/ khyod 'di na ci zhig la sdod/ khyod kho na srung ngo / /ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'du bar 'gyur bas so/ /des smras pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma de su zhig gis srung bar byed par 'gyur des smras pa/ bcom ldan
36a8('dul ba): 'das de la su zhig srung / bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i srung ma mdzad do zhes byas pa dang drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs
36b1('dul ba): mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas a du mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ a du mar bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas ji ltar thugs
36b2('dul ba): mnyam par bzhag na dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu a du ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du byon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
36b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za stong phrag
36b4('dul ba): du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i nor bus thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
36b5('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas shar phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ /rgyal bo chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum
36b6('dul ba): brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i mu tig gis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
36b7('dul ba): 'das la lha'i mu tig gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas lho phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ /
36b8('dul ba): rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma
37a1('dul ba): dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang /
37a2('dul ba): man dA ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas nub phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ /rgyal po
37a3('dul ba): chen po rnam thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i dbyig dang / gser gyis thu
37a4('dul ba): ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbyig dang / gser gyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi
37a5('dul ba): dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas byang phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ /de la dbus pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/ yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po'o/ /mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ni gnyis te/ mig mi bzang dang /
37a6('dul ba): rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes la/ gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis
37a7('dul ba): bshad na gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes pas ma la ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do/ /gnyis la ni mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do snyam du dgongs nas rgyal po
37a8('dul ba): chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang / tshor ba bsil bar gyur pa dang / 'du shes 'gags pa dang / 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid sdug
37b1('dul ba): bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
37b2('dul ba): skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de la khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam
37b3('dul ba): par shes pa tsam du gyis shig / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
37b4('dul ba): bral ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po e ne me ne/ dab be/ da Dab phe 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
37b5('dul ba): 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i klu brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
37b6('dul ba): rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po mA ShA/ tu ShA/ sang shA mA/ sarba tra bi rA DI 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang
37b7('dul ba): de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ da ni bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
37b8('dul ba): dus la khad kyis nye na su la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ gal te lha rnams la ni lha rnams bag med pa la dga' ba mang bas yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /'on te mi rnams la ni tshe thung ba yin pas
38a1('dul ba): de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyi/ ma la ngas lha dang / mi rnams dang / dge slong 'od srung la gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du dgongs nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/
38a2('dul ba): rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang lho phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig /
38a3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang byang phyogs nas bsrung
38a4('dul ba): bar byos shig / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
38a5('dul ba): gis bsrung bar bgyi lags so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od
38a6('dul ba): srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams gtad nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang bstan pa'i don gyi bya ba la brtson par gyis shig /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes
38a7('dul ba): nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po chen po bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan
38a8('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes
38b1('dul ba): bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
38b2('dul ba): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe rgya mtsho chan po na klu gnyis shig gnas te dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin no/ /shing shal
38b3('dul ba): ma brtsegs pa na yang nam mkha' lding gnyis yod pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / gtsug gi dbang phyug go/ /gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe de gnyis sa'i 'og
38b4('dul ba): tu 'gro bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang /
38b5('dul ba): de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa bya bar brtsams pa las/ ri rab la rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bo cag gis khyed
38b6('dul ba): cag gnod pa byas na sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ da gang gis na kho bo cag khyed dang phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang chu bzhin du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gyis
38b7('dul ba): smras pa/ bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag gis kyang
38b8('dul ba): blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas de dag phyin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas 'jig rten
39a1('dul ba): skyong ba bzhi po dag gis chos thos nas dong ba de dag de gnyis kyis mthong nas/ nam mkha' lding de gnyis kyis klu dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/ 'gro ba pha bi dag su
39a2('dul ba): dag yin/ de gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar bdag cag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi
39a3('dul ba): rnams blangs la smon lam gdab bo zhes de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni sngar
39a4('dul ba): blangs so/ /de nas lhan cig 'dus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
39a5('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su mchis pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
39a6('dul ba): r gyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar
39a7('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang de bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bdag cag la chos bshad de bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su
39a8('dul ba): mchi bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ klu dang nam mkha' lding bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbugs 'byin
39b1('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no/ /dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no/ /'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni mig mi bzang yin no/ /gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam thos kyi bu yin te/ de'i
39b2('dul ba): t she de'i dus na 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir
39b3('dul ba): gyur cing nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /chos bshad pa de drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de nas
39b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i
39b5('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ btung ba brgyad po tso tsa'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rgya shug gi
39b6('dul ba): btung ba dang / a shwad tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang / rtsub 'gyur gyi btung ba dang / 'bra go'i btung ba dang / rgun gyi btung ba khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan
39b7('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/
39b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas btung ba brgyad po dag bzhes so/ /bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len
40a1('dul ba): byas/ dus su mnyes/ dus su btsags/ dus su byin gyis brlabs na dus su longs spyad par bya zhing dus ma yin par yang longs spyad par bya la/ nam gyi thun dang po thal nas ni longs spyad
40a2('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ /btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas la dus ma yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /btung ba brgyad po 'di dag
40a3('dul ba): dus su byin len byas/ dus su mnyes la/ dus ma yin par btsags dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus ma yin par
40a4('dul ba): mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags pa ni zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam gyi cha stod 'das na yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /de nas drang srong ke na'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
40a5('dul ba): gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod sbyor zhing
40a6('dul ba): mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te
40a7('dul ba): song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar mdzad de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu a du mar gshegs so/ /de nas drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par
40a8('dul ba): langs nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhes shig /bzhin bzangs dag longs shig /shing dag gshegs shig /me bus shig /zhal zas dag brim par gyis shig /bkad sa dag byi dor
40b1('dul ba): gyis shig / de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu'i sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba gnas de nyid du nub mo gnas btab pa las/ drang srong ri bos drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la
40b2('dul ba): smra ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang drang srong ke na'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong ci khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron du bos sam/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying
40b3('dul ba): po 'am/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sam/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ des smras pa/ ri bo kho bo ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron du bos pa yang ma
40b4('dul ba): yin/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/
40b5('dul ba): 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /des sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed nas gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa/
40b6('dul ba): drang srong sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ ri bo dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de
40b7('dul ba): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/ ri bo sangs rgyas shes bya ba ni de yin no/ /ri bos smras pa/ drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin/
40b8('dul ba): drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/ ri bo rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yang yod/
41a1('dul ba): bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u yi rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung
41a2('dul ba): ba de nyid kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /ri bo dge 'dun 'di dang sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di
41a3('dul ba): kho bos gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
41a4('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu
41a5('dul ba): 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/ /drang srong ri bo dang 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
41a6('dul ba): tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu dgu pa/ de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod
41a7('dul ba): pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na ri bo
41a8('dul ba): rab tu byung ba mthong nas des smras pa/ ri bo khyod rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung ngo / /legs par byas so/ /shin tu legs par byas so/ /kho bo yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
41b1('dul ba): gdugs tshod gsol zin nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas drang srong ke na'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas
41b2('dul ba): bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir
41b3('dul ba): 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yon bsngo ba dang chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/ /de nas drang srong ke na'i bus rgyu lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das
41b4('dul ba): gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
41b5('dul ba): btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/ /drang srong ke
41b6('dul ba): na'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong
41b7('dul ba): stong po de dag dang / 'bab chu rab tu bzang po'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phi na la dge slong lnga brgya gtad
41b8('dul ba): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de dag ni
42a1('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /tshe dang ldan
42a2('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
42a3('dul ba): ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni shes rab che ba rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni mthu che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phi nas gdams
42a4('dul ba): ngag phog pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni dgra bcom pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag
42a5('dul ba): lags pa de dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka pi na'i
42a6('dul ba): gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ maud gal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang / shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon
42a7('dul ba): par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te so sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de
42a8('dul ba): gnyis las gcig shi nas de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas drang srong gcig shos de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / des de rnams
42b1('dul ba): mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyi mkhan po de gar song / gum mo/ /des bsams pa/ bdag 'das na bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur
42b2('dul ba): gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o snyam nas des de rnams dbugs phyung ste bsdus so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang nad kyis thebs par gyur nas/ de'i slob ma mchog
42b3('dul ba): gsum yod pa la des gcig la ni lnga brgya/ gnyis pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu/ gsum pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/ /de ni 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de la lnga brgya gtad pa gang
42b4('dul ba): yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs kyi khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/ /
42b5('dul ba): nyis brgya lnga bcu phog pa gcig shos kyis ni ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs
42b6('dul ba): med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ka pi na 'di nyid yin no/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /gcig
42b7('dul ba): shos kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/ /'on kyang dge slong ka phi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnon po yin no/ /
42b8('dul ba): maud gal gyi bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring po yin no/ /shA ri'i bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po brtul po yin no/ /gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag phog par ma gyur na de dag gis dro bar gyur pa
43a1('dul ba): yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /ke na'i bu ni ral pa can/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pa/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad mthun par mnyan par gyis/ /ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni/ /
43a2('dul ba): dus gcig cig na ston pa po/ /dpa' chen nyan thos thabs gcig tu/ /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so/ /ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni/ /zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag /bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te/ /mthong nas ke na'i
43a3('dul ba): bu la dris/ /bag ma len tam 'on te ci/ /rgyal po yul 'khor mgron bos sam/ /khyod kyi mchod sbyin che dus sam/ /dris pa de ni bdag la smros/ /bdag ni bag ma mi len la/ /rgyal po 'am yul 'khor 'gron ma bos/ /
43a4('dul ba): bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so/ /ri bos sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/ /yid skyo ba ni skyes gyur te/ /sangs rgyas de ci ke na'i bu/ /dris pa de ni bdag la smros/ /shAkya'i rigs las skyes
43a5('dul ba): pa yi/ /ston pa gang zag zla med yod/ /de ni chos kun blo ldan pas/ /de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /'dus byas 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos/ /'das pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing / /
43a6('dul ba): da ltar byung ba rnams kyang gzigs/ /mngon shes bya ba ji snyed pa/ /de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /mngon par shes bya mngon shes byas/ /
43a7('dul ba): bsgom par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms/ /spang bar bya ba spangs pas na/ /de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig bltam par gyur pa na/ /rgya mtsho ri bor bcas pa yi/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos mdzad pa/ /de la thal
43a8('dul ba): sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis bdud dang nag po yi/ /rtsa lag bzhon bcas bcom nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa/ /de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /bA rA Na sI'i grong bzhud nas/ /gang gis rnam pa bcu gnyis
43b1('dul ba): pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba/ /de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis 'dod chags bcing bas bcings/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gis gdungs pa'i/ /sems can mang po grol mdzad pa'i/ /de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /
43b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan gang zhig na/ /rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na/ /shA kya'i sras po 'od mdzad la/ /de ring nyid nas skyabs su 'gro/ /tshal sdug yid du 'ong ba de/ /gang na ba ni bram ze'i chos/ /dri za'i rgyal po lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas bla med mthong
43b3('dul ba): bar gyur/ /na bza' ngur smrig 'od ldan de/ /gser mdog nyi ma'i 'od zer can/ /de bzhin gser ni btso ma yi/ /gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin/ /sa la shing gi me tog dang / /kar ni ka ra'i me tog 'dra/ /rin chen sna tshogs spras pa yi/ /
43b4('dul ba): rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no/ /n+ya gro d+ha lta bur ni/ /mchu zheng gab par gyur pa dang / /khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni/ /kun nas snang ba dag tu mdzad/ /rgyal srid rgyas dang nye dur bcas/ /'dod pa kun dga' spangs nas ni/ /rab tu byung bar mngon
43b5('dul ba): byung ba'i/ /thub pa dben pa rnams la dgyes/ /spos ngad ldang ba'i seng ge ni/ /nags su 'jigs pa med pa ltar/ /seng ge lta bur bsnyengs med gsung / /bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhal 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i
43b6('dul ba): gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung / /rnga yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i/ /sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba dag pa nam mkha' la/ /rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /
43b7('dul ba): nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ /nam mkha'i ngos la mdzes lta yi/ /sangs rgyas mun pa bral gyur cing / /mdzes pa bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar khyu ba'i khyu mchog ni/ /nog dang ldan pa mi g.yo gnas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog
43b8('dul ba): stobs bcu ldan/ /sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i/ /chu chen tshad gzung med lta yi/ /sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bla med mthong / /nag po'i phyogs las nges byung ba'i/ /
44a1('dul ba): nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba dang / /me yi phung po 'bar ba lta'i/ /gau tam sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'khor los sgyur rgyal po/ /zhabs 'bring bye bas yongs bskor ltar/ /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
44a2('dul ba): ni/ /dgra bcom rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes/ /'dod pa rnams la dbang sgyur dang / /ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams/ /thub pa dbang ni sgyur bar mdzad/ /gang thos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal
44a3('dul ba): mtsho chan las sgrol ba/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung gang yin dang / /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang / /lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis/ /sbrang rtsi ma bskol ro lta bu'i/ /bden pa dag ni rab tu 'chad/ /nor med rnams la nor
44a4('dul ba): sbyin zhing / /nad pa rnams kyi dpyad kyang mdzad/ /gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas/ /skye dgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad/ /mun par gyur pa'i sems can dang / /blun po lam gol rgyu ba dang / /bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/ /
44a5('dul ba): lam ni drang po rab tu ston/ /'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar zhing / /gti mug rab 'bar skye dgu rnams/ /ji ltar sprin chen char 'bebs ltar/ /thub pa chen pos zhi bar mdzad/ /gzugs dang kha dog stobs ldan pa/ /de dang 'dra ba
44a6('dul ba): yod ma yin/ /sku mkhregs stobs mchog ldan pa ni/ /ri bo bzhin du shin tu gnas/ /rnyed dang ma rnyed bde sdug dang / /smad pa dang ni bstod pa dang / /grags pa dang ni ma grags pas/ /chu yis pad ma bzhin ma gos/ /srog gcod pa ni rnam
44a7('dul ba): spangs te/ /ma byin pa la dga' mi byed/ /bden pa gsung zhing tshangs par spyod/ /de ni phra ma spangs pa yin/ /tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsung zhing / /dus su bab pa 'jam por gsung / /de ni 'dod la brnab sems med/ /skye bo rnams la de
44a8('dul ba): sems byams/ /yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs/ /ting nge 'dzin stobs spyod yul ba/ /bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la gshegs/ /lha dang mi yi sgra dag ni/ /gang yin rnam pa sna tshogs gsan/ /
44b1('dul ba): nyon mongs can nam dge yang rung / /pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen/ /gang dang gang du sngon gnas pa/ /sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang / /sems can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi/ /'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen/ /zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas/ /
44b2('dul ba): nyer zhi shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/ /mtsho ni gang ba bzhin du gnas/ /pad ma'i rdzing na glang po che/ /dam pa drug bcu lon pa ltar/ /mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas/ /bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /
