44b3('dul ba): ri bo bcom ldan 'di 'dra ste/ /de yi sku ni skyes chen gyi/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / /gzi brjid me yi phung po bzhin/ /gang gis lo brgya tshang bar ni/ /skyob pa'i bsngags pa brjod byas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad
44b4('dul ba): med pas/ /des ni mthar phyin mi 'gyur ro/ /bram ze gang gis de mthong ba/ /de yi rnyed pa bla na med/ /gang gis mthong bas skyabs song ba/ /de yi rnyed pa de bas 'phags/ /bram ze ri bos thub chen gyi/ /bsngags pa thos nas skyo bar
44b5('dul ba): gyur/ /dben pa'i sems kyi rtog pa yis/ /ke na'i bu la 'di skad smras/ /mir gyur pa la bdag gis ni/ /de 'dra'i bsngags pa thos ma myong / /ke na 'chad pa dang sbyar na/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /tshong pa nor dag don gnyer
44b6('dul ba): ltar/ /khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs/ /de la bkur sti gus byos dang / /bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze khye'u ni lnga brgya yis/ /slob ma dag gis mdun bdar te/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzang po der/ /bram
44b7('dul ba): ze ri bo song bar gyur/ /lha rnams kyi ni dga' tshal ltar/ /me tog shing ni phun sum tshogs/ /rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing / /bya yi tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa/ /mi min gdug pa mi rgyu ba/ /shA kya'i sras kyis bsten pa
44b8('dul ba): yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas su ni/ /de nas bram zes zhugs par gyur/ /ma dul 'dul ba kha lo sgyur/ /skyes bu dam pa mthong nas ni/ /ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa/ /shes ldan cig snyun mi mnga' 'am/ /
45a1('dul ba): ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs can/ /sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas/ /ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa/ /nga la nad ni yod min te/ /nyes pa med cing sdig pa med/ /the tshom thams cad rnam par
45a2('dul ba): chad/ /rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa/ /nga ni zag med tha ba med/ /'jig rten na ni rdul med rgyu/ /gtsang zhing dag la dri nga med/ /des na bram ze nga gtsang ste/ /khon dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal/ /ri bo khyod kyang 'ongs
45a3('dul ba): pa legs/ /stan 'di la ni legs par 'dug /bram ze ci ga bde 'am khyod/ /lus ni ngal bar ma gyur mod/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas/ /thub pa chen po da ltar bde/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa
45a4('dul ba): ltar/ /yid ni rab tu dga' ba yis/ /de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i gtam/ /rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni/ /de nas bram ze 'dzem pa dang / /dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug par gyur/ /klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin/ /
45a5('dul ba): rig byed gsum gyi rig mthar phyin/ /bram ze ri bo 'dug nas ni/ /thub pa'i mtshan la rtog par byed/ /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po yi/ /sku la mtshan ni sum bcu mthong / /ljags srab 'doms sba sbubs nub pa/ /
45a6('dul ba): gnyis la ri bo the tshom za/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la/ /the tshom yid gnyis gyur nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs/ /bden pa'i mtshan la yongs zhus pa/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum
45a7('dul ba): bcu rtsa gnyis thob pa gang / /gau tam khyod kyis sku dag la/ /gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bab bo/ /mi yi dam pa 'doms kyi ni/ /sba ba sbubs su nub lags sam/ /ljags bzang zhes ni bgyi ba yang / /ci ga thung ba
45a8('dul ba): ma lags grang / /thub chen bdag gis ci nas kyang / /ljags ring glo bar chud 'gyur ba/ /ljags srab myur du brkyang mdzad de/ /bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /rnam par 'dren rnams 'jig rten du/ /brgya
45b1('dul ba): lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung / /u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /thub pa chen po dkon pa lags/ /sos ka skom pa chab dang ni/ /bkres pa la ni g.yar zas dang / /nad pa sman la ji lta bar/ /ston pa la ni bkur stir bgyid/ /
45b2('dul ba): ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs can/ /sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas/ /ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa/ /bram ze the tshom spang bar gyis/ /ljags kyis spyan dang snyan dag ni/ /rab tu khebs par ljags ring gis/ /
45b3('dul ba): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs par mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul bzhi la mkhas pa yis/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas/ /thub pa'i 'doms sba sbubs nub pa/ /bram ze ri bos mthong bar gyur/ /thub pa chen pos mtshan rnams
45b4('dul ba): la/ /the tshom med cing zug rngu phyung / /sems kyi rtog pa rab dga' nas/ /ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa/ /sum bcu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams/ /bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa/ /de kun khyod kyi sku 'di la/ /yongs su
45b5('dul ba): rdzogs te ma tshang med/ /dge dang ldan pas spyod pa bzang / /legs par 'khrungs pas blta na sdug /nyan thos dge 'dun dbus na ni/ /gdugs bdal ba ni lta bur mdzes/ /dam par bsngags pa khyod la ni/ /dge
45b6('dul ba): sbyong dngos pos ci zhig bgyi/ /mi yi khyu mchog khyod lta bu/ /dpung gi yan lag bzhi dag dang / /rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os/ /sa bdag rgyal po mdzad nas ni/ /sa
45b7('dul ba): steng 'khor los sgyur bar mdzod/ /ri bo nga ni rgyal po ste/ /chos kyi rgyal chen bla na med/ /nga ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed/ /nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te/ /nga ni dge ba'i rigs
45b8('dul ba): las 'khrungs/ /bdud dpung bcas par bcom nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob/ /bram ze nga'i dran 'khor lo ste/ /nga yi shes rab blon po yin/ /brtson 'grus shugs mgyogs rta pho ni/ /
46a1('dul ba): btang na dang la 'byung ba yin/ /nga yi nor bu dam pa ni/ /ting 'dzin mun pa gsal byed yin/ /btang snyoms glang chen dam pa ste/ /bskul na dang la rgyug pa yin/ /chags bcas bud med 'dod pa ltar/ /
46a2('dul ba): bram ze nga'i dga' 'dod pa yin/ /bram ze nga yi khyim bdag ni/ /shin tu sbyangs nor dam pa yin/ /nga yi byang chub yan lag bdun/ /'jig rten kun 'das rin chen des/ /long bar gyur cing gnyid log pa'i/ /skye
46a3('dul ba): dgu 'di dag sad par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun nas nga rgyal bas/ /nga la sdo ba'i dgra yod min/ /nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi/ /'khor bzhi po dag nga yi sras/ /rdzu 'phrul kun dga' phun sum tshogs/ /
46a4('dul ba): lam gyi bzhi mdor sprul pa byas/ /mdo sde skyes pa'i rabs dag bkram/ /skyes bu chen po rnams kyis sten/ /rnam thar gsum gyi sgo mo can/ /dran pa'i srung ma rnams kyis bsrungs/ /ngo tsha khrel yod kyis g.yogs
46a5('dul ba): pa'i/ /grong khyer sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /bsten pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ /rgyal po nga ni bzhugs nas su/ /nga yi chos kyi g.yul sprad de/ /chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas/ /bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom
46a6('dul ba): byas te/ /nga ni byang chub phyir dbang bskur/ /tshad med pa dag rab bsgoms pa/ /nga yi rgyan du bdog pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yis/ /nyon mongs pa dag rab tu bzlog /pha rol rab tu rgol bcom ste/ /rnam
46a7('dul ba): par bcom zhing rmeg med byas/ /srog chags rnams la 'jig rten 'dir/ /snang ba sbyin zhing yang dag spyad/ /nga ni bde bar gnas bcas nas/ /ye shes kyi ni mtshon gyis bcad/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas
46a8('dul ba): yin te/ /zhi gnas dag ni 'dzin stangs yin/ /tshul khrims shing rta sgra snyan la/ /nga yi lhag mthong kha lo sgyur/ /bzod dang des pa'i go bgos nas/ /lam bsgoms pas na g.yul ngor ni/ /gang gis sgrib pa
46b1('dul ba): 'joms pa yi/ /dbang po lnga yi dong ba dang / /gang gi nyon mongs thag 'jud pa'i/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi po yis/ /ngas ni dpa' bo g.yul sprad de/ /chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas/ /bdud dpung bcas par bcom
46b2('dul ba): byas te/ /nga ni byang chub dbang bskur ro/ /rig pas ma rig bcom nas ni/ /phung po skye zhing 'jig pa can/ /g.yul gyi rtse mo rgal te nga / /skye dgu byang chub phyir sangs rgyas/ /gang gi skye dgu gnod byed pa/ /
46b3('dul ba): 'jig rten chom rkun chen po gsum/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de kun nga yis bcom pas na/ /mngon shes kun gyi stobs byung bas/ /nga ni dgra bcom yon gnas 'os/ /zhing gshin pa la zhugs
46b4('dul ba): pa yi/ /sbyin sreg rnams kyang len pa yin/ /brtson 'grus dam pa brtsams nas ni/ /ngas ni zag pa rnams bcom mo/ /chu bo che las rgal nas ni/ /bsgral ba'i phyir ni gnas pa yin/ /ji ltar seng ge mche ba'i stobs/ /
46b5('dul ba): nags su srog chags dang phrad nas/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po 'ang rung / /de la mtshungs par snun pa ltar/ /mi yi seng ge rnam 'dren pa/ /rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni/ /byis pa 'am 'bring ngam chen po la/ /
46b6('dul ba): mnyam por chos ni ston par mdzad/ /gau tam khyod kyis 'di ru ni/ /nad pa bdag ni the tshom sol/ /zug rngu 'byin pa rnams dang ni/ /mig mkhan rnams kyi mchog khyod lags/ /khyod kyi the tshom bsal bar byas/ /
46b7('dul ba): bram ze khyod ni 'dun par gyis/ /grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba ste/ /gang zhig 'di na rnyed dka' ba/ /brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' 'byung / /bram ze rdzogs pa'i
46b8('dul ba): sangs rgyas nga / /chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin/ /de bzhin gshegs la ris gsol ba/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bka' stsal te/ /ma 'dres 'khor lo skor mdzad na/ /gau tam ji skad gsung ba
47a1('dul ba): bzhin/ /khyod kyis 'khor lo bskor ba gang / /rjes su mkhas par bskor bgyid pa/ /stong pa nyid 'khrungs nyan thos ni/ /sde dpon dag tu su 'gyur lags/ /bram ze nga la nyan thos ni/ /shes rab mtshungs pa'i
47a2('dul ba): sras yod pa/ /nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa po/ /mang du thos pa shA ri'i bu/ /mdud pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /nyer zhi zag pa med yod de/ /ngas ni 'khor lo gang bskor ba/ /mkhas pa rjes su skor bar byed/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /e ma'o
47a3('dul ba): nyan thos phun sum tshogs/ /e ma'o rin chen dam pa gsum/ /'jig rten byung ba ngo mtshar che/ /bzang po khyod kyi nyan thos su/ /bdag gis g.yar gyis blang bgyis la/ /kye ma'o chos kyi bcud 'tshal nas/ /shin tu mya ngan 'das par bgyi/ /
47a4('dul ba): sems rtog rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /de nas bram ze skyo gyur te/ /dben pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nags na seng ge sgra 'byin ltar/ /bsam gtan chen po'i zug rngu 'byin/ /spyan dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa/ /
47a5('dul ba): 'di ni shes ldan dag nyon cig /gang dag 'dod pa rjes su song / /gang dag mi 'dod de dag deng / /shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la/ /de ring kho na rab 'byung ngo / /tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing / /lam nyid shin tu goms byas na/ /bag yod pa
47a6('dul ba): la gnas pa yi/ /rab byung 'bras bu bcas par 'gyur/ /gal te khyed cag rab 'byung zhing / /bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na ni/ /bram ze ral pa 'di bregs te/ /bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bya/ /sems rtog rab tu mgu gyur pas/ /sor
47a7('dul ba): mo bcu yi thal sbyar te/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas/ /bram ze ri bo des gsol pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po/ /'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni/ /thub chen rab tu 'byung ba dang / /bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob par 'tshal/ /de nas ston
47a8('dul ba): pa thugs rje can/ /drang srong chen po thugs brtse bas/ /dge slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /de dag bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa maud gal dang / /dga' yod gnas brtan ka phi na/ /
47b1('dul ba): spobs pa rtogs par khong du chud/ /chu bo bzang po'i 'gram du ni/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du/ /spobs pa byang ba'i gnas brtan gyis/ /de dag la ni gdams ngag phog /der ni de las chos kyi gtam/ /rjes su mthun pa de shes nas/ /ring po
47b2('dul ba): ma thogs rnam grol te/ /dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod/ /de dag mthong thob bde gyur pas/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la/ /rab tu mgu bas phyag byas so/ /dam pa'i chos dang tshogs gtso dang / /
47b3('dul ba): rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang bged pa dang / /bag yod pa la phyag byas so/ /de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa 'am/ /bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /
47b4('dul ba): bkur bsti byas la skyabs su deng / /'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis/ /'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags/ /gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la/ /bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad/ /chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen/ /sangs rgyas
47b5('dul ba): bstan pa chos kyi ni/ /bdag nyid chen por mchog gyur la/ /thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten/ /ke na'i bu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
47b6('dul ba): te/ ka shi'i tshong rdal du byon to/ /ka shi'i tshong rdal de na sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pha spad gnyis yod pa las bus smras pa/ pha bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi'i
47b7('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun sku mnyel gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/ de la
47b8('dul ba): ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam/ 'on te dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/ des smras pa/ khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig /nga ni thug pa sta gon byed do/ /des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so/ /de yang
48a1('dul ba): me long zhig thogs nas tshong dus su song ba las/ des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/ des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di lta bu'i mkhyen pa yang mnga' 'am/ des smras pa
48a2('dul ba): yod do/ /gal te mnga' na bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa bregs lags sam/ khyim bdag bregs zin to/ /de mgu nas smras
48a3('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas khyod mchog ci bzhed pa don to/ /des smras pa/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nas thug la spyan drangs kyis nas thug byin cig /des smras pa/
48a4('dul ba): 'phags pa nas thug lta khyod ci rung bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag 'bul gyis bzhud la spyan drongs shig /nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas de song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong
48a5('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag ngan pa la mgron du bos na
48a6('dul ba): kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes de rnams kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ngan pa la mgron du bos la kha
48a7('dul ba): zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes pa gang byung ba de ni dge slong dag rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo
48a8('dul ba): bstan par mi bya/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi bya'o/ /srel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sngon sman pa yin na gtsa' khab kyi snod srel ba dang / sngon yi ge pa yin na ram phyis srel ba dang / bzo mkhan rab tu byung na khab
48b1('dul ba): ral srel ba ni ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/ /sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po gyad sna
48b2('dul ba): chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig ste/ bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal sdug po na
48b3('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/ /
48b4('dul ba): zhes thos kyis/ gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas ye khrims zhig bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus
48b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya zhing bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o/ /bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/ de la tshogs
48b6('dul ba): kyis kar Sha pA Na drug bcu'i chad pa gcad do/ /de nas sdig can gyi gyad thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dong ste lhags pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /
48b7('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /
48b8('dul ba): de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge
49a1('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas sdig can gyi
49a2('dul ba): gyad rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las
49a3('dul ba): langs te song ngo / /gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni de nyid na 'dug pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan ci khyod dad par gyur tam/ des smras pa/ bdag dad par ni ma gyur mod kyi 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims
49a4('dul ba): su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/ kar Sha pA Na drug bcu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig /btsun pa de lta lags so/ /de nas tshe dang
49a5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni sangs rgyas la
49a6('dul ba): mngon par ma dad/ chos la ma lags/ dge 'dun la ma lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/
49a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gang thos pas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/
49a8('dul ba): chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su
49b1('dul ba): thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 'od ldan
49b2('dul ba): nga sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang / ji ltar sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do/ /'od ldan gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na de bzhin du ngas khyod
49b3('dul ba): la gnang ngo / /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te chas nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
49b4('dul ba): sdig can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag re shig sdod cig bdag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan
49b5('dul ba): 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas kho bo cag mi nyan to/ /
49b6('dul ba): des smras pa/ ji ste mi btub na bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo/ /de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ mi gnang ngo / /dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di dad pa med pa zhig
49b7('dul ba): las/ 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dag 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo / /de nas des g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyis bca' ba
49b8('dul ba): gcig pu gang kho nas 'drangs par 'gyur ba de lta bur sta gon gyis shig / des dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas
50a1('dul ba): pa re res re re 'drangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin pa dag byas so/ /de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
50a2('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma spyad do/ /
50a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la bltas pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od
50a4('dul ba): ldan gyis bdag cag bslus lags kyis bzhes shig / de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'do ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang de kho nas dge slong rnams 'drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de
50a5('dul ba): gshegs pas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to/ /nyi ma gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur
50a6('dul ba): spyon/ chos tshur spyon/ dge 'dun tshur spyon 'di dag snoms shig /dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci kho bo la sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis
50a7('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes smra na bdag gir mi bya'o/ /'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni khyod nyid lags
50a8('dul ba): so zhes smra na blang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la 'am zhes brjod par bya zhing / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de
50b1('dul ba): la 'am zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro khang la spyan drangs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor
50b2('dul ba): bu lang tsho la bab pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung ngu byin pa dang
50b3('dul ba): gang gis mang du byin pa dang / gang gis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro
50b4('dul ba): zhes gsungs kyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gshag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na shing rul pa zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang /
50b5('dul ba): de dug gi shugs kyis brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te dbu bar skyug cing bzhin yang gyur/ mig kyang gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di khyim bdag su zhig gi
50b6('dul ba): bu yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi 'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i sras mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na nye du rnams kyis 'di la dpyad byas
50b7('dul ba): pa zhig ces bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa la dris la dpyad byos shig /dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang /
50b8('dul ba): des smras pa/ 'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong
51a1('dul ba): dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams kyis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed nyid kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad
51a2('dul ba): gzigs pa kho na nyid yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni lci ba dang / gcin dang /
51a3('dul ba): thal ba dang / sa'o/ /de la lci ba ni byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o/ /gcin yang de dag kho na'o/ /thal ba ni shing lnga po kan tsa na'i dang / ka pa d+hi ka'i dang / a shwa tha'i dang / u dum ba ra'i
51a4('dul ba): dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o/ /sa ni sa las sor bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o/ /'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yin no/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pas ril zas sbyar ba byin na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i
51a5('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ dge slong
51a6('dul ba): sa ri la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das
51a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal du gsol mnyan te bgyi'o/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas la phyag
51a8('dul ba): 'tshal lo/ chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta/ b+ha dre/
51b1('dul ba): shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mA ra tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a na ra tha pra sha ma ni/ sarba mang ga la pA d+ha ni/ ma na si/ mA na si/ ma hA mA na si/ a ts+yute/ ad b+hu te/ ad d+yan b+hu te/ mu ga te/ mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha ni/
51b2('dul ba): a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ a mar Ni/ brah+me/ brah+me swa re/ sU ra Ni/ sU ra na ma no ra the/ mu ga te/ dzI ban te/ sa ri'i gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ btsun pa
51b3('dul ba): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du
51b4('dul ba): gyur to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rigs sngags sman pa dang / gces
51b5('dul ba): spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lags so/ /dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang
51b6('dul ba): gces spras byas pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs
51b7('dul ba): su 'gyur ba byas te nyin mo bde legs su gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags/ 'dod pa rnams la zhen/
51b8('dul ba): 'chums/ brgyal/ myos/ rab tu rmongs/ rab tu brgyal te/ bag med pas nags kyi rma bya chen mo rab tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mos
52a1('dul ba): tshal dang / ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las ji tsam na ri'i ser ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de der yun ring du phyir rgol ba/ dgrar gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya'i rnyis bzung ste/
52a2('dul ba): de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang / rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa rnyed nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di kho na yid la byas so/ /a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man
52a3('dul ba): ta b+ha dre/ shrIr b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mA ra tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a na ra tha pra sha ma ni/ sarba mang ga la sA d+ha ni/ ma na si/ mA na si/ ma hA mA na si/ a ts+yu te/ ad b+hu te/ ad d+yan b+hu te/ mu ga te/ mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha ni/
52a4('dul ba): a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a mr-i te/ a ma ra Ni/ brah+me/ brah+mA+e swa re/ sU ra Ni/ sU ra Na ma no ra the/ mu ga te/ dzI ban te/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ des rma bya'i rnyi chad nas bros so/ /
52a5('dul ba): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ de na yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces spras byas so/ /da ltar na yang
52a6('dul ba): nga'i rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang gces spras byas so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri la ji tsam pa bde legs su byas par gyur pa la gzigs/ dge slong dag da ltar
52a7('dul ba): 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod do/ /rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul gyis zin nas de shi ba dang / sbrul sngags mkhan
52a8('dul ba): gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge slong sa ri yin no/ /
52b1('dul ba): sman gyi gzhi rdzogs so// // gos kyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ /'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang / /de bzhin kha tshar ring po dang / /dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang / /shi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang / /tha ma dag ni nad pa yin/ / sdus
52b2('dul ba): pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang / /dbyar gyi ras chen gding ba dang / /g.yan pa bde gshegs mon dar dang / /bal dang sha na zar ma'i ras/ /sdom la/ dum bu sa skyong seng ge dang / de bzhin yangs par song ba
52b3('dul ba): dang / /sems 'phrog drang srong sa 'tsho dang / /a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang / /tshong dpon chung ma rigs skyes dang / /sman pa yi ni lung dang ni/ /rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang / /u dum ba ra gzhal ba dang / /
52b4('dul ba): bskyed dang rgyal rigs bskyed mos tshal/ /bcom brlag gyad dang bud med sprul/ /ya mu na dang dur khrod dang / /yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med/ /rgyal po'i khab bdun bzhi lnga dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /
52b5('dul ba): lus 'phags na rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ /de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa
52b6('dul ba): las blon po'i mchog dum bus chos dang mthun par rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do/ /des na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor bltas shing 'dug go/ /des rigs
52b7('dul ba): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas
52b8('dul ba): ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig
53a1('dul ba): btsas te gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de ni seng ge zhes bya bar btags so/ /sa skyong dang seng ge rim gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang blon po'i mchog tu dum bu ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa
53a2('dul ba): gnas lnga la byang ba yin te/ des na blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe/ lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go/ /de nas blon po de rnams zil gyis non
53a3('dul ba): pas mi bzod pa skyes nas phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal po'i drung du dong ngo / /de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gis brtag tu ci yod rgyal po lta
53a4('dul ba): nga yin mod/ gzhan su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po ni dum bu lags kyis lha ma lags so/ /gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ rgyal srid kyi dbang
53a5('dul ba): phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ des 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas des na dbyen byed do snyam mo/ /re shig dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te
53a6('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir
53a7('dul ba): byung ba de'i tshe yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gang gi
53a8('dul ba): slad du snyan du gsol ba spyan sngar bab lags mod/ gal te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rnams khwa ltar khum
53b1('dul ba): phrig za ba yin pas des bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o snyam nas de de la glan ka tshol bar gyur to/ /'jig rten na mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bar ma yod pas ji tsam na gzhan dag
53b2('dul ba): gis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gis thabs legs par soms shig /de rtog pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa gang du 'gro/ gal te mnyan yod du song na ni mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i
53b3('dul ba): mnga' ris yin pas nyen 'di nyid yod do/ /de bzhin du bA rA Na sI dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di nyid yod do/ /yangs pa can ni tshogs kyi dbang yin te/ bcu dga' ba gang yin pa de
53b4('dul ba): la ni nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas ye yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas des yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams la bdag ni khyed cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dug par 'dod do zhes pho nya btang ngo / /de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul
53b5('dul ba): gyis lan spring ba/ yangs pa can 'dir byon pa legs kyis spyon cig /de nas blon po'i mchog dum bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni yangs pa can du chas kyis khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba
53b6('dul ba): de dag ni 'dug shig / gang dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo / /ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed cag gis ba lang dang ma he yangs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig /zho shas 'tsho ba
53b7('dul ba): rnams la bsgo ba yangs pa can du 'dong gis go gyon cig / de nas skye bo'i tshogs de ltar sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bgyi ba cung zhig mchis te/
53b8('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal du mchi na gzigs su gsol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin byas song shig /des bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/ steng bza' ba dang bca' bas g.yogs nas
54a1('dul ba): song ngo / /blon po rnams kyis dum bu bros so zhes thos nas/ de rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha dum bu ni bros so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ deng la slar khug shig /de rnams
54a2('dul ba): kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas bsnyags te smras pa/ dum bu lhas bka' stsal gyis slar log shig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'o dum bu shi 'am
54a3('dul ba): bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa de tshegs chung ngus grub kyis deng shig / kho bo ni bros pa yin no/ /de rnams kyis rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas log ste rgyal po
54a4('dul ba): la smras pa/ lha blon po'i mchog dum bu ni bros so/ /rgyal pos ma legs so snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na ris gsum du gnas te/
54a5('dul ba): ris dang po na ni khang pa rtseg ma bdun stong ba gam gser las byas pa'o/ /ris bar ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma khri bzhi stong ba gam dngul las byas pa'o/ /ris tha ma na ni khang pa rtseg ma nyi khri chig stong ba gam zangs las byas pa ste/
54a6('dul ba): de rnams na mi dam pa dang / bar ma dang / phal pa rnams ci rigs par gnas so/ /yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis khrims su bcas te bzhag pa ni ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed
54a7('dul ba): kyi bar mar ma yin/ tha mar ma yin no/ /bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do/ /tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris gsum char du gtong bar byed do/ /bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma
54a8('dul ba): gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing mi 'byin to/ /bud med rin po che ni su la yang mi gtong bar tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyad pa kho nar byed do/ /dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te ris dang por khang pa byin nas/
54b1('dul ba): de na gnas par brtsams pa las gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/ de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu khyod ci'i phyir mi 'du/ des smras pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag
54b2('dul ba): la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o/ /yangs pa can pa rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu 'dus shig /'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung des 'du bar brtsams nas blo gros ma byin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/
54b3('dul ba): dum bu blo gros byin cig /des smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na blo gros ni mi sbyin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / de tshogs
54b4('dul ba): dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin no/ /sngon yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na rtsub po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do/ /gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe 'jam po
54b5('dul ba): dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do/ /gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas
54b6('dul ba): par spring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po dang bcas par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyad par yod de lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/ de dag de'i
54b7('dul ba): blo gros bzhin byed de/ des na da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do/ /dum bus sa skyong dang seng ge khyim phub nas seng ge rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig
54b8('dul ba): btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas khye'u zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te
55a1('dul ba): rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos can zhes bya bar
55a2('dul ba): btags so/ /de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas yangs pa can gyi li rtsa bi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal rnams
55a3('dul ba): ma rung bar byas pa dang / bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li rtsa bi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis de dag gi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya shig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub
55a4('dul ba): nas bskyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi li rtsa bi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li rtsa bi 'di dag rnams gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas 'di la gnod pa byas su
55a5('dul ba): 'ong gis 'di slar zlog shig / des de bkug nas smras pa/ bu yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyis 'di dag gi bskyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya shig /de dag gis gnod par byas sa re/
55a6('dul ba): des smras pa/ yab 'di dag la ni bskyed mos tshal mchis na bdag cag la ni ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ bu bskyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo/ /des tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/ shes ldan dag bdag
55a7('dul ba): gi bu gnyis la bskyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis bdag la bskyed mos tshal shig thugs dpag mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /de rnams kyis de dag la bskyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/
55a8('dul ba): de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go/ /gcig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa
55b1('dul ba): can na sa skyong dang seng ge'i shing sa la'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes brjod do/ /sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas li tsa bi rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /de nas dum bus
55b2('dul ba): bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu song la der rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug shig /de der song nas rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed par
55b3('dul ba): brtsams so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas de rnams kyis blon po'i mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa las des kyang dus thung ngu zhig tu chos dang 'thun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o/ /yangs pa can gyi
55b4('dul ba): tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces byas pa dang / de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs pas na de nyid kyi bu gzhug go/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa
55b5('dul ba): skyong ni gdug pa rtsal po che zhig ste/ gal te de sde dpon du bcug na gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni des pa 'grogs na bde ba tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas/ gal te
55b6('dul ba): tshogs 'dod na de sde dpon du gzhug go/ /thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no/ /des smras pa/ sa skyong ni bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug
55b7('dul ba): shig / de rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyis rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci tshogs gang la 'drang ba des sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'dod na kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde
55b8('dul ba): dpon du gzhug go/ /des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na de ni ma 'os pas ye bkur ro snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ /yangs
56a1('dul ba): pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri bar byed pa las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes
56a2('dul ba): 'dri bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri 'or na sa skyong rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri 'or ba gang yin pa der spring ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste blags nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag
56a3('dul ba): sngon ni yangs pa can gyi tshogs dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri na/ da ni seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri na/ ci kho bo'i pha shi 'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa shi'o/ /de mi
56a4('dul ba): bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bo nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba ci ga rigs sam/ seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas
56a5('dul ba): bsams pa/ bdag la yangs pa can pa rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas kyis rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo zhes pho nya btang
56a6('dul ba): ngo / /des de la spring ba 'ong ba legs kyis shog shig ces spring ngo / /de rgyal po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
56a7('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/
56a8('dul ba): des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug /lha thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis
56b1('dul ba): mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gums pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ gcig shos la ni mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na lha'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/ bu mtshan
56b2('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o/ /de nas sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas khyod kyi nye gos can tshur skri shig dang
56b3('dul ba): btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro/ /des de la yi ge lan spring ba/ gar bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad de/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so/ /ji
56b4('dul ba): ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtong ngo zhes bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te bskyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bos de bskyed mos tshal du phyung
56b5('dul ba): ba dang khyod kyis khrid de song shig / de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song ba las rim gyis phyin nas bskyed mos tshal du bsdad do/ /de'i tshe yangs pa
56b6('dul ba): can gyi sgo srungs shig shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pa des yangs pa can pa rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyis bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la mgul pa la dril
56b7('dul ba): sbyongs shig dang gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa 'am/ 'bros par gyur pa de srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o/ /de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi
56b8('dul ba): gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go/ /sa skyong gis seng ge la spring ba/ kho bo
57a1('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal na sdod kyis byung shig / des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thogs la bskyed
57a2('dul ba): mos tshal du byung shig / des rgyan rnams thogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan thogs/ kho mo bag mar btang ngo / /su zhig la/ rgyal po gzugs can
57a3('dul ba): snying po la'o/ /des smras pa/ kho mo phu mo yin na khyod ci ste bag mar gtang / gal te de lta na khyod rgyan thogs shig /de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra byung ngo / /yangs pa can gyi tshogs rod rod por gyur te/ bdag cag
57a4('dul ba): gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so/ /seng ge sngangs pas nye gos can yin no snyam nas gos can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang sngangs pas gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo / /yangs
57a5('dul ba): pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyags nas/ de dang de rnams su lhan cig 'thab par brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas des li tsa bi lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas des smras pa/ shes ldan
57a6('dul ba): dag ngas khyed cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun zin gyis lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyis slar deng shig / de rnams kyis smras pa/ nged cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do/ /go phud cig de rnams kyis go
57a7('dul ba): phud pa dang lnga brgya sa la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam nas skrag ste bros so/ /yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag
57a8('dul ba): cag gi dgra 'di la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan glon du gzhug gis glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skyags la rgyas btab nas gzhag go zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go/ /
57b1('dul ba): sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can bobs shig /des smras pa/ khu gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags so/ /khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/
57b2('dul ba): de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ sa skyong 'ongs sam 'ongs pa legs so/ /lha bdag mchis lags so/ /nye gos can khrid de
57b3('dul ba): 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so/ /ci zhig zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas gos can khrid de mchis so/ /bltas khrid de shog shig /de nang du khrid pa dang rgyal
57b4('dul ba): pos lhag par gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal
57b5('dul ba): srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na lus
57b6('dul ba): 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so/ /de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /re shig dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dgas kyi phyir byung ba na bsti
57b7('dul ba): gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/ /ji tsam na ri dgas mda'i long btags pas skrag pa zhig drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun to/ /
57b8('dul ba): de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan gzan gdug pas kyang gzem par bya bar ri dgas skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsod dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po
58a1('dul ba): la de skad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'di su la g.yar mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin na/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/
58a2('dul ba): lha de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so/ /gal te de lta na ngas drang srong 'di yongs su spangs so/ /de gsad par brtsams te de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med
58a3('dul ba): cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsad par bskris/ gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig /yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa/ shin tu btsas pa yin
58a4('dul ba): pas gal te gzhan du skye ba blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /de smon lam log par btab pas gos
58a5('dul ba): can gyi mngal du skyes so/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la khrag gi char bab bo/ /gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci
58a6('dul ba): ma rung snyam mo/ /de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i
58a7('dul ba): mthu lags so/ /rgyal po sems khongs su chud cing 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar stsang shas bltam par
58a8('dul ba): bgyis te gsol la nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig / de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas bdag nyid gos can la btabs pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so/ /
58b1('dul ba): de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag
58b2('dul ba): lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag blud pas de 'dod pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas te gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi
58b3('dul ba): nyi ma la yang khrag gi char bab bo/ /rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na gdon mi 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku
58b4('dul ba): tshe dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyis 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal
58b5('dul ba): srid byin na ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo de'i tshe yangs pa can na li tsa bi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i bskyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal yod pa las der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa
58b6('dul ba): kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong ngo / /de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de
58b7('dul ba): srung du gsol cig dang dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ bskyed
58b8('dul ba): mos tshal der kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas nyi ma bgrang ba la zhugs so/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang bskyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus
59a1('dul ba): chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye
59a2('dul ba): bos yongs su bskor nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas bskyed mos tshal de na de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chu shing gi sdong po gas nas bu mo gzugs
59a3('dul ba): bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/
59a4('dul ba): bu mo 'di ni a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas 'di'i ming a mra skyong ma zhes bya'o/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag ming chen bskyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to
59a5('dul ba): zhes bya bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de slong ba'i phyir yul krung krung pa rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon
59a6('dul ba): du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa gang kho na la ma byin pa de dag kho na sdang bar 'gyur na 'on kyang tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pas re shig tshogs la brtag go snyam nas/ des yangs pa
59a7('dul ba): can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig /bdag gis bskyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de bdag gis bsnun bsnyod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs rgyud
59a8('dul ba): dang 'tsham par 'ga' zhig la chung mar byin na tshogs kyis ltos shig / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni mi gtang ste tshogs kyis spyad do/ /
59b1('dul ba): zhes bcas pa yin gyis re shig bu mo de ci 'dra ba zhig bltas khrid de shog shig /des de tshogs kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur
59b2('dul ba): pa'i mig bgrad de kun tu brtags par brtsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis su la yang mi sbyin no/ /de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing rang gi
59b3('dul ba): khyim du song nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no zhes tshogs kyis
59b4('dul ba): spyad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs so/ /yab ci khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu mo sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa bud med rin po che ni tshogs kyis spyad do zhes bcas la/ khyod
59b5('dul ba): kyang bud med rin po che yin pas de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do/ /des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste gal te bdag la tshogs kyi dam pa lnga zhig stsal na/ bdag tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang
59b6('dul ba): po'i khang pa stsal ba dang / skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kar Sha pA Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe
59b7('dul ba): bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang / bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag pa'o/ /ming chen gyis a mra skyong ma'i spring pa bzlas pa dang tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin
59b8('dul ba): du byas te/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la ris dang po'i khang pa ni bud med rin po che 'di kho na la 'os so/ /gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smra ba de yang bden te
60a1('dul ba): sha khon rnams las ni 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha khon tha chad yin pas gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos kyang nang du zhugs na gdon ma zos par gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro/ /nang du
60a2('dul ba): 'jug pa des kar Sha pA Na lnga brgya thogs te nang du 'jug par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyan du dgos so/ /zhag bdun lon pa na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang
60a3('dul ba): bden te/ sngar ram phyis byas kyang rung de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad 'tshong ma yin pas gal te mi rnams
60a4('dul ba): kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa brtags na su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug / de nas tshogs kyis de la mchog lnga byin nas tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams kyis dga' mgur spyad pa'i
60a5('dul ba): phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches pa'i phyir mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes
60a6('dul ba): pa'i bya ba ma byas so/ /des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan
60a7('dul ba): dag gang na rgyal po 'am blon po'am phyug po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa 'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig /de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas
60a8('dul ba): a mra skyong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags te dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di gang zhig 'di ni rgyal po rab snang ngo / /gzhan 'di gang zhig /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo/ /
60b1('dul ba): gzhan 'di gang zhig bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed do/ /gzhan 'di gang zhig /ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o/ /des de bzhin du dris pa dang de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so/ /de nas des
60b2('dul ba): thams cad la brtags pa dang gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas des bsams pa/ skyes bu 'di ltar chu zheng gab pas ni bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par nus so snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na
60b3('dul ba): ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma
60b4('dul ba): ji lta bu mthong / sa skyong gis smras pa/ lha re zhig gzhan lta zhog /yangs pa can na smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba shin tu gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'tshal ba
60b5('dul ba): lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so/ /des smras pa/ sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong / de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/ /des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams ni yun ring po
60b6('dul ba): nas gnod pa bgyid pa slar rgol ba dgra bo lags pas khyod la gnod pa bgyid du mchi 'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpa' snying can yin pas 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ lha gal te
60b7('dul ba): don ma mchis pa la gtsigs che bar mdzad na gshegs mod/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas sa skyong ni bskyed mos tshal na sdod do/ /rgyal
60b8('dul ba): po ni a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo / /yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams rod rod por gyur nas shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo
61a1('dul ba): zhes sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos a mra skyong ma la dris pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum pa nyul bar bgyid do/ /ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i slad du'o/ /ji ltar bya/
61a2('dul ba): ci 'bros sam/ lha mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig /lha dgung bdun lon pa dang bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas re shig dgung bdun du rol pas dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod la dgung bdun lags dang dus
61a3('dul ba): mkhyen par bgyi'o/ /de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/ lha bdag
61a4('dul ba): la sems can zhugs so/ /des de la seng ras shig dang sor gdub rgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na khyod nyid kyi yin no/ /'on te khye'u yin na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub gyi rgya mgul tu thogs te nga'i
61a5('dul ba): drung du skri shig / de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang dril bu 'khrol bar 'dug go/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dgra bo byung gis rjes bzhin du btsal lo zhes li tsa bi skyin 'khor gyi mda'
61a6('dul ba): rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang sa skyong gis mthong nas des smras pa/ lha yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams mchi na/ lha ci 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi 'am/ 'on te shing rta
61a7('dul ba): brda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni dub pas shing rta ded kyis khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo khye shig /des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas de rnams kyis smras pa/
61a8('dul ba): shes ldan dag mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis slar ldog go/ /de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te 'dus nas yang khrims su bcas pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon
61b1('dul ba): du gzhug go zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang la mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas zhes bya ba nas bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /
61b2('dul ba): de yangs pa can pa'i li tsa bi khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ bran mo'i bu khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na pha su yin/ de ngus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang des
61b3('dul ba): smras pa/ bu ci'i phyir du ngu / des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu gal te yang 'dri dang nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do zhes smros shig /gal te su yin zhes smra dang / rgyal po gzugs can
61b4('dul ba): snying po yin no zhes smros shig / ji tsam na de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do/ /su yin/ rgyal po
61b5('dul ba): gzugs can snying po yin no/ /de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra gang yin pa de ni 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag par yang brdegs so/ /des ngus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/
61b6('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo/ /de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang tshong pa rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba
61b7('dul ba): de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas thob la deng shig dang sho gam mi gcod par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la sor gdub kyi rgya 'di 'di'i mgul du thogs te rgyal po'i
61b8('dul ba): khab tu zhog shig / de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so/ /bu la yang mu tig gi do shal cig byin nas smras pa/ bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs
62a1('dul ba): te pang du 'dug shig / gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go zhes smra dang de la yang bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig /de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis
62a2('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs
62a3('dul ba): te pang du 'dug go/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go/ /des smras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i
62a4('dul ba): sgra kun tu smras pas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la
62a5('dul ba): lhag par chags pas glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig yod pa des rigs
62a6('dul ba): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas shes bya ba nas dga' mgur spyod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o/ /des
62a7('dul ba): smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig /de zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo / /de yang kha zas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la
62a8('dul ba): zhon nas de'i khyim drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro/ /de nas rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog /des smras pa/ lha g.yar cha lags kyis khyod
62b1('dul ba): nyid nang du gshegs shig / de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ de yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur nas des rgyal po la smras pa/
62b2('dul ba): lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras khra bo byin nas smras pa/ gal te re zhig khye'ur gyur na seng ras 'di skon la sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te
62b3('dul ba): nga'i drung du skri shig / 'on te bu mo yin na ni khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras nas rgyal po song ngo / /ji tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig /
62b4('dul ba): kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te/ zhag 'di tsam kho na na phyin par 'ong ngo / /spring ba des thos nas bdag gis ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du phongs par gyur nas/
62b5('dul ba): des de ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar spring ba/ bag ma tsha bar 'dug shig ci nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar ngas bya'o/ /rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba/ ded dpon nga
62b6('dul ba): la rin po che che ge mo dang che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig / de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo / /de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas btsas pa dang khye'u gzugs
62b7('dul ba): bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /ma bslabs kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bsnyod nas sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du btags te seng ras kyis bkris nas sgrom bu'i nang
62b8('dul ba): du bcug ste bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig /des de bzhin
63a1('dul ba): byas pa dang ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas rgyal po gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dug pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me mthong ngo / /de nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la
63a2('dul ba): bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me 'bar ba 'o ni ci yin ltos shig /de dag gis bltas nas smras pa/ lha sgrom bu zhig mchis so/ /des smras pa/ long shig /rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis smras pa/
63a3('dul ba): lha sgrom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal bar ci gnang / rgyal pos de bzhin bya'o zhes khas blangs so/ /ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang rgyal pos smras pa/ kha phye shig /kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo / /rgyal
63a4('dul ba): pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on te shi ba zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de
63a5('dul ba): bsnun bsnyod bskyed de rgyal pos gson nam zhes tshig tu byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grags so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed gzhon nus
63a6('dul ba): gsos chen por gyur to/ /de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes sgra ni ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyis bdag cag gis bzo cung zad bslabs te/
63a7('dul ba): des na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs
63a8('dul ba): pa dang / de rgyal bu 'jigs med gzhon nus mthong nas/ des rgyal po'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lags so/ /'dis ci 'thob/ 'tsho 'o/ /
63b1('dul ba): des bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas shing rta mkhan bslab bo snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab bo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod ci 'dis
63b2('dul ba): 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so/ /bu gal te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs shig /des bslab par brtsams so/ /'tsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos
63b3('dul ba): dkar po gon pa mi gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/ des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so/ /'di ci
63b4('dul ba): zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do/ /ci thob/ gal te nad pa zhig sos na rngan pa thob bo/ /'on te gum na mi 'tshol mi 'dri'o/ /des bsams pa/ sman dpyad bslab bo snyam nas/ de pha'i gan du song ste smras pa/
63b5('dul ba): lha gnang ba mdzod cig /sman dpyad bslab lags so/ /bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no/ /khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus ni bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so/ /bu gal te
63b6('dul ba): de lta na slobs shig / des sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad ni lobs na des glad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de/
63b7('dul ba): de glad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog tu mchi'o/ /ci zhig gi phyir de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de glad pa'i thod pa
63b8('dul ba): 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bas de slob tu mchi'o/ /bu khyod 'dis 'tsho 'am/ lha yang na ni dpyad mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o/ /bu gal te de lta na song shig /des rgyal po pad ma'i snying
64a1('dul ba): po la spring ba/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gis/ 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig /de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang / pad ma'i snying pos kyang spring
64a2('dul ba): yig blags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyis 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig / rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang 'tsho byed kyis khyad
64a3('dul ba): par dang bcas pa lobs so/ /rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshe nad pa la ltar 'gro ba'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas des nad pa'i sman bstan pa
64a4('dul ba): 'di dang 'di dag ni byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo / /'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan pos nyes te/ gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni legs
64a5('dul ba): pa ma yin gyis thabs shig bya'o snyam nas de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo / /kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma sbyin par 'di
64a6('dul ba): dang 'di dag byin cig ces zer ro/ /des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur to/ /ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ na ba ji lta sos par gyur to/ /sang
64a7('dul ba): yang de nyid byin cig / ci snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci bdag gis sngar bstan tam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni khyod kyis mngon sum
64a8('dul ba): du bstan to/ /'di ni 'tsho byed la phrin du spring ba yin no/ /des bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no snyam bsams nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang
64b1('dul ba): yin pa de byin cig / rgyun shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba skyes pas de gang du 'gro bar der 'tsho byed 'khrid do/ /bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas
64b2('dul ba): 'di la ni spro bas ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag cag la ni mi mdzad do/ /des smras pa/ 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi khyed kyis ni de lta ma yin no/ /
64b3('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lta na ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o/ /des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la khyod kyis ni rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig /khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o
64b4('dul ba): zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo / /'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas so/ /'tsho byed kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsams
64b5('dul ba): pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin dri'o snyam mo/ /de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin smras so/ /
64b6('dul ba): rgyun shes kyi bus ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri bar brtsams te/ bram ze'i khye'u rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa/ ma 'tshal lags so/ /'tsho byed la dris
64b7('dul ba): pa dang des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so/ /ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te/ cung zad bstan na yang de la rang gis rnam par
64b8('dul ba): 'byed nus so zhes smras pa ni don de yin no/ /gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o zhes de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la deng la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog shig /de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis
65a1('dul ba): gang sman ma yin par shes pa de de dag gis blangs so/ /'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blangs so/ /
65a2('dul ba): ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro/ des smras pa/ des de la gnas de nyid kyi
65a3('dul ba): drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa las des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur to/ /de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud 'di khyod snoms shig /des phrum tshud blangs te/ zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la
65a4('dul ba): byin nas de phrum tshud khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i rjes zhig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/
65a5('dul ba): 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i rjes so/ /'di ni glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyi/ 'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba de ring kho nar glang po che'i phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la
65a6('dul ba): zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no/ /ji tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to/ /rgyun shes
65a7('dul ba): kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re shig 'di ni che ge mo zhig gis nad che ge mo zhig yin la de bzhin du gzhan yang gzhan dag kyang yin no/ /'tsho byed la dris pa khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/
65a8('dul ba): des smras pa/ mkhan po thams cad sman lags te/ sman ma lags pa ni ci yang ma mchis so/ /'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / phrum tshud gcig 'tshal te mchis so/ /'di dag ci dgos
65b1('dul ba): sdig pas zin pa las 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/ /phrum tshud kyis ni glan par bgyi'o/ /rdo'i dum bus ni ston ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun shes kyi bus 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u
65b2('dul ba): rnams kyis bsams pa/ mkhan po ni 'di la khros so snyam nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po 'di gcig pur bas snyam 'am/ bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas 'di ni ban
65b3('dul ba): glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring kho nar glang po che phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba sbrum pa de ring nyid du bu pho btsa' bar 'gyur ro
65b4('dul ba): zhes mchi 'o/ /rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/ 'tsho byed bden nam/ mkhan po mad do/ de glang po che'i rjes sam/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags
65b5('dul ba): na ci ste ma 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo/ /bal glang mo'i rjes ni chur ring ngo / /mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa las so/ /sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis
65b6('dul ba): gnon cing mchi ba las so/ /deng kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so/ /glang po che'i phrug gu phor 'brang bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon
65b7('dul ba): cing mchi bas so/ /de la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcis pa las so/ /de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog thu zhing mchi bas so/ /de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/
65b8('dul ba): de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so/ /deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ljan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba las so/ /de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na 'dron pa gnas pa'i
66a1('dul ba): phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams
66a2('dul ba): la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ 'tsho byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can no/ /'tsho byed kyis glad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslabs so/ /ji tsam na mi zhig glad
66a3('dul ba): nad kyis thebs nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bu bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /des smras pa/ kye nang rje re shig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang sang bdag gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o/ /
66a4('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis cung zad bslabs pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin na/ bdag gis glad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag
