87b5('dul ba): 'chi ba yis/ /mi rnams 'joms par byed pa na/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po dang / /tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan/ /khyim pa de bzhin brtul zhugs can/ /lang tsho nyid dang rgan po
87b6('dul ba): dang / /de bzhin bar ma'i mi rnams la/ /cung zad kyang ni bzem med par/ /thams cad mngon du 'joms par byed/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa'i mi/ /bdag gi don la blta ba yis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ /bla med dag la dad bya
87b7('dul ba): zhing / /lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis/ /dam pa'i chos ni spyad byas na/ /'di na smad par mi 'gyur zhing / /mtho ris song nas dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'
87b8('dul ba): ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ri dgas
88a1('dul ba): 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ba de rnams las kyang bu pho sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ste rtsal po che thub rlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/ bcom
88a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /gang du smon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du khyim bdag gcig gi bu sh-i nas de'i chung ma de rtag tu bu mngon par 'dod par gyur to/ /
88a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe bA rA
88a4('dul ba): Na sIr rgyal po kri ki zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las brtsigs so/ /de nas bud med bu med pa bu mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas
88a5('dul ba): mchod rten de la byi dor byas nas 'dug go/ /des 'dun pa'i slongs mo byas nas mchod rten de la mchod par byas te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa
88a6('dul ba): gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te song nas grong khyer du zhugs so/ /de na bud med cig bu nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas ngu ba dang des gzhan zhig la dris pa/ ci'i phyir 'di ngu bar
88a7('dul ba): gyur des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang des bsams pa/ gal te bdag kyang bu byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro snyam pa las/ ci tsam na sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dge 'dun gyis
88a8('dul ba): mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa na bud med de yang de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/ /de rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par
88b1('dul ba): gyur cig ces byas so/ /des de rnams la dris pa bu dag khyed kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum 'di dang 'di dag go/ /des smras pa/ bu dag gal te de ltar na khyed cag gi mar bdag kho na gyur cig /yum de
88b2('dul ba): bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams dong ngo / /des bsams pa/ re shig bud med de lan gcig btsa' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas de ltar ngu na/ bdag la lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis btsa' na ji ltar bya zhes de de ltar rnam par
88b3('dul ba): rtog pa na/ mchod rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgo nga 'byung bar de de thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung la smre sngags kyang mi 'don to/ /des bsams pa/ 'byung ba'i thabs 'di ni rung ba yin no snyam du rig nas
88b4('dul ba): mchod rten de la dad pa drag pos smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ ji ltar bya gag mo 'di thang cig tsam gyis sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin du bdag gi bu sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang gcig car sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur cig ces
88b5('dul ba): byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dgA 'dun gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/ 'dis de na smon lam
88b6('dul ba): btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum bcu rtsa gnyis byung ngo / /btsun pa sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa ma bgyis shing skyon ma mchis par rgyal po
88b7('dul ba): gsal rgyal gyis bkum nas de rnams kyi mgos gzeb bkang ste sa ga ma la bskur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus
88b8('dul ba): can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na chang 'tshong zhig gnas so/ /chom rkun pa rab tu mang po chang tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dris pa/ chang yod dam/ chang 'tshong gi
89a1('dul ba): chung mas smras pa/ yod do zhes de rnams la chang blud na 'dzar ba med nas/ des glang zhig bstan de 'di sod cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ mtshon cha med do/ /des gta' blangs nas mtshon cha byin pa dang / de rnams kyis de
89a2('dul ba): bsad par brtsams so/ /de gsod pa na sems la bdag gsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni chang 'tshong gi chung ma 'di yin gyis/ bdag gang du 'di rnams kyi mgo bcad nas gzeb bkang ste 'di la bskur bar 'gyur ba
89a3('dul ba): der skye bar gyur cig ces bsams so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no/ /chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni sa ga ma'i bu 'di dag nyid yin
89a4('dul ba): no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang 'tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no zhes rgyas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drang srong mngon par
89a5('dul ba): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bsti gnas shig yod de/ de de na 'chag pa las bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa rdzab can gyi phyogs shig tu gcin khu chu dang bcas pa zhig gcis so/ /glo bur du ri dgas mo skom pas nyen pa zhig
89a6('dul ba): phyogs der 'ongs te/ de skom pas nyen pas de 'thungs nas mo'i dbang po la bsnams so/ /sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig
89a7('dul ba): na phyogs de nyid du 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang / des de bsnams na skal ba mi mthun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo / ji tsam na drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las khye'u de mthong nas/ 'di su'i bu yin zhes de
89a8('dul ba): bsam pa la zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na bdag gi yin par mthong nas des de bsti gnas su bzhag ste bsnun bsnyod bskyed nas de'i mgo ri dgas kyi 'dra bas ri dgas mgo ri dgas mgo zhes bya bar grags so/ /dus gzhan zhig
89b1('dul ba): na drang srong shi nas ri dgas mgos glad pa'i thod pa rdob pa'i rig pa bslabs te/ des thod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung ston par byed do/ /gal te re shig sgra drag por gyur na gyen du 'gro ba lhar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /
89b2('dul ba): 'on te 'bring du gyur na gyen du 'gro ba mir skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed de/ de ni bde 'gro'i rtags so/ /ngan 'gro'i rtags ni gal te re shig sgra mi gsal bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston
89b3('dul ba): par byed do/ /'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /'on te sgra chung bar gyur na 'og tu 'gro ba yi dags su skye bar lung ston par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'dul ba'i dus
89b4('dul ba): mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe
89b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas mgo bzhi khyer te drang srong de'i drung du song nas khyod kyis lung ston cig / des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i thod pa la brdabs nas smras pa/ 'di ni lha rnams su skyes so/ /
89b6('dul ba): lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang de bzhin no/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no/ /dgra bcom pa'i thod pa la brdabs na ma shes rnam par ma shes nas ngo tsha bas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ /
89b7('dul ba): bdag ci bstan pa de las nyams gyur tam/ /'on te slob dpon rigs las ma skyes sam/ /'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nam/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ /
89b8('dul ba): khyod kyis rig pa kun legs goms ma byas/ /re shig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byos la/ /khyod kyis phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig /ri dgas mgos smras pa/ khyod kyis rig pa thams cad la byang ba 'ga' mthong
90a1('dul ba): ngam mthong ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /de nas ri dgas mgo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
90a2('dul ba): song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dud 'gro yi dags dmyal ba lha mi skye bo'i 'gro 'tshal na/ /rig pa'i skyon gyis sems can spyod pa drug pa ma 'tshal gyis/ /gtso bo srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen
90a3('dul ba): pha rol byon pa po/ /pha rol smra kun las rgyal drug pa ma 'tshal de ci gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mer bsregs pa yi lcags kyi me/ /lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas/ /rim gyis nye bar zhi ba yi/ /
90a4('dul ba): 'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa/ /de bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las/ /gal te yang dag rnam grol ba/ /mi g.yo go 'phang thob rnams kyi/ /'gro ba gdags su yod ma yin/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
90a5('dul ba): la ri dgas mgos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
90a6('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs
90a7('dul ba): nas mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
90a8('dul ba): ldan 'das bla gab med pa na 'chag cing rgyu skar rnams gyur pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas mgo la bka' stsal pa/ ri dgas mgo ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur soms shig /des
90b1('dul ba): bsams nas btsun pa 'jig rten 'di ma rung 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/ rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas pa dang sbyar na lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams 'thun par byin gyis
90b2('dul ba): brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ yang shes par gyis shig /des gsol pa/ lo drug tu lags so/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang / gsol pa/ lo lngar lags so/ /de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du'o/ /
90b3('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par spos shig /de ring kho nar lhas phye ma'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'bebs par 'gyur te/ de la khrus byed pa gang yin
90b4('dul ba): pa de rnams la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ri dgas mgo de ltar na rgyu skar rnams ni 'gyur ba g.yo ba mi brtan pa yin te/ srog kyang g.yo ba mi brtan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
90b5('dul ba): pa dang / ri dgas mgo mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ri dgas
90b6('dul ba): rnams ni nags khrod rten/ /'dab chags rnams ni mkha' la rten/ /rnam par sgom pa chos la rten/ /dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la rten/ /ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas/ bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing
90b7('dul ba): gshegs te mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
90b8('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas yang dag par
91a1('dul ba): rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
91a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ga
91a3('dul ba): ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo zhes bya ba nas nor bu'i chu snod bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshod gsol ba dus tshod gsol du bcug go/ /ji tsam na bu mo mngag gzhug ma de sngon gyi kun dga'
91a4('dul ba): ra bar song nas sgo gseb nas bltas na dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang
91a5('dul ba): 'dir btab bo snyam nas/ de rings pa rings pas 'ongs te smras pa/ jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig /'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lags so/ /sa ga mas
91a6('dul ba): bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gdugs tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong sgren mo rnams mthong ngo snyam nas/
91a7('dul ba): des dus tshod gsol ba'i skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/ des btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin
91a8('dul ba): nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te/ glo
91b1('dul ba): bur pa la stsal ba dang / 'chi bar chas pa la stsal ba dang / bro 'tshal ba la stsal ba dang / bro g.yog la stsal ba dang / stsang nas kyi 'jams nar ma dang / sman nar ma dang / dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong
91b2('dul ba): ma rnams la khrus ras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa ga ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang / lam
91b3('dul ba): srang mi mkhas pa lags pas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de thugs su chud de legs so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa
91b4('dul ba): sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong mchi bar chas pa bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na 'dron pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur zhing tshogs dang bral na phongs par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na tshogs dang 'bral bar mi
91b5('dul ba): 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na nyon mongs pa 'am 'gum
91b6('dul ba): par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyod na bro nad las ldang ba dang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong
91b7('dul ba): na nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na bro 'tshal ba'i bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na 'grub par
91b8('dul ba): 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang mchis/ drod che ba yang
92a1('dul ba): mchis te/ de la re shig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nas thug 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/ drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nyam skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs
92a2('dul ba): so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams las bro nad mang ba dang bro nad nyung ba mchis te/ de la bro nad mang po gang lags pa de rnams la ni re zhig
92a3('dul ba): 'tshal ches/ bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/
92a4('dul ba): dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin/ btsun pa de ring kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag gzhug bgyid pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byas pa mthong nas/ de slar mchis
92a5('dul ba): te bdag la 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab bo zhes mchi bas de rnams dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyis bkab par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma de yang thugs su chud de
92a6('dul ba): legs so legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras sbyin/ btsun pa dus 'di gcig na khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dag dge slong ma rab tu mang po rnams chu bo gnas ldan la sgren mor khrus
92a7('dul ba): bgyid pa las khyim pa mo de rnams kyis bgad cing bgad nas mdzub ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi 'doms nye bar ston te/ de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams bag 'khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus ras
92a8('dul ba): kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag
92b1('dul ba): par snang zhing 'di dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes tshad gzung bar
92b2('dul ba): mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus so/ /btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de snga nas dge slong
92b3('dul ba): 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba/ re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun
92b4('dul ba): du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos te/ de mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar yang mchi bar 'gyur la/ des bdag gi glo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes
92b5('dul ba): bya ba nas/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras longs spyod par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba'i bar de thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par
92b6('dul ba): 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig
92b7('dul ba): rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar mchi la/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang /
92b8('dul ba): dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni
93a1('dul ba): tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar mchi la/ des bdag gi
93a2('dul ba): glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur
93a3('dul ba): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung
93a4('dul ba): bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang mchi la/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang
93a5('dul ba): dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag
93a6('dul ba): par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang
93a7('dul ba): na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /de nas com ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs chos
93a8('dul ba): gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed
93b1('dul ba): do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du
93b2('dul ba): dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang / sha dang / khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas
93b3('dul ba): yangs pa can du bsod snyoms spyad de/ zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhos su phab nas zhabs bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang
93b4('dul ba): du zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
93b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dir nga snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang
93b6('dul ba): bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod
93b7('dul ba): nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do/ /dge slong dag dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyod pa dang / dus su spyod pa dang / skabs skabs su spyod pa dang / brtags te spyod pa
93b8('dul ba): dang / cung zad spyod pa ni legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyad par bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas
94a1('dul ba): mal la gding ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos na de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham
94a2('dul ba): thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab nag por gyur pa zhig
94a3('dul ba): rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha bi mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo mi pha bi ni yang dag par
94a4('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding ba dang / shur bu dang / rgya chang dang / lcug gu'i gding bas bting nas
94a5('dul ba): longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to/ /da dung yang rgyab nag por gyur to zhes rig par mdzad nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas nang du yang dag 'jog las
94a6('dul ba): bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring nga
94a7('dul ba): snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab
94a8('dul ba): la dge slong du gyur pa las de na des dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong
94b1('dul ba): rnams kyis deng phyin chad ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ stug
94b2('dul ba): na ni rim gcig gis so/ /seng ba zhig na rim gnyis kyis so/ /dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas
94b3('dul ba): byed/ kha zer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po 'am/ 'dam ka 'am/ kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gris dras pa bcang bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas
94b4('dul ba): de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag gis reg nas dri mi zhim la sbrang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i
94b5('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste g.yan pa dgab pa bcang bar bya ste/ zhag lnga 'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o/ /gzhan
94b6('dul ba): du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mdze'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / khyams dang / rdzing dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chag sa rnams dang / shing drung gi gnas rnams na dri mi zhim pa dang /
94b7('dul ba): sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyad par byed pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
94b8('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la
95a1('dul ba): longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang / ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab khungs dang / snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya ste/ dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim gro bya'o/ /
95a2('dul ba): dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
95a3('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcang du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo / /btsun pa mon dar gyi chos gos la chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas
95a4('dul ba): chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ci dgar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal dang sha na'i ras la yang rung ngo // // sdom la/ gso ma skra'i chos gos dang / /gcer bu skra 'bal lo ma'i gos/ /
95a5('dul ba): mthang gos can dang g.yang gzhi dang / /gso ras seng ba pa char sngo/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
95a6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti
95a7('dul ba): mug 'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das
95a8('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag skra'i chos gos bcang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags so zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong
95b1('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di
95b2('dul ba): ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod gcer bu byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o/ /byas na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang
95b3('dul ba): ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par gyur to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te
95b4('dul ba): nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba ngang
95b5('dul ba): pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lo zhes yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur te so so nas bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /
95b6('dul ba): des rma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di ni bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro/ /de la bzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyim thab tu bdams so zhes smras pa dang / des mjug ma bsgrengs nas gar byed par brtsams pa de yul 'khor skyong
95b7('dul ba): gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so/ /des smras pa/ ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi ldan pas 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no zhes pa rma bya des thos nas
95b8('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang / /'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ /nor bu bai dUr+ya dang 'dra gyur na/ /ci slad khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi stsal/ /
96a1('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang / /'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ /nor bu bai dUr+ya dang 'dra gyur kyang / /'dzem med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du
96a2('dul ba): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid de/ de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas bya'i tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo / /da ltar yang 'dis gcer
96a3('dul ba): bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo / /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'dreg par rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod skra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ skra 'bal ba 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/ /de lta bas na dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o/ /'bal na 'gal
96a5('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i
96a6('dul ba): brtul zhugs yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho
96a7('dul ba): bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis bla gos mthang
96a8('dul ba): gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o/ /'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag g.yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /
96b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
96b2('dul ba): to/ /btsun pa bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /
96b3('dul ba): yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ pa char 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas
96b4('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
96b5('dul ba): pa/ 'di ni khyim pa 'chang bar byed do/ /de lta bas na dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad ser ba 'am/
96b6('dul ba): thams cad dmar ba 'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// // sdom la/ kha tshar ring dang gdengs ka dang / /ral ka gtsug tor thod dang ni/ /ra bal gos dang rnga bal klam/ /mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas/ /yang
96b7('dul ba): dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /
96b8('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag kha tshar gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal
97a1('dul ba): lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan
97a2('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ral ka 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya
97a3('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i
97a4('dul ba): rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag thod 'ching bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
97a5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
97a6('dul ba): btsun pa bdag ra bal gyi gos bcang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
97a7('dul ba): du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim
97a8('dul ba): pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te snam
97b1('dul ba): sbyar med par de phyi rol du byung ba dang / de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca'
97b2('dul ba): zhing snam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mchin nad can na ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i
97b3('dul ba): spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos dang bla gos su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni lnga ste/ dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa dang / char bab
97b4('dul ba): pa dang / char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o/ /bar sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi/ /
97b5('dul ba): byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/ /rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang / /dge 'dun rnyed dang de de'i yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye
97b6('dul ba): byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dong ba dang de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o/ /ma bcol ba'i dge slong
97b7('dul ba): gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
97b8('dul ba): bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o/ /dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
98a1('dul ba): de rnams kyi mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'gyed par byed pa na rnyed pa chung ngu yin no snyam nas/ dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba
98a2('dul ba): de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis ma bcol bar dong ba dang de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi
98a3('dul ba): bya'o/ /rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor ma chog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcol bas rnyed pa
98a4('dul ba): chung ngu ma blangs na ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o/ /ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na ras yug brgya
98a5('dul ba): 'bul lo/ /de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis zhig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras
98a6('dul ba): yug brgya bskur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na yir 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na long
98a7('dul ba): shig / des smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la de
98a8('dul ba): rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o/ /gos rnams sus bsrung gang gzhon pas so/ /de ltar mi nus kyis gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o/ /gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams
98b1('dul ba): bsrung ngo / /de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo / /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo re mos re mos mi stongs par byed pa yin
98b2('dul ba): pas nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi sgo na 'dug pa des rgyang ring po kho na nas mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas gnas
98b3('dul ba): brtan byon pa legs so byon pa legs so/ /slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /des bsams pa/ 'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs
98b4('dul ba): khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri 'or che ge mo zhig nas so/ /ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do/ /ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / khyod don
98b5('dul ba): ci zhig la 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro/ /gal te de lta na nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ /slob dpon legs so/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan
98b6('dul ba): du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de ngal sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis nam
98b7('dul ba): sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do/ /de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i
98b8('dul ba): 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byas so/ /de nas de nang par sngar langs te/ rgan zhugs de khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i rgan
99a1('dul ba): zhugs gcig shos des 'ongs pa legs so zhes kun dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig smras nas de gnyis ngal sos pa dang khong gsum char yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig /gnas
99a2('dul ba): brtan bgo'o/ /nye dgas rgan zhugs gcig la smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig /gnas brtan bdag ni mi 'gyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo / /gcig shos la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs
99a3('dul ba): khyod kyis bgos shig / des kyang de bzhin du smras pa/ nye dgas smras pa/ khyed ni nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsams pa/ rgan
99a4('dul ba): zhugs 'di gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam nas de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis gtsug
99a5('dul ba): lag khang du rtag par chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/ /rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob pa na lta nye dgas gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag
99a6('dul ba): dar bya'o/ /'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des
99a7('dul ba): na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o/ /des de gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/
99a8('dul ba): gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so/ /rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lta nye dgas 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bas dus thams cad du chos
99b1('dul ba): bshad do/ /rnyed pa gang chung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
99b2('dul ba): phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs
99b3('dul ba): par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ /de lta bas na gtsug lag khang phyag dar byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga'
99b4('dul ba): bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to/ /de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi bya'o/ /de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de gnyis spobs
99b5('dul ba): ba med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o/ /de gnyis kyis sngar sma phab pas smras pa
99b6('dul ba): gnas brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig / de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go/ /de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bzhag nas gsol bar bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs
99b7('dul ba): khyed nyon cig / khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig /'di gnyis dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo/ /'di ni gsol ba 'o/ /de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so/ /cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang de gnyis kyis
99b8('dul ba): smras pa/ gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig /des bgo bar brtsams nas de nas ras yug gcig kha khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams
100a1('dul ba): bam por bcings te song ngo / /de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang de rnams kyis
100a2('dul ba): smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci
100a3('dul ba): byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/ /thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the
100a4('dul ba): tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig
100a5('dul ba): tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyid nyon gcig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngogs shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon
100a6('dul ba): par 'gyur zhing gang gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do/ /de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o/ /gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o/ /
100a7('dul ba): de na gcig ni chur song ngo / /gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la bton nas de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do/ /chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so/ /ji tsam na nya'i phung
100a8('dul ba): po chen por gyur pa dang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis bgos shig /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi bgod do/ /ci'i phyir bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo / /des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no/ /de gnyis
100b1('dul ba): sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/ dzi tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa tsha bo dag ci ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug /zhang po bdag cag ni nya rnyed pas so/ /ci ste mi 'gyed/ zhang po nyes
100b2('dul ba): pas 'jigs so/ /khyod ni nyes pas 'jigs pa bzhin rgyas ni rkang pa spyi tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis sdong gis dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de
100b3('dul ba): gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa ru sbal zhig mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag chur zhugs te/ bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams bsrogs te skam la 'thon pa dang
100b4('dul ba): 'dis bsad do/ /tsha bo gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu'i nang du 'gro'o/ /skam la 'gro ba de ni sdong dum gyis 'jigs pa dang / tsher mas 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa dang / me'i
100b5('dul ba): 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do/ /gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na/ khyod kyis bsrogs kyang ci phan/ mdor na 'dis nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang
100b6('dul ba): bar mi bya'o/ /de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag gis skam la song ste bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams
100b7('dul ba): bsad do/ /tsha bo gal te skam la song bas cung zad thob na lta bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o/ /chur 'gro ba de ni dba' glong gis 'jigs pa dang / ru sbal gyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin
100b8('dul ba): kum bi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do/ /gzhan yang gal te des ma bsrogs na khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de'i mthu yin pas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste 'khang bar mi
101a1('dul ba): bya'o/ /de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do/ /de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ zhang po ci
101a2('dul ba): dgyes pa bzhin du mdzod cig / bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/ nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig tu byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas
101a3('dul ba): mjug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o/ /bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ /de ni chos la gnas pas bkur/ /bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no snyam nas/ des nya chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer
101a4('dul ba): te ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ /mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i/ /nya bo che zhig thogs nas ni/ /shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs/ /
101a5('dul ba): des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing / /chos dang chos min mi shes pa'i/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar/ /des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pa blta na sdug pa khyod/ /
101a6('dul ba): pha rol mnan pa shin tu legs/ /de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la/ /khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin no/ /sram gnyis po gang yin
101a7('dul ba): pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong
101a8('dul ba): brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo/ /ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag
101b1('dul ba): che ge mo zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de las ras yug gcig ma grub na bdag nye dga' ma yin no snyam nas de mgron
101b2('dul ba): du ma bos bzhin du song ngo / /khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas ras rnams 'brim pa na/ nye dgas ras yug cig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo / /ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do/ /khyim bdag gis smras
101b3('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal te mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de lta su zhig byed/ 'on kyang
101b4('dul ba): btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag bdag gis spyan ma drangs so/ /des ras de khyer nas song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
101b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong dag 'gron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob
101b6('dul ba): rgyal mi bya'o/ /thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan
101b7('dul ba): gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye dgas mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byas pa de
101b8('dul ba): nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam
102a1('dul ba): mo/ /de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze rgan po zhig yod pa des thos nas de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo / /bram zes ras rnams 'brim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u
102a2('dul ba): gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su shig bgyid/ 'on kyang
102a3('dul ba): khyod kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis 'gron du ma bos so/ /des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo / bram ze des smad par brtsams so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze rgan po gang
102a4('dul ba): yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron du ma bos so/ /da lta na yang ngo / /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag gcig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas
102a5('dul ba): der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de ldang ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed do/ /gtsug lag khang de ni sa phyogs dben zhing
102a6('dul ba): bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par
102a7('dul ba): byas pa yin no/ /ji tsam na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par
102a8('dul ba): gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas de nang par sngar langs te song ngo / /dge slong de 'dzem bag can zhig pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma
102b1('dul ba): blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis ba'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas
102b2('dul ba): par dam bcas par gyur kyang / der gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu 'am phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste de la
102b3('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / // sdom la/ bye ba rnams la skal ba ni/ /sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/ /dge 'dun gyi ni chos gos kyi/ /rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o// //gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba
102b4('dul ba): 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no/ /kha cig la ni mi sbyin no/ /gang la
102b5('dul ba): stsal bar bgyi/ chos dang 'thun pa'i phyogs la'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no/ /kha cig la
102b6('dul ba): ni mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/ /btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no/ /kha cig la ni
102b7('dul ba): mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/ /ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las
102b8('dul ba): gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang khyim bdag des zas byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo / /ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len
103a1('dul ba): dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las ri 'or de nyid du phyin nas khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan
103a2('dul ba): pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyis de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/
103a3('dul ba): des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do/ /de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad
103a4('dul ba): po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa dang / dge 'dun gyir brtags pa dang / dge slong gir brtags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang /
103a5('dul ba): so sor bstan pa'o/ /mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i
103a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi yin no/ /de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin no/ /gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid
103a7('dul ba): kyis de'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca'
103a8('dul ba): ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ /kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go/ /lam chen po dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni spyi'i yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las gal te bram ze dang khyim
103b1('dul ba): bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe
103b2('dul ba): na dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul na rnyed pa gang dbang bar
103b3('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/
103b4('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa nyid la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/
103b5('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la
103b6('dul ba): rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na 'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan
103b7('dul ba): pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong
103b8('dul ba): rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma
104a1('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang /
104a2('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma
104a3('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas shes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas zhes bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o/ /gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis lam
104a4('dul ba): po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/
104a5('dul ba): gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar
104a6('dul ba): 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs
104a7('dul ba): na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams
104a8('dul ba): kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa
104b1('dul ba): rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/
104b2('dul ba): rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul
104b3('dul ba): la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams
104b4('dul ba): la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su khas dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar
104b5('dul ba): rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mtha' nyid du chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o/ /ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed
104b6('dul ba): pa zhes bya'o/ /rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun
104b7('dul ba): gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas
104b8('dul ba): khang pa'i 'o/ /yang thog pa'i 'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes brtags pa ni de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i
105a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa ste/ 'di ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /mngon sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /
105a2('dul ba): so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltams pa dang / byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal te mchod rten chen po bzhir 'khyer mi nus na mchod rten gcig kho na la dbul gyi
105a3('dul ba): gzhan la n-i ma yin pa ste/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// // sdom la/ gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang / /bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang / /gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / /dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod
105a4('dul ba): na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig
105a5('dul ba): gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye ba 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/ /btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum na rnyed pa gang dbang
105a6('dul ba): bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o/ /gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni nyung ba las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du
105a7('dul ba): gnas pa rnams kho na'o/ /btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang
105a8('dul ba): bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/ /gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pa las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig
105b1('dul ba): shos so/ /gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa gum na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o/ /dam bcas pa
105b2('dul ba): rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long cig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged
105b3('dul ba): par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'gyed par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi
105b4('dul ba): dge 'dun la bsngo ba byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung
105b5('dul ba): bar shi nas dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /
105b6('dul ba): dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'god par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin
105b7('dul ba): no/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya
105b8('dul ba): gtang bar bya'o/ /khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos
106a1('dul ba): pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/
106a2('dul ba): dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shi na dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /khas blangs
106a3('dul ba): pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i
106a4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis
106a5('dul ba): de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /
106a6('dul ba): bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di
106a7('dul ba): skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig
106a8('dul ba): ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes
106b1('dul ba): par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la
106b2('dul ba): khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos
106b3('dul ba): pa legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam
106b4('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung bar shi na dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
106b5('dul ba): shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos
106b6('dul ba): pa yin no/ /bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// // sdom ni/ /nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brlab/ /bar ma sbyin dang
106b7('dul ba): blang bya dang / /bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / /spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /nye dga'i spyi bor phol mig cig byung nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa mar
106b8('dul ba): khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te de ring kho na 'thungs na de ring nyid du sos par 'gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang bar ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re shig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar bya'o snyam du shes
107a1('dul ba): nas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kun tu mngags pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang rma g.yog pa'i gos phal mo che bslangs so/ /phyi de nyin par sman pas dris pa/
107a2('dul ba): 'phags pa khyod snyun gdangs sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so/ /'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis deng nyis gyur tu gsol cig /des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/
107a3('dul ba): sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po thos lags so/ /kho bo'i nad 'di ni cher skyes par gyur te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du dgos kyis slongs shig /de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che bslangs so/ /de sang gi
107a4('dul ba): thabs la chags par gyur pas nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs pas de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to/ /ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so/ /'phags pa ma legs pa
107a5('dul ba): shig bgyis so/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs de ring ni sum gyur tu btung ngo / /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par gyur kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba
107a6('dul ba): khyod kyi mgul pa rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nas khros te song ngo / /de nas nye dgas mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las ma zhu nas shi'o/ /de la gser mang du yod de/
107a7('dul ba): cha gcig ni chos gos las so/ /cha gnyis pa ni nad kyi rkyen sman las so/ /cha gsum pa ni rdungs su byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa
107a8('dul ba): nye dga' gum pa las de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri mchis kyis de la bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig /dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu dong ngo / /
107b1('dul ba): de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo/ /dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
107b2('dul ba): gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe khyod rgyal
107b3('dul ba): po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba 'am bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang /
107b4('dul ba): na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na ba la rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig gal te ma bgyis so zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems
107b5('dul ba): las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig / rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas gtogs 'dod thong shig ces smros shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
107b6('dul ba): 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi
107b7('dul ba): ste/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong nye dga'
107b8('dul ba): shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig / dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste bsgyur nas bgos so/ /gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye dga' shi nas de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis bgos
108a1('dul ba): so zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de
108a2('dul ba): dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so/ /yangs pa can pa dang / bA rA Na sI ba dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams
108a3('dul ba): 'dus so/ /dge slong rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo
108a4('dul ba): ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gaN DI dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol ba'o/ /shi ba'i gaN DI rdung ba na 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la
108a5('dul ba): phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'brim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol bar byas te bgos na mi 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes
108a6('dul ba): bya ba nas dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol ba bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
