108a7('dul ba): gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong
108a8('dul ba): nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlab bo/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste gsol ba'o/ /gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa
108b1('dul ba): gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gang na dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi 'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi
108b2('dul ba): lags/ nye ba 'khor thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon
108b3('dul ba): pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gsol ba 'am thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom
108b4('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar
108b5('dul ba): 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os par chags pas shi ba de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song
108b6('dul ba): nas rngon pas de srog dang phral lo/ /ji tsam na ma stes te chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri 'or zhig bcom nas phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo / /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di
108b7('dul ba): rnyed kyis nyis brgya lnga bcus ni glang po che'i sha bcad la btso'o/ /nyis brgya lnga bcus ni chu blang ngo / /de na glang po che'i sha gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas rkun
108b8('dul ba): rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la lhag ma dug gi sung gdab bo/ /de dag gis sha dug can zos pa dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas lhag ma
109a1('dul ba): dug gis btab bo/ /gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas gang dag gis ni sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la/ gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag
109a2('dul ba): gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed
109a3('dul ba): pa phal mo che yod kyis rim bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' bar brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog mas rkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to/ /lhas tshigs su bcad
109a4('dul ba): pas smras pa/ bsags par yang ni bya ba ste/ /lhag par bsags par mi bya'o/ /sogs la chags pa'i wa long ba/ /gzhu yis bsad par gyur la ltos/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni nye
109a5('dul ba): dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi'o/ /da ltar yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to// //gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa
109a6('dul ba): de dge slong gis rim gro byas na 'on kyang shi bar gyur nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to/ /de nas gos 'ged pas rim gro byed
109a7('dul ba): pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis rgyud ngan pa byas te chos gos ma bkrus kyis khrus shig /des smras pa/ yo byad ni khyod 'ged na kho bo 'khru 'am/ khyod nyid kyis khrus shig /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
109a8('dul ba): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o/ /gal te nad g.yog mang bar gyur na thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong shes nyen dang bsod nams chen
109b1('dul ba): po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi nas de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul gyi yo byad dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes des
109b2('dul ba): bdams shing bdams shing bzang po rnams blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par
109b3('dul ba): mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma rnams las sbyin par bya'o/ /nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar
109b4('dul ba): brtag par bya'o/ /de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas dge slong zhig
109b5('dul ba): la smras pa/ re shig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig /kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig /des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las ji tsam na dge slong de shi'o/ /de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/
109b6('dul ba): dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyis phul cig /des smras pa/ des kho bo la ci bder byed du bcug go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
109b7('dul ba): dag de gson pa'i tshe nyid na ma byin na shi nas sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug
109b8('dul ba): bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas des lus kyi gnas la brtags te rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyis bdag gi ched du mchod pa gyis shig /des khas blangs pa las de shi nas ngan song
110a1('dul ba): rnams su skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la ji skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / dge slong dag dge
110a2('dul ba): slong de log par lhung ngo / /gal te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum la mchod par byas par gyur dang dad pa skyes pas log par lhung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig /de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs
110a3('dul ba): par spyod pa na na yal bar mi bzhag ste/ nad g.yog sbyin par bya'o/ /des de la dris te/ gal te de la sman med na yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o/ /gal te grub na de lta na legs/ ji ste ma grub na dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no/ /ji ste de yang ma grub na de
110a4('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing rim gro byed pas bsgyur nas rim gro dang ston pa mchod par bya'o/ /sos par gyur na de la 'di
110a5('dul ba): ni sangs rgyas kyi yin te khyod kyi yo byad du spyad do zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te de la 'byor pa yod na des 'bad de bsab par bya'o/ /gal te med na de ni spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod
110a6('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong nad kyis thebs pa sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba tshor bas nyen pa zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la smras
110a7('dul ba): pa/ kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig /des ma byin pa dang de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pas shi nas de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so/ /dge slong rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas bsregs te gtsug lag
110a8('dul ba): khang du lhags nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so/ /gos 'ged pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la
110b1('dul ba): dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed gzhag pa'i snod ma dbye shig / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgo zhig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis phye ba dang sbrul
110b2('dul ba): zhig mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi sgras bslang nas bka' stsal pa/ mi gti mug can lhung bzed 'di spongs la song shig /dge slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro/ /de 'khrugs nas
110b3('dul ba): ci dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste nags stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/ des der khros pa'i me sbar pas nags de rab tu 'bar te de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan
110b4('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag srid pa thams cad la skrag par gyis shig /srid pa'i yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig gi lus de gnas gsum po nags stug por bros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems
110b5('dul ba): can dmyal ba'i dang / dur khrod du me phal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o/ /de lta bas na dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing gang la skye ba de yongs su spang par bya'o/ /ma spangs na 'gal
110b6('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad slong na rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar sbyin par bya'o/ /ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi
110b7('dul ba): nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /gos 'ged pas lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo'o zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/
110b8('dul ba): re shig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/ de sngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re shig thog mar dge slong gi ro
111a1('dul ba): phyung nas phyi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o/ / //gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong zhig shi nas dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste/ dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas gtsug lag khang du lhags te/ gos
111a2('dul ba): 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ des smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i ro la mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged par
111a3('dul ba): byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i ro la mchod pa byas la de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang nyes
111a4('dul ba): dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro/ / //gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer te ro la mchod pa byas bsregs nas de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'ged
111a5('dul ba): p as de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las des dbyug pa blang te langs nas re shig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
111a6('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// // sdom la/ /nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang / /dngos po'i skyin pa lag gi bla/ /
111a7('dul ba): mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang / /pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o// //gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las dge slong gi dge 'dun
111a8('dul ba): lhags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te
111b1('dul ba): lnga po gang gis zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa dang gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca'
111b2('dul ba): bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
111b3('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang / spyil bo nas spyil bo dang 'chag sa nas 'chag sa rnams su 'chag
111b4('dul ba): cing gshegs pa na gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der byon pa dang / de na dge slong nad tshabs che ba shes pa chung ba rang gi gcin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la mgon
111b5('dul ba): ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung na ci'i phyir de skad du bcom
111b6('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchis so zhes ngu skad 'don/ btsun pa bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa 'am lta ba ma mchis so/ /dge slong khyod
111b7('dul ba): kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lags so/ /de bas na khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho
111b8('dul ba): chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ong zhing ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig ces 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad pa
112a1('dul ba): de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus
112a2('dul ba): gser gyi ril ba bkang ste ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o/ /
112a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no/ /gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la lha rnams ni gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug shig /ngas ni 'di'i
112a4('dul ba): rim gro bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas
112a5('dul ba): dge slong de bzung ste gcin dang ngan skyugs nas phyung nas mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/ smyug gi tshal pas bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril phyis byas te bkrus so/ /de nas skyil mo dkrung 'char bcug ste/ de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te/ phyogs de yang
112a6('dul ba): ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do/ /de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nang pa la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ gtsug lag khang
112a7('dul ba): du zhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms bsnoms nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge
112a8('dul ba): slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin
112b1('dul ba): pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo cig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs
112b2('dul ba): par tshim par bgyis lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de la bsod
112b3('dul ba): snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la zos nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de/ bsod snyoms phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do zhes gyis shig /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
112b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu drug pa/ de nas dge slong de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni khams
112b5('dul ba): gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad de/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gis bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas le los dus 'das par byed pa ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/ ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar
112b6('dul ba): sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ des nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa
112b7('dul ba): dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur to/ /dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/
112b8('dul ba): bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/
113a1('dul ba): srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
113a2('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag la ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/ pha med/ rtsa lag gzhan med do/ /de lta bas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams
113a3('dul ba): kyis phan tshun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni lhan cig gnas pa'i 'o/ /lhan cig gnas pas ni mkhan po'i 'o/ /slob dpon gyis ni nye gnas kyi'o/ /nye gnas kyis ni slob dpon gyi'o/ /mkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig pa'i 'o/ /
113a4('dul ba): slob dpon gcig pas ni slob dpon gcig pa'i 'o/ /gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa'i 'o/ /phebs par smra bas ni phebs par smra ba'i 'o/ /smos 'drin gyis ni smos 'drin gyi'o/ /'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni dge
113a5('dul ba): 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ mang po sbyin te mthar na dge 'dun kun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
113a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig
113a7('dul ba): tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ shing
113a8('dul ba): sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/ /des slob ma'i rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/
113b1('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byas so/ /da ltar yang byas so/ /gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus
113b2('dul ba): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par yang nad pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa rnams la byams
113b3('dul ba): par byed pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/
113b4('dul ba): de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med de/ nad pa rnams la ni khyad par du byed do/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /rgyal pos sman
113b5('dul ba): pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag dpyad byos shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di'i sman ni dkon lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lha gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang
113b6('dul ba): khro ma myong ba de'i khrag las nas thug bgyis te zla ba drug tu stsal na de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi gzhan gyis ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de'i sman dkon pa ni bden no/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams
113b7('dul ba): na bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par dka' bar gyur nas des ma ma la dri bar brtsams pa/ ma ma nga dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon lan 'ga' yang khros pa yod dam gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi pang du byon pa de nas bdag kyang
113b8('dul ba): sngon su la yang lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa/ yum bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon su la yang 'ga' la khros pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu khyod
114a1('dul ba): gang gi tshe bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang su la yang khro ma myong na khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos/ des bsams pa/ sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas des sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag ngas rang la
114a2('dul ba): brtags na nga sngon su la yang khro ma myong bas nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtor cig / lha bdag cag ni mi phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang de
114a3('dul ba): rnams la mkhas pa yin pas rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar te/ khrag des zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la nas thug blud pas sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid
114a4('dul ba): yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan yang shi bi'i bu gzhog phyed skams par gyur nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu'i dpyad gyis shig /
114a5('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol cig /lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad bsogs na 'di'i yang shang shang te'u yi sha ma rnyed do/ /sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag me long dang bya
114a6('dul ba): gag khyer te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du deng la der rnyi tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long zhog shig dang / bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin no snyam ste/ skad phyung ba dang / shang shang te'u yis bya gag gi skad
114a7('dul ba): thos nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de bzung ba'i thabs ni 'di yin no/ /de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas pa las ji tsam na las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs
114a8('dul ba): nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo / /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra shes pas srog chags shang shang te'u yis smras pa/ bdag gar bkri/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur
114b1('dul ba): pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ thong shig /thong shig /sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang rin po che rnams smra'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ re shig khyod kyis sman de dag ci 'dra ba bltas ston cig /des smras pa/ bdag gi
114b2('dul ba): khrus byas pa'i chu ni sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyis de khyer la dengs shig rin po che 'di dag yin no/ /de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor te shang shang te'u de nyid khyer te dong ba las rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho
114b3('dul ba): brang du phyin nas de rnams kyis srog chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos shang shang te'u la dris pa dang smras pa/ lha bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du
114b4('dul ba): bgyid pa lags so/ /rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos bkang bar bzhag go/ /ji tsam na de de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos pas de srid du khrus byas nas/ de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang mod la 'phur te khang
114b5('dul ba): pa'i steng du 'dug nas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang / bral nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ re shig thog ma bdag blun te/ /phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go/ /de nas rgyal po blun pa ste/ /blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par
114b6('dul ba): rdzogs/ /zhes smras nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag shang shang te'u yi khrus byas pa'i chu de sha'i mthu yod par byed pa bden nam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mad lags
114b7('dul ba): kyis mar dang sgrol cig / de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos te rgyal po'i bu la blud par zhugs so/ /ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas pa las de na gcig gzhogs phyed skams par gyur te/
114b8('dul ba): de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ljongs su song la sman pa la smos te sman sten cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba skye bo mang po'i
115a1('dul ba): yid du mi 'ong ba sems can thams cad kyi thung mong gi chos 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/ bdag nad dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na ci'i phyir grong khyer gyi mthar 'gro de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lta
115a2('dul ba): mod kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sogs so/ /ji tsam du bsod nams mang po bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris su yun ring du dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes de de
115a3('dul ba): rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs su babs te/ rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin to/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis
115a4('dul ba): sman ston cig / des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos pa mchis kyis bzhud la slongs shig dang / gal te skal ba'i
115a5('dul ba): khyad par can gyis bcud de thob na des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sgo kar bsdad de/ rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni slong ba po'i skye bo sbron du gzhug pa'i phyir sgor rgyun du dril 'dogs te/ gang gi
115a6('dul ba): tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol bar byed do/ /ci tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril te dkrol to/ /de nas rgyal po'i bus pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum slong ba po zhig mchis kyis ci zhig slong smros shig /de gnyis kyis
115a7('dul ba): smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsogs te btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re shig 'thung shig dang / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba smra'o/ /de ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas
115a8('dul ba): mar 'thung bar 'dod na slong ba po'i skye bo'i re bas lus kyi gnad du phog nas mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/ yab yum re shig slong ba po nang du ma bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos sgo ba la bsgo ba/ slong ba po nang du thong shig /de nang
115b1('dul ba): du zhugs pa dang rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang / sems dad pa dang / spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na la 'os kyi bdag la
115b2('dul ba): ma lags kyi dbul gyis bzhes shig / des lhung bzed bzed pa dang / rgyal po'i bu bsam pa drag pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
115b3('dul ba): pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal bu gzhon nu gang yin pa de ni nga
115b4('dul ba): nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na da lta lta smos kyang ci dgos/ btsun pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gnyis ka mnyam du bros thebs la mnyam du sos par gyur lags/ bcom ldan
115b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar gnas pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las
115b6('dul ba): dag byas shing bsags pas 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/
115b7('dul ba): chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las
115b8('dul ba): rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la bu gnyis yod pa
116a1('dul ba): las nu bo shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to/ /mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni khams kyi sgo nas shed 'phrod pa yin
116a2('dul ba): pas de gnyis phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal bus smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni thabs mchis kyis snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o/ /
116a3('dul ba): des smras pa/ de ltar bya ste gzhug gis smros shig /des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang khyod rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /des rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas des rgyal bu phu bo shos de sman ma yin pa byin nas zha bor gyur to/ /
116a4('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis de ni zha bor gyur to snyam nas nu bo shos rgyal por dbang bskur to/ /des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcug go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
116a5('dul ba): mdun na 'don dang lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing 'dug pa las rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo / /des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir phu bo zha bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /
116a6('dul ba): lha bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyis/ gal te lha dgyes na 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ gnang gis byos shig /des de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to/ /de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la bya
116a7('dul ba): ba byas nas smon lam gdab bar brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i
116a8('dul ba): las 'di'i rnam par smin pa nyams su mi myong bar gyur cig byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas de nyid yin no/ /
116b1('dul ba): de gnyis kyis gros byas nas rgyal bu gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du zha bor gyur to/ /yang 'gyod par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du sos par gyur to/ /dge
116b2('dul ba): slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba dang 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu
116b3('dul ba): gnag pa rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag
116b4('dul ba): tshong dpon zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de bu med cing
116b5('dul ba): bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi
116b6('dul ba): mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos 'thun pa'i lha dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba
116b7('dul ba): 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/ de ni de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur
116b8('dul ba): ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon sum du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par
117a1('dul ba): gyur pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag mngon sum du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho dang bu mo med pa de'i tshe lha thams cad spangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
117a2('dul ba): dad par gyur to/ /ji tsam na dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /bzhin bzangs de bzhin du gyis shig ces des de rim gyis skra bregs
117a3('dul ba): nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams pa las rims chen pos thebs nas rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
117a4('dul ba): re shig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing de'i rim gro bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sus bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
117a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams dang sman pas so/ /sman pa rnams kyis nyin par sman byas na mtshan mo nad la phan par gyur to/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di'i dpyad bdag gis gdugs la bgyis na mtshan mo bro la phan par gyur
117a6('dul ba): gyis/ gal te 'di khyim du bskyal na bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad bgyi'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim du skyol la der
117a7('dul ba): yang de'i rim gro byed pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas de'i skra ring po ring por skyes pas khyim bdag de khyim bdag mgo reg ces par grags so/ /de gang gi tshe rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog
117a8('dul ba): dang 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/ slar lan par gyur pa de'i tshe des bdag ni 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang gi cha chod nas/ de na des 'chi ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs bu la bris te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro/ /de ni shi'o/ /
117b1('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis par gum ste/ de la dbyig dang / gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / go cha la sogs te phal mo che zhig
117b2('dul ba): mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa nye dga' dbang ba glegs bu la ma bris pa yang ngas ma thob na glegs bu la bris pa
117b3('dul ba): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de long shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ci
117b4('dul ba): dag yod/ / //bar sdom la/ gzhi dang gnas mal gos dang ni/ /lcags nag lcags dang lham mkhan dang / /rdza mkhan 'dreg mkhan shing mkhan sogs/ /tshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang / /rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi
117b5('dul ba): dang / /zas dang btung ba sman dang ni/ /bran dang gding ba dpang rgya dag /ci rigs par ni bgo bar bya/ /dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang / /gzhan yang rdungs byas rdungs ma byas/ /dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo 'o zhes/ /
117b6('dul ba): drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci rigs par bgo bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang / tshong khang gi gzhi dang / gnas mal
117b7('dul ba): dang / lcags nag gi mkhar ba'i lag spyad dang / lcags mgar gyi lag spyad dang / rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho
117b8('dul ba): ba dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / 'bru rnams ni mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag par bya'o/ /ras yug dang / ras yug chen dang / ko sgro dang / mchil lham dang / 'bru mar gyi snod dang / ril ba dang / bya ma bum rnams ni dge
118a1('dul ba): 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o/ /mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o/ /thung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni khar sil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la
118a2('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o/ /khye'u dang bu mo ni dge 'dun gyis mi bsgyur te ci rigs pa zhig blangs nas ci bde bar gtang bar bya'o/ /rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / dre'u rnams ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o/ /ba lang dang /
118a3('dul ba): ma he dang / ra dang / lug rnams ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag ste mi bgo'o/ /'thab stan dang / go cha dang / gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa thams cad ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o/ /mtshon cha
118a4('dul ba): rnams bzhag la de rnams gre'u dang / khab dang / khar sil du brdungs te dge 'dun la brim par bya'o/ /tshon rnams las tshon rtsi chen po gang kus dang / mtshal dang / mthing shing la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi phyir dri
118a5('dul ba): gtsang khang du gzhag par bya'o/ /thod lo kor dang / btsag dang / rams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /chang ni yongs blugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/ tshwar gyur na longs spyad par bya'o/ /tshwar ma gyur na dor bar bya'o/ /
118a6('dul ba): dge slong dag nga ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyis chang mi sbyin zhing tha na rtswa mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo / /sman rnams ni nad khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing de nas dge slong nad pa rnams kyis longs spyad par bya'o/ /rin po che
118a7('dul ba): rnams las mu tig ma gtogs par nor bu dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba la sogs pa ni cha gnyis su byas te/ gcig ni chos la'o/ /gcig shos ni dge 'dun la'o/ /chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar
118a8('dul ba): bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /glegs bam rnams las sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi glegs bam rnams ni mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du zhugs
118b1('dul ba): par bya'o/ /phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos kyi glegs bam rnams ni btsongs la bgo bar bya'o/ /chags rgya ni myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni rdzas 'ged pa'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs
118b2('dul ba): bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhug par bya'o/ /gser dang / dbyig dang / gzhan yang rdungs su byas pa dang / rdungs su ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni cha gsum du byas te/ gcig ni sangs rgyas la'o/ /gnyis pa ni chos
118b3('dul ba): la'o/ /gsum pa ni dge 'dun la'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni dri gtsang khang dang dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi ral ba dang 'drums pa slar bcos par bya'o/ /chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/ /
118b4('dul ba): seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /gang gi tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis chu bzangs kyi dus ston btsugs pa de'i tshe de na/
118b5('dul ba): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dge slong khrums stod dge slong mas bkur ba yin pas chu bzangs kyi dus ston btsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang pos tshe dang
118b6('dul ba): ldan pa khrums stod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa chu bzangs kyi dus ston la spyan 'dren gyis gshegs so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la bcol/ dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis
118b7('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang / bdag cag gis gzhag par bgyi'o/ /des de rnams la gzhag pa dang de rnams kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos kyang tshe dang ldan pa
118b8('dul ba): kun dga' bo la'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang zhig tu gzhag go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod chu bzangs kyi dus ston la 'ongs pa dang / de na de dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa yin pas gcig gis smras pa/
119a1('dul ba): 'phags pa deng bdag gis zhal tshus bgyi'o/ /gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang g.yar tshus la bos so/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol cig /de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan
119a2('dul ba): dag gis kyang smras so/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis dus ma lags pa'i btung ba gsol cig /de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras nas des de rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir g.yar
119a3('dul ba): tshus rnams las cung zad cung zad blangs de bzhin du dro yang zos/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang de tseg tseg pa yor langs nas/ de yang lam gyis dub pa des mang por zos pa des ma zhu bar gyur te gsud de shi'o/ /
119a4('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /gos 'ged pas nad g.yog la smras pa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'on cig /des smras pa/ des
119a5('dul ba): bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lag tu bzhag go/ /de rnams la dris pa dang / smras pa bdag cag gis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lag tu bzhag go/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad
119a6('dul ba): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
119a7('dul ba): shi ba'i yo byad kyi skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gaN DI brdungs la dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis
119a8('dul ba): gsol bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham par byas la gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las
119b1('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge 'dun gtsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong khrums stod gum na de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos/ gos dang gos kyi rin dang bcas pa kun dga' bo'i sug pa na mchis kyis gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la
119b2('dul ba): bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stod gum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang chos gos dang gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo
119b3('dul ba): byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong yang gzhan du gum/ lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/ dngos po'i skyin
119b4('dul ba): pa yang gzhan na mchis na de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye ba 'khor dngos po'i skyin pa'i dge slong ngam khyim gang na yod pa'o/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o/ /
119b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad bsogs la ci 'dres
119b6('dul ba): sam ma 'dres par gyur pa de brtag par bya'o/ /gal te 'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni mchod rten gyir byas la/ mchod rten gyi ni dge 'dun gyir gyur na/ de lta bu chos dang mi mthun pa yin pas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dang gos kyi
119b7('dul ba): rin dang bcas pa la cha gsum du byas te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun no/ /dge 'dun gyi ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / dri gtsang khang dang mchod rten gyi lag gi sar
119b8('dul ba): spyad par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri rgyan par bya'o/ /gal te 'dres par ma gyur na thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
120a1('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong cig shi'o/ /de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug
120a2('dul ba): lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal ba 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ /gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dang / rtswa thun
120a3('dul ba): dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'ged par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de
120a4('dul ba): rnams kyis bsams pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar brtsams pa dang dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/
120a5('dul ba): de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa bzhin smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na zhes des 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
120a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes te shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo
120a7('dul ba): bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo
120a8('dul ba): bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gi 'du shes kyis 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig
120b1('dul ba): bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis kyis 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/
120b2('dul ba): gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gis lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na dge slong des gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad pa'i skabs
120b3('dul ba): de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong des yid bcugs par bya ba ma yin pa la yid gcugs par bskyed de/ 'di ltar gang gis
120b4('dul ba): bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad do/ /'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gis lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na gsang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur
120b5('dul ba): ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed na gang la bskur ba de ni shi la gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /
120b6('dul ba): gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na gang gis bskur ba de ni shi la gang gis bskur ba de'i
120b7('dul ba): shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs
120b8('dul ba): pas spyad na legs par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur ba na gang la bskur ba de ni shi la gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed
121a1('dul ba): na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na gang la
121a2('dul ba): bskur ba des slar bzlog la gang gis bskur ba de yang shi nas gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis
121a3('dul ba): brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de shi la/ gang gis skur bar byed pa de yang shi na/ de shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis
121a4('dul ba): brlabs pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so// // sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/ gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang / /
121a5('dul ba): rdol ba dang ni blings pa dang / /dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi/ /nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang / /dgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis te/ / gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa/ /ston pa lta bar 'dod pa na/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni ngal gyur pa/ /
121a6('dul ba): de la der ni chos gos gnang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas
121a7('dul ba): par dam bcas te dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing rngul gyis lus yog bzhin mnyan
121a8('dul ba): yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
121b1('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar
121b2('dul ba): mdzad de/ dge slong dag khyed da gzod ga nas 'ongs/ gnas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/ btsun pa bdag cag ni gnas bcas nas da gzod mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas bcas na dbyar mchis lags so/ /dge slong dag
121b3('dul ba): khyed cag gnas bcas su ci ga bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas sam/ bsod snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa mad par gsol te/ bdag cag gnas bcas su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsod
121b4('dul ba): snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags so/ /'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen bor tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing rngul gyis lus yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi
121b5('dul ba): ba na tshegs chen pos 'dir mchis pa lags so/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug bcu bdun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug po
121b6('dul ba): dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / lus rngul gyis yog pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyis/ ma la ngas dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos
121b7('dul ba): longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dge slong rnams la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar sra brkyang bting na phan yon lnga yod de zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang / zla ba las thal na ma yin pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang /
121b8('dul ba): bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang phan yon lnga yod de/ tshogs shing za na ma yin pa dang /
122a1('dul ba): yang yang za na ma yin pa dang / khyim rnams su mgron du ma bos par 'gro na ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring po nas dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed
122a2('dul ba): pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin
122a3('dul ba): pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /'di ltar sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu thal na ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting ba
122a4('dul ba): rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
122a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar bya'o/ /gding ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ re shig thog mar 'thun pa'i go bar bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar
122a6('dul ba): gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bgyi'o/ /de nas phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i
122a7('dul ba): tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas
122a8('dul ba): pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sra brkyang bgyis nas sra brkyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung
122b1('dul ba): na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/ chos gos 'dis dge
122b2('dul ba): 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so/ /des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/
122b3('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas
122b4('dul ba): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings so/ /des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams
122b5('dul ba): las gang dag chos gos 'di sra brkyang du bgyi zhing chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams
122b6('dul ba): dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad nas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings te/
122b7('dul ba): des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /
122b8('dul ba): de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya zhing bskos ba ni dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang /
123a1('dul ba): dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/ spo ba pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas
123a2('dul ba): mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o/ /gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang
123a3('dul ba): ma bting ba mi shes pa'o/ /yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug
123a4('dul ba): gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o/ /bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya
123a5('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro'am/ gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol bar byas te las
123a6('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar
123a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
123a8('dul ba): gsol/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spro na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang
123b1('dul ba): 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang
123b2('dul ba): nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas gsol bas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin
123b3('dul ba): par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab
123b4('dul ba): cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /ngas dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i
123b5('dul ba): chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ bkru'o/ /brkyang ngo / /dra'o/ /drub bo/ /kha bsgyur ro/ /chung ngu na khab kyis srubs gnyis sam/ gsum yang btsem par bya'o/ /
123b6('dul ba): lan gnyis sam gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcwa lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'dings kyis khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung shig /de nas sra
123b7('dul ba): brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis gtor zhing dri zhim po'i bdug pas bdugs nas gnas mal bshams te gaN DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams
123b8('dul ba): cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/
124a1('dul ba): bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro/ /gding ngo / /bting ngo / /de skad
124a2('dul ba): lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces gnas brtan dgongs su gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag ming
124a3('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos pa lags te/ bdag cag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting lags so zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des legs par bting ngo / /shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed
124a4('dul ba): pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo / /shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa
124a5('dul ba): dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te chab khung sar ma yin/ snabs phyi sar ma yin te/ tshang bar du 'jug par mi bya'o/ /
124a6('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o/ /sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal
124a7('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis dpyid zla ra ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcwa lnga la yang go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyis khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin
124a8('dul ba): gyis rlobs shig / de la rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig gi sra brkyang ma bting lags/ nye ba 'khor
124b1('dul ba): lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i 'o/ /gzhan yang
124b2('dul ba): 'di lnga'i ma bting ba yin te/ spo ba pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i 'o/ /btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la phan yon ma mchis
124b3('dul ba): lags/ nye ba 'khor lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma
124b4('dul ba): gyur pa'i 'o/ /gzhan yang lnga po 'di dag gi ste/ spo ba pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i 'o/ /btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis
124b5('dul ba): la phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye ba 'khor lnga'i ste/ ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / dbyar
124b6('dul ba): tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun bye na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i 'o/ /dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas de dag rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge
124b7('dul ba): slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /ji ga bde bar spyad dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig /bdag cag ni chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom
124b8('dul ba): mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra brkyang phyung na khyed la chos gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
125a1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na ngas rjes su gnang ste/ chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o/ /dbyung ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la
125a2('dul ba): gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
125a3('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod
125a4('dul ba): na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun
125a5('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ /gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag
125a6('dul ba): gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig /gang
125a7('dul ba): dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad de/ gang gi slad du mi gsung pas de de
125a8('dul ba): bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya ste/ bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal ba las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya'o// // sdom la/ rdol ba
125b1('dul ba): dang ni sril zos dang / /mtha' skor lhan rlo lhan rings dang / /gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang / /rnyings dang spangs dang dengs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chos gos
125b2('dul ba): rdol bas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo / /btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal ba dang / chos gos cha ga btab pa dang / chos gos lhan pa rlo bos btab pa dang / chos gos lhan
125b3('dul ba): rings can dang / gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos dang / chos gos zegs pa dang / chos gos rnyings pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos dengs pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung
125b4('dul ba): ngo / / // sdom la/ blings dang dus ma yin pa dang / /gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ /mi rung ba dang ma dras dang / /khru lngar ma chog mi bya dang / /blo 'thun min dang mi gding dang / /mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye
125b5('dul ba): 'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa blings pa'i chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo / /btsun pa dus ma lags pa'i
125b6('dul ba): chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang mthang gos dang / mi rung ba'i chos gos dang / ma dras pa dang / khru lngar ma mchis pa dang / blo 'thun par ma bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'ding ba
125b7('dul ba): ma bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu blo 'thun par bgyis pa'i chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'dings pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi
125b8('dul ba): rung ngo / / // sdom la/ dus kyi nang ni zla ba gsum/ /gsar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid/ /phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ras/ /gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ /btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding du
126a1('dul ba): rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor rung ngo / /btsun pa dgung zla gsum 'das nas dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor rung ngo / /chos gos
126a2('dul ba): sar pa rung ngo / /sar pa brtags pa rung ngo / /phongs pa'i chos gos rung ngo / /gso ma'i seng ras snam sbyar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor
126a3('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo / /bla gos dang mthang gos kyang de bzhin no// // sdom la/ gang zag gi dang khyim pa'i dang / /khru lnga pa dang khru lnga'i lhag /blo 'thun byas pa'i gding ba dang / /mtshams kyi
126a4('dul ba): nang nyid skye ba'o/ /btsun pa gang zag gi chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo / /gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na'o/ /khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo / /gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na
126a5('dul ba): rung ngo / /khru lnga pas rung ngo / /khru lnga las lhag pa rung ngo / /blo 'thun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'dings pas rung ngo / /mtshams kyi nang du blo 'thun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis
126a6('dul ba): rung ngo / /mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang 'dings pa bskos pas rung ngo / /ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra brkyang phyung bar gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ song ba dang / rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang /
126a7('dul ba): mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyis sra brkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos
126a8('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no/ /song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
126b1('dul ba): byas chos gos ma zin par chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs te/ phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba de'i ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/
126b2('dul ba): 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag slar mi 'ong ste 'on
126b3('dul ba): kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos
126b4('dul ba): gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /
126b5('dul ba): nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las
126b6('dul ba): de 'di snyam du sems te slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam nas/ des de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang / nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra
126b7('dul ba): brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun
126b8('dul ba): 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
127a1('dul ba): yin no/ /mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ong sam mi 'ong snyam pa las/ mtshams kyi phyi
127a2('dul ba): rol tu song ba de'i ni mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par
127a3('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de thams cad du chad pa de'i ni re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang
127a4('dul ba): zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang phyung ba nyams su myong ba de'i ni brgyad pa sra brkyang
127a5('dul ba): phyung ba nyid yin no/ / // sdom la/ ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang / /brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang / /re ba yod pa nyi shu dang / /re ba med pa nyi shu gcig /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
127a6('dul ba): byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra
127a7('dul ba): brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/
127a8('dul ba): slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol
127b1('dul ba): du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos
127b2('dul ba): ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas
127b3('dul ba): kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma
127b4('dul ba): zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
127b5('dul ba): phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems
127b6('dul ba): te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams
127b7('dul ba): kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting
127b8('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo
128a1('dul ba): zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin du phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin
128a2('dul ba): par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra
128a3('dul ba): brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o
128a4('dul ba): snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin bar mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las
128a5('dul ba): des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos
128a6('dul ba): gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang bar byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i
128a7('dul ba): mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/
128a8('dul ba): de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin
128b1('dul ba): par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
128b2('dul ba): phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas rtsom zhing
