230a8('dul ba): pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te grub na de lta na legs/ gal te ma grub par gyur na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o/ /gal te mi nus par
230b1('dul ba): gyur na ji tsam nus pa de tsam bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams gnas khang gis phongs par gyur nas/
230b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyis bgo bar bya ste/ chu snod gzhag pa dang / 'dag chal dang / sman dang / so shing gzhag pa dang / phan tshun gyi them skas ma gtogs par chung ngu na 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams cad
230b3('dul ba): kyis bgo bar bya ste/ nye 'khor ni spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dgon pa dang / shing drung dang / khang stong dang / ri sul dang / brag phug dang / rtswa'i stan dang / bla gab med pa dang / dur khrod dang /
230b4('dul ba): nags mtha' dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su bsam gtan gyis shig /phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe dge slong kha cig dgon pa par dam bcas
230b5('dul ba): nas dgon pa na gnas pa las/ de rnams de na chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to/ /gtogs nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas lung mnod pa dang / klag pa dang / gdon pa dang /
230b6('dul ba): rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnam kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /
230b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang / dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas sgo bcad
230b8('dul ba): de lde mig blangs nas song ba dang / dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag /phongs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gsal bar dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /nye dgas khyim bdag
231a1('dul ba): cig gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas/ de ni de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur pa gang zhig 'ongs pa de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni bdag nyid kyis khyer ro/ /ji tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa dang des gtsug lag
231a2('dul ba): khang stong par mthong nas des dris pa/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge slong nye dga'i yin no/ /de de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug la rnyed pa gang
231a3('dul ba): yin pa de ni kho bo'i yin no/ /de der gnas te des gtsug lag khang de lan 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byas/ ba'i lci ba gsar pa'i byug pas ma byugs so/ /de ji tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo / /dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs
231a4('dul ba): te des kyang nye dga' las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang / gtsug lag khang de phyag dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas der phyag dar byas nas phyag dar bor te phyags ma zin bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba
231a5('dul ba): dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyags ma lag na thogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/ phyags ma de mi bzhag gam/ des smras pa/ 'di na lag pa srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas
231a6('dul ba): pa lta ste/ des na phyags ma'i rjes kyang med do/ /des smras pa/ 'di na dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig gnas so/ /ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so/ /des smras pa/ rnyed pa ni nye dgas khyer la
231a7('dul ba): de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya 'am zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa su 'khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya'o/ /bcom
231a8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na/ khyim bdag gcig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/
231b1('dul ba): des de yon bsngo ba thos te de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug lag khang brtsig na/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam/ des smras pa/ rtsigs shig dang / legs par bsngo'o/ /
231b2('dul ba): ji tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig tu bcug nas des der ci yang ma bzhag go/ /de stong pa nyid du 'dug pa ji tsam na khyim bdag des mthong nas des gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag
231b3('dul ba): gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na de na su yang mi bzhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs mi snum pas so/ /khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa tshwa sgo can dgon dung la brtsigs pa la
231b4('dul ba): ga la snum par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de la bsams nas kho bo smra ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa da ni bdag gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug chen po bskon no/ /
231b5('dul ba): nye dgas rnyed pa thob bo snyam nas gral rim gyis bab pa na rang gi skal ba blangs nas de ni gzhan nyid na gnas te/ de ni stong par 'dug go/ /ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa des
231b6('dul ba): gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas/ des dge slong dag la dris pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yin mod kyi/ dge slong nye dga'i skal bar dbang ngo / /de nye dga'i
231b7('dul ba): drung du song nas khyod kyi skal ba'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin du byos shig /de de na gnas pa na bsod snyoms pa de mkhas pa snyom las mi byed pa zhig yin pas des de nyi ma re rer byug pa dang /
231b8('dul ba): phyag dar byas so/ /phyag dar byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i
232a1('dul ba): dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song
232a2('dul ba): ste smras pa des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang / phyag dar byed pa mthong nas de dad pa skyes te/ des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen
232a3('dul ba): bskon pa nye dgas thos nas de rings pa rings par song ste smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khang 'di kho bo'i skal ba yin gyis/ ras yug chen po kho bo la byin cig /bsod snyoms pas bsams pa/ chags pa'i bdag nyid
232a4('dul ba): can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'on kyang 'dis mthus khyer nas bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba
232a5('dul ba): 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa ni de kho na'i yin no/ /dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no/ /'jig rten ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang bu
232a6('dul ba): dang chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la mgron du 'bod par byed do/ /dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas
232a7('dul ba): la khyim rnams su dong ba dang ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bcad la lde mig blangs la dong bar bya'o/ /ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang
232a8('dul ba): lde mig byas te brkus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ma'i dge slong bzhag la dong bar bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par bya'o/ /ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/ des sgo phye
232b1('dul ba): zhes smras nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam/ rims med ces brda bya'o/ /gal te rims dang bcas so zhes zer na mi dbye'o/ /'on te rims med ces smra na dbye bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa
232b2('dul ba): pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
232b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lo ma ltar mnyen pa ni khyi yin te/ de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang / gtsug lag khang sder mos brud cing bshang ba dang
232b4('dul ba): lci bas ma rung bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyi srel ba'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi srel bas nang par sngar langs la mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug
232b5('dul ba): lag khang byul bar bya ste/ sder mos brud pa gang yin pa de snyam par bya'o/ /bshangs pa dang gcis pa yang phyag par bya'o/ /dge slong khyi srel bas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi
232b6('dul ba): byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang / ji tsam na der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas nye dgas bsams pa/
232b7('dul ba): bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las gnas brtan gnyis par bya ba 'am/ bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam pa las/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig
232b8('dul ba): tu song ba dang / dge 'dun de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yin nas des bsams pa/ bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na spogs med par dge
233a1('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ci zhig bya zhes de slar rings pa rings pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal phyed bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des smras pa/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos
233a2('dul ba): shig / dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes te ma bskos pa dang nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig ces pa'i skabs de dge
233a3('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song ba zhig yin na de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o/ /gzhan gyi ni gar
233a4('dul ba): bab pa bzhin du'o/ /nye dga' lhag par chags pas gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ des dbyar 'das nas rnyed pa mnos pa dang / gcig nas kyang ma thob
233a5('dul ba): cig shos nas kyang ma thob nas/ gnas mal 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams la kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la rnyed pa
233a6('dul ba): byin cig / dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gcig nas byin pa dang dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/
233a7('dul ba): gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyed phyed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis gtsug
233a8('dul ba): lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o/ /dam 'cha' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gcig gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/ gcig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no/ /gcig shos ni grong mtha'
233b1('dul ba): pa rnams kyi yin no/ /khyim bdag de'i kun du spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas de ras yug chen rnams khyer te dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
233b2('dul ba): nye dgas dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas des dga' bo la spring ba/ gal te 'di rnyed pa 'bul na skal ba nos shig ces smras nas/ de rings pa rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
233b3('dul ba): khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa/ 'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang der song gis/ da ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las re shig /grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du phul la phyis 'dir dbul lo
233b4('dul ba): snyam nas/ de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang khyim bdag des ras yug po che cig byin no/ /yang bzed pa dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod la ras yug po che phul
233b5('dul ba): lags na ci yang bzhed dam/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye dgas dbyar gnas pas de'i skal ba nod do/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas sbyin pa la bsngags
233b6('dul ba): pa mdzad pas rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo/ /de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /nye dgas bsams pa/ khyim bdag de ring zhig thogs na grong gi mthar ma song grang snyam du bsams nas/ grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du
233b7('dul ba): song nas dga' bo la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi ras yug po che rnams mnos sam/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste ras yug po che brims nas song ngo / /
233b8('dul ba): nye dgas yang slar dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na ji tsam ras yug po che rnams brims zin pa dang / de gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa la lhag par chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams nas mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags
234a1('dul ba): 'don to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nye dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
234a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag par chags pas zas chad par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i ngos gnyis na gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod de/ /
234a3('dul ba): gcig na ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o/ /gcig shos na ni bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o/ /ji tsam na khyi gaN DI'i sgra shes pa zhig yod de/ de gaN DI'i sgra thos nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yod pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slong kha
234a4('dul ba): cig gis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin pa dang des de zos nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos na dga' mgur 'gro'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams la blo bur
234a5('dul ba): gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas de rnams kyis sngar gaN DI brdungs pa dang / khyi des gaN DI'i sgra thos nas chu rgal bar brtsams te de dbus su phyin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa can gyi gtsug lag khang gi gaN DI yang brdungs nas de spro ba med nas
234a6('dul ba): slar log par brtsams pa las de chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/ /dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gaN DI'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang
234a7('dul ba): 'di lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/ /da ltar yang lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhag par chags par mi bya'o/ /byed na 'gal tshabs
234a8('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ / //sdom la/ 'thab dang nad pa rdzogs pa dang / /nub mo'i dus dang ka shi dang / /shing dang gsing ma 'dug gnas dang / /cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba
234b1('dul ba): 'khor gyis zhus pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing / de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas
234b2('dul ba): tho btsam pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid dran par bgyid do zhes thos na/ de rnams kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye ba 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis dge slong 'thab krol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes
234b3('dul ba): thos na/ gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug bya'o/ /gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o/ /gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang
234b4('dul ba): thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/ /gal
234b5('dul ba): te gtsug lag khang bskos shig ces zer na 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor bskos shig zhe na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /khang phran
234b6('dul ba): gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /kun dga'i ra ba bskos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de rnams gnas
234b7('dul ba): med de mi gnas na gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/ de nas sngo ba rnams med/ phyir rgol ba rnams med/ mi mdza' ba rnams med nas de'i 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims
234b8('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig cig yod pa de bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/ de ni thams cad pas gzhon
235a1('dul ba): pas de'i gnas khang gzhan ni ma thob bo/ /dge slong des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di kho bo'i yin par bskos kyis byung shig /des smras pa/ bdag bro 'tshal bas na ma sos pa na'o/ /dge slong de gtum po
235a2('dul ba): zhig pas des phyung nas gang dgar bzhag go/ /ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang lta bar 'dod pa lhags pa de rnams kyis dge slong de mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci dge slong 'di gum lags sam/ bzhin
235a3('dul ba): bzangs dag 'di shi ba ni ma yin no/ /'o na ci'i phyir 'dir bzhag /'di bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong shig 'ongs nas/ 'di'i gnas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang des 'di phyung nas 'dir bzhag go/ /'phags pa bdag cag khyim pa lags
235a4('dul ba): kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir khyim nas mi 'byin na khyed cag rab tu byung la ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/ de ji ltar nad pa phyir 'byin par byed ces de rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong
235a5('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par
235a6('dul ba): bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas mjal to zhes byas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /ji tsam na zhag drug gam bdun na gnas mal 'gyed par gyur pa na rkang pa rma byung ba ltar byas te gos kyis dkris nas 'dug pa dang / gnas
235a7('dul ba): khang 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams kyis nad pa yin no snyam nas de'i gnas mal bskos so/ /de gnas mal bskos zin nas rma'i g.yogs ma bor te 'dug go/ /nad pa lta ba'i dge slong rnams kyis de la dris pa/ ci gnas brtan zhabs
235a8('dul ba): bsnyung ba sos sam/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bka' ma stsal tam/ ci kho bo'i nad rtag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan myur du sos par gyur pa na bar sgyu ni
235b1('dul ba): ma btab grang / des smras pa/ kho bo gnas khang sgo drung du gzhag par 'dod dam ci/ dge slong don nyung ba rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ de ltar dge slong dag mi na bzhin du gnas khang spang
235b2('dul ba): ba rang gir byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na sgyu 'debs pa'i nad pa la gzhi spang ba sbyin par mi bya zhing
235b3('dul ba): des rang gir yang mi bya'o/ /rang gir byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /lnga tshan rnams kyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mdun du bdar dang rang khrims dang / /ma chags pa dang de bzhin du/ /snang ba skyes dang byung ba dang / /bar du gcod dang
235b4('dul ba): de bzhin du/ /phyi mar byas pa ltung ba ste/ /bsdus pa'i sdom du bsdus pa yin/ /bar sdom ni/ mdun du bya dang gzhan dang yang / /nang dang gzhan rnams dag dang ni/ /sems can mang po phan bya ba/ /lnga tshan dag ni dang po yin/ /bcom
235b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams la mdo sde dang ma mo bzhag go/ /klu rnams la ni mdo sde'o/ /'dul ba ni zab pa zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ dgongs pa mang ba/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'thun pa
235b6('dul ba): yin na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'dul ba zab pa nyid dang / dgongs pa mang ba nyid dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'thun pa nyid yin pas 'don par mi spro'o/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
235b7('dul ba): bstan pa'i yan lag gang zhig yongs su nyams pa de'i bsngags pa lhag par brjod par mdzad pa yin pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang
235b8('dul ba): zag la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'khor bzhis mdun du bdar ba yin/ gdam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs
236a1('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang gi mdzod bsrung ba yin/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan rnams kyi spyi bo na 'dug pa yin/ dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / bslab pa'i ched kyi phyir skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po
236a2('dul ba): la bde bar zhugs pa yin no/ /bar sdom ni/ bdag nyid khrims ldan mngon par bsu/ /'gyod pa dang ni bag tsha med/ /chos dang 'thun pas byed pa ste/ /lnga tshan gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /gzhan yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i gang zag
236a3('dul ba): la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di'i rang gi tshul khrims kyi phung pos legs par bsrung zhing legs par sbas pa yin/ 'khor bzhis mngon sum du bsu bar bya ba yin/ gang zag 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams kyi ston par gyur pa yin/
236a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi nang na bag tsha ba med pas gnas pa yin/ chos dang 'thun pas phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa yin no/ /bar sdom ni/ ma 'dres don dang nges pa dang / /bslab pa yi ni gzhi dag dang / /snang ba dag ni gnyis po nyid/ /lnga tshan dag ni
236a5('dul ba): gsum pa yin/ /gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ don ma 'dres par sel ba yin/ don rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba la shin du nges pa yin/ de'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams legs par
236a6('dul ba): bzung ba yin/ sems kyi snang ba skyes pas mang du gnas pa yin/ skye bo phyi ma rnams kyi snang ba byed pa yin no/ /sdom ni/ snang ba gsal ba 'od dang ni/ sems las chung dang mi stong pa'o/ /gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la
236a7('dul ba): phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ phyogs gang na gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa gnas pa'i phyogs de ngas snang ba skyes pa dang / gsal ba skyes pa dang / 'od skyes par mthong / phyogs der nga thugs khral chung ngur gnas/ phyogs de
236a8('dul ba): ngas bstod pa ma yin par mthong ngo / /sdom ni/ byung dang de nas bcas pa dang / /rjes su bcas dang de bzhin du/ /bkag dang rjes su gnang ba ni/ /lnga tshan lnga par byas pa'o/ /gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan
236b1('dul ba): yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rjes su bcas pa shes/ bkag pa shes/ rjes su gnang ba shes pa yin no/ /sdom ni/ bar chad bar chad ma yin dang / /gdams ngag dang ni rjes bstan dang / /
236b2('dul ba): slob ma'i mthu ni yod pa ste/ lnga tshan drug pa dag tu bshad/ gzhan yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bar du gcod pa rnams shes/ bar du gcod pa ma yin pa rnams shes/ 'doms par byed/
236b3('dul ba): rjes su ston par byed/ lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams gnas 'char 'jug nus so/ /sdom ni/ ltung ba dang ni ltung ba min/ /lci dang yang dang de bzhin du/ /so sor thar pa rgyas par yang / /gdon pa dag ni lnga tshan yin/ /gzhan
236b4('dul ba): yang gang zag 'dul ba 'dzin pa la phan yon lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ ltung ba byung ba shes/ ltung ba ma byung ba shes/ lci ba shes/ yang ba shes shing / de so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa la rgyas par zhugs pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
236b5('dul ba): 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dang / dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog tu
236b6('dul ba): gyur nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba kun chub par byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ gus pas bstan par brtsams pas de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur zhing rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyam dmas par gyur to/ /
236b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan pa rmed kyi don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pa ste/ sangs rgyas
236b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
237a1('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir dge slong nye bar 'khor lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur zhing rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / na bas nyam dmas par gyur/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
237a2('dul ba): 'dul ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis de thos nas spro ba dang bcas pas 'dul ba gdon par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams 'dul ba
237a3('dul ba): kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes gus pas bstan par brtsams te/ des na de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur zhing rid pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur lags so/ /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan
237a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam bzhir lung 'bog par bya ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang /
237a5('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na'o/ /lung nod pa'i dge slong gi spyod lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod bar bya ste/ gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong 'chag sar lung nod pa'i dge slong 'ongs la gsar bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la/ khams
237a6('dul ba): snyoms sam zhes dris nas lus btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o/ /ji ste ches rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas lus btud de sems drang por gus pa dang / bcas pas
237a7('dul ba): gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o/ /ji ste 'greng ba na 'ongs pa la gsar bu zhig yin na des phyag byas la khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas stan ches dma' ba la tsog tsog por 'dug la sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung
237a8('dul ba): mnod par bya'o/ /ji ste rgan pa zhig yin na des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la lus btud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o/ /'greng ba la ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug pa dang / nyal ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /
237b1('dul ba): lung 'bog pa'i dge slong gis shin du goms pa dang / legs par byang ba dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung 'bog par bya'o/ /lung nod pas kyang shin du byang ba dang / shin du zin pa dang / the tshom med par byas nas lung mnod
237b2('dul ba): par bya'o/ /lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang / lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs
237b3('dul ba): rgyu zhing dong ba na/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nub mo phyin nas de rnams 'grogs bshes ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis ngal sor bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byed gnas mal sko ba bos
237b4('dul ba): shig / de dag gis smras pa ci dgos/ gnas mal bskor gzhug mod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas mal yod kyis bde bar nyol cig dang / nam nangs nas bsko'o/ /de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ ci khyed
237b5('dul ba): cag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ gal te khyed la 'gyed pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal skos shig /de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal sko ba bred nas gnas mal bskos pa dang / drug sde de rnams
237b6('dul ba): kyis rgan rims bzhin du gnas mal mnos te nyal lo/ /ji tsam gzhon rims kyis bar du sko ba de'i bar du nam nangs so/ /drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal sdus shig 'dong ngo / /dge slong de
237b7('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi nub cig gi phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo tho btsam 'am/ kye ma'o khyed cag 'di nyid du 'dug shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' mnyan yod du dong ngo / /'di
237b8('dul ba): dag ni rlung nad can yin no zhes byas nas dong ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na nub mo gnas mal bsko bar mi bya'o/ /
238a1('dul ba): gal te nub mo lhags na 'grogs bshes ci lta ba bzhin du so sor ngal sor gzhug par bya'o/ /yul zhig nas dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs na de de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar langs te
238a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du ra ba zhig
238a3('dul ba): gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byed par brtsams so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las des de mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa kun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin na
238a4('dul ba): mi rigs pa mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dro la bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam/ 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/ des smras pa/ khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi byon/ khyod kyi ming ci/ mgon med zas sbyin no/ /kho bos mdo
238a5('dul ba): sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi/ khyod kyang mi shes la/ khyim yang mi shes so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ dge slong 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs na rgyus mi shes
238a6('dul ba): pa zhig yin te/ gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la/ bdag gi khyim yang mi shes kyis/ 'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus la/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas
238a7('dul ba): brtsig par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs cig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
238a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong glo bur ba spyod yul ba zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yol du nye nas ra ba zhig gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de/ ma dad pa rnams yan lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams la
238b1('dul ba): smod par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/ gang zhig gang du dro la bab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /
238b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis rtsigs shig /des gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar du bsti gnas dag brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der zas kyi bya ba
238b3('dul ba): byed do/ /dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis der khron pa brkos nas tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta bkang ste btab pas chu de ro phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes 'jig rten thams cad
238b4('dul ba): du grags pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags pa/ dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed cag la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ chab
238b5('dul ba): 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyed 'gog par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bgag par mi bya'o/ /bud med dge slong rnams la chu slong ba na
238b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni kun nas zhags pa ste/ bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed
238b7('dul ba): pa na chags par gyur to/ /ji tsam na bud med byad bzhin dang lang tshos rgyags pa zhig dge slong gzhon nu zhig la shin du chags pas de la chu blangs pa dang / de yang de la chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis slar log kyang rgyun ma bcad par
238b8('dul ba): blugs te/ de yang de la rtog bzhin 'thungs pa la chu de glor song nas shi'o/ /don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
239a1('dul ba): byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med gang zhig chags pas bcings ba'i sems gyis dge slong la chu slong ba de la rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyim pa khong la 'thung
239a2('dul ba): shig ces bsgo la/ skabs skabs su bcad cing blugs par bya'o/ /gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bdun bcu bdun pa/ de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma rgyal bu
239a3('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba de rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas su dong ste 'dug nas bsod snyoms kyi thog ma khyer te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la smras te/ gal te 'o thug yin na
239a4('dul ba): ni lhung bzed bzed par byed de/ ci ste chu thug yin na ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang / mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o/ /de bzhin du hwags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ don nyung ba'i dge slong
239a5('dul ba): rnams smod par phyed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha
239a6('dul ba): brngam mi bya'o/ /kha brngam byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ste/
239a7('dul ba): de rnams der phyin pa na dro la bab kyang 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ched du bsams te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /ma bsams
239a8('dul ba): par 'ong ba las gal te dro la bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /phongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las de na dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang
239b1('dul ba): bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang snga mar de ma blangs la de yang gal te tshad med pa zhig tu
239b2('dul ba): 'drim na blang bar bya'o/ /ji ste dge slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yin na blang bar mi bya'o/ /len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so/ /de'i tshe
239b3('dul ba): ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so gnyis gnas te/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs shing 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/ /
239b4('dul ba): thos nas kyang bsams pa/ ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa/ 'dzem pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag la gleng bar byed/ dran par byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang
239b5('dul ba): chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba yang drug bya'o/ /gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar
239b6('dul ba): gyi'o/ /gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang /
239b7('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras pa dang 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /gtsug lag khang gi nye
239b8('dul ba): 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /kun dga' ra ba skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no/ /kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor
240a1('dul ba): skos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya ste/ de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa/ 'dzem pa med pas bdag cag la gleng bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal
240a2('dul ba): gzung ba drug byas so/ /ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs pa na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs zin to/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal dang gtsug lag khang
240a3('dul ba): skos shig / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin no/ /khang phran skos shig /de yang bskos zin no/ /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig /de yang bskos zin no/ /khang phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig /de yang
240a4('dul ba): bskos zin no/ /kun dga' ra ba skos shig /de yang bskos zin no/ /kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig /de yang bskos zin no/ /gang gi phyir de gnyis kyis gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po
240a5('dul ba): dang sgra chen po byung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan par rmed kyi don dang mi ldan par
240a6('dul ba): mi rmed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
240a7('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grag pa 'di ci zhig yin/ des gsol pa/ dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang
240a8('dul ba): gnas mal gzung ba drug bgyis nas dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/ des na kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po 'di grag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
240b1('dul ba): kun dga' bo ngas 'thab bkrol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs nas gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i
240b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams las brtsams te gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mi bya'o/ /byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ko sa
240b3('dul ba): la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab bo/ /drug sde rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang gis bzung ngo / /dge slong gnas
240b4('dul ba): brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni shing khong stong dag thob bo/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te bsu nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas dge slong gnas
240b5('dul ba): brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags na/ ji tsam na drug sde rnams ni shing bzang po dag gi drung na gnas la/ gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi ni shing khong stong rnams mthong nas/ des mjal to zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das
240b6('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
240b7('dul ba): gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gtso bo lags te/ yul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che rnams las thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos po gang lags pa de ni bdag gi lags na/
240b8('dul ba): lhag ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du mchis brang dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / khrom gyi ru pa rnams kyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 'phags pa kauN+Di n+ya dang /
241a1('dul ba): shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams ni zhugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drung na mchis la/ drug sde rnams kyi ni zhugs shing bzang ches lags
241a2('dul ba): kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs shing la yang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi bca' ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas
241a3('dul ba): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo / /byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
241a4('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na shing rnams dang / sgang bu dang / gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shing dang / sgang bu dang / gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko
241a5('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams rang nyid sko bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang sko ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis phal pa las bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das
241a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gtsug lag khang 'ged par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti
241a7('dul ba): mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung
241a8('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /yang chos lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro
241b1('dul ba): ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /bsko ba ni 'di ltar
241b2('dul ba): bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN DI brdungs la dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod
241b3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro'am/ de gal te spro bar gyur na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug
241b4('dul ba): lag khang sko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes
241b5('dul ba): bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko ba mdzad do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang bsko ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag
241b6('dul ba): khang sko bar spro nas 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung
241b7('dul ba): shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
241b8('dul ba): to/ /gtsug lag khang 'ged pa ji lta ba bzhin du zas la bsko ba dang / thug pa 'drim pa dang / bag chos 'drim pa dang / phran tshegs 'drim pa dang / snod spyad 'drub pa dang / gos sbed pa dang / gos 'ged pa dang / dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa
242a1('dul ba): dang / dbyar gyi ras chen 'ged pa dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / mdzes 'chos pa yang de bzhin te/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun
242a2('dul ba): pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/ /bskos
242a3('dul ba): pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/ /yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba
242a4('dul ba): dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes 'chos pa ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /gtsug lag khang dang zas 'ged dang / /thug
242a5('dul ba): pa 'drim dang bag chos dang / /phran tshegs snod spyad sbed pa dang / /chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du/ /dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang / /'ged pa dang ni mngag gzhug dang / /de bzhin du ni mdzes 'chos te/ /gang zag bcu gnyis yin par bshad/ /
242a6('dul ba): gnas mal gyi gzhi rdzogs s+ho// // rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ 'thab dang 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / /rtsa ba gang dang dge ba gang / /'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang / /'gyed pa dus ni zhi ba dang / /'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba
242a7('dul ba): dang / /tshul shing dag ni blang ba yis/ /gdams ngag med pa mngon sum dang / /dran dang ma myos 'dul 'os dang / /de yi ngo bo tshol gzhug dang / rtswa bkram lta bur 'os pa yis/ /dge 'dun dag ni 'thun pa yis/ /de bzhin bya ba'i rtsod pa
242a8('dul ba): ni/ /nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes/ /drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa
242b1('dul ba): de'i tshe de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'dong bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chad par mdzad do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom
242b2('dul ba): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du 'gro bar byed do/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu'i chos bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi
242b3('dul ba): g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan par byed do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
242b4('dul ba): sngar song ste/ des chos mnyan nas song ngo / /de nas shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan te dad pa skyes nas rang gi khyim du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/
242b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/ /ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas smras pa/ rje'i sras de ci lags/ des smras pa/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'di 'dra ba'i chos
242b6('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po rtogs so/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de mad de/
242b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas byung ba ni khyed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas pa lags kyi bdag cag la ni ma lags so/ /ci'i phyir 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba ni skyes pa rnams kyi phyir lags kyi bud med rnams kyi phyir ni ma lags so/ /
242b8('dul ba): des smras pa/ bzang mo de skad ma smra shig /bcom ldan 'das ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / thugs brtse ba yin gyis song shig dang / khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur ro/ /
243a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ lha shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus gsum du bzhud la/ lha'i mdun du mngon sum du bdag gis chos mnyan pa g.yar tsha lags so/ /'di ltar gal te lha snga dro bzhud na bdag
243a2('dul ba): gis kyang slad dro bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan par bgyi'o/ /shAkya ming chen gyis bsams pa/ lha la gsol gyis 'gro'o snyam pa las yang bsams pa/ rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol ba byed mi phod kyis/ lha ni skye dgu'i
243a3('dul ba): bdag mo chen mo la bkur sti mang du byed de/ de'i tshig nyan par 'gyur bas de la don 'di rig par bya'o snyam nas/ de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la don de smras pa dang /
243a4('dul ba): des smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ lha la gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma rnams la smras pa dang / de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma dang / gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skye dgu'i
243a5('dul ba): bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gau ta mI mkhyen par mdzod cig bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang
243a6('dul ba): m a'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos de thos par 'tshal gyis bdag cag gi
243a7('dul ba): phyir lha la ci nas kyang lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhud la/ bdag cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol cig /des smras pa/ phu nu mo dag khyed kyis sems bskyed pa legs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang la brtag gis skad cig
243a8('dul ba): sdod cig / de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i
243b1('dul ba): gung la bzhugs nas snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos so/ /shAkya'i mchis brang rnams kyis
243b2('dul ba): kyang de skad thos nas de rnams chos nyan par 'tshal na lha ni snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so/ /bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis brang rnams ded de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar slad dro mchi bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir
243b3('dul ba): zhe na/ snga dro ni de rnams bsdum pa'i bgyi ba dag bgyid pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i skabs ma mchis so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun du spyod pa ni gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs tshig smras pa de'i tshe lus kyi
243b4('dul ba): ba spu zing zhes byed nas langs te/ re shig skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi 'dug pa yin pas des mgo bos btud de smras pa/ gau ta mI bka' bzhin 'tshal/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta
243b5('dul ba): mI shAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /ji tsam na shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas de dang lhan cig song
243b6('dul ba): ste gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas 'dod chags dang ma bral ba dag chags pa skye bar zhugs pa de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas smras pa/ sring mo re shig khyod kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs nyid kyang
243b7('dul ba): bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyod rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dir 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni ma legs pa zhig byas te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod
243b8('dul ba): chags dang bral ba kho na yang ma yin no zhes de la de skad smras pa dang / ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas spyi po smad nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ rgyan rnams bkrol nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/ de'i mngag gzhug
244a1('dul ba): ma bu mo bskyed ma zhes bya ba dang / de lhan cig chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pas des de la bos te smras pa/ bskyed ma song la rgyan 'di dag khyim du zhog la shog shig /de rings par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar
244a2('dul ba): 'ongs so/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /chos bshad
244a3('dul ba): pa de mdzad pa de'i tshe ji tsam na shAkya'i bu mo zhig mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar lta zhing lag pas nom par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsams so/ /
244a4('dul ba): 'on kyang de chos la mi gtod kyi mu tig gi do shal kho na la rtog par byed do/ /ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas shAkya'i bu mo mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam
244a5('dul ba): du sems te/ nyon mongs 'di 'du byed rnams 'di ltar mi rtag par bshad na mu tig gi do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bar brtag tu ci yod/ gal te bdag gi mu tig gi phreng ba mthong na 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang
244a6('dul ba): bral bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo bskyed ma la smras pa/ bskyed ma song la kho mo'i mu tig gi do shal myur du khyer te shog shig /de chos nyan pa de la sems bsdus pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi
244a7('dul ba): hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na bdag jo mos mngags pas chos kyi bar chad byung bar gyur te/ mdor na bran gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni re sdug snyam du bsams nas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bas gdungs pas tshigs su bcad pas
244a8('dul ba): smras pa/ gang yang sdig pas de ring rgyal zhal blta ba dang / /bde gshegs zhal nas dri med chos mnyan mi 'thob pa/ /bran dngos gzhan dbang sdug bsngal mang po tha chad de/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba sngon byas las kyis thob
244b1('dul ba): pa ngan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bu mo bskyed ma 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyi/ tshe chung zhig yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i btson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o snyam du
244b2('dul ba): dgongs nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis gro ga la/ dge ma skye ba byung na ni/ /'jig pa yin par bsams nas su/ /ngas gsungs pa yi dge ba la/ /brtson 'grus bskyed nas mnyan par bya/ /zhes bris nas byin no/ /de nas bu
244b3('dul ba): mo bskyed ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshigs su bcad pa smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang / las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za'ang
244b4('dul ba): tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /ces bya ba yin pas tshe chung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed pa de ba drus ma zhig gis bsad do/ /de sangs rgyas la sems mngon par dad par byas
244b5('dul ba): te shi bas sing ga la'i gling du sing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur te/ gang gi nyi ma la nying mtshams sbyar ba de kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi char pa bab bo/ /rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa
244b6('dul ba): dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhums su zhugs pa de'i mthu lags so/ /ji tsam na mngal gyi smin par bya ba'i phyir de sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grag cing grang ba na grang ba'i
244b7('dul ba): yo byad dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang / sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang lan tshwa can ma yin pa dang / ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang rtsub
244b8('dul ba): pa ma yin pa dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa dang / kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngar ba dang / rtsub pa dang / bska ba rnams spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i
245a1('dul ba): bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri nas khri dang / khri'u nas khri'ur 'gro zhing 'og gi sa la 'babs par mi byed do/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/
245a2('dul ba): gang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang mu tig gi char bab nas rgyal pos bsams pa/ 'di ltar bu mo'i mthus mu tig gi char 'bab pa ni de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyur ro zhes des de nyid la byin no/ /de nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa
245a3('dul ba): gcig tu de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas bu mo'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'di'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pas de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming mu tig can zhes
245a4('dul ba): gdags so zhes de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te/ /bu mo mu tig can ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs
245a5('dul ba): kyi ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma
245a6('dul ba): bzhin myur du skyed par byed do/ /de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi rigs dang 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / gnas pas rgyal po nang mi dang bcas pas lhag par bkur sti byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod kyi
245a7('dul ba): tshong pa rnams kyis nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang de rnams gru bo che phan phun med par rlung gi shugs kyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin to/ /de nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste/
245a8('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'brang btab po/ /de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad
245b1('dul ba): pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde rnams rgyas par 'don pa la zhugs pa mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung nas thos nas/ de nas
245b2('dul ba): des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha yul dbus kyi tshong pa rnams mchis nas mchid snyan par len to/ /rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag glu mkhan rnams khug shig /de rnams bkug pa dang mu tig can gyis
245b3('dul ba): smras pa/ shes ldan dag yul dbus kyi rol mo ci 'dra ba kho mos mnyan gyis long shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bdag cag ni rol mo mkhan ma lags te/ bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlung gi shugs kyis 'dir
245b4('dul ba): mchis pa lags te/ bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung bton to/ /mu tig can gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa de thos nas snying dga' bas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar
245b5('dul ba): skyes nas dris pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid rgyas par smra bar brtsams te/ lha mo shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba/ chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram
245b6('dul ba): drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ste/ de bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal
245b7('dul ba): ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin
245b8('dul ba): po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che 'o/ /de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde
246a1('dul ba): rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur zhing / de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas
246a2('dul ba): legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
246a3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ de lta bu de ni sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /mu tig can gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dong ba de'i
246a4('dul ba): tshe kho mo la sbron cig / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bka' bzhin 'tshal/ sbran par bgyi'o/ /ji tsam na de rnams yul du 'dong ba'i dus la bab nas de rnams kyis mu tig can la sbran pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la yi
246a5('dul ba): ge gsol pa/ lha dang lha min mi yis phyag bgyis pa/ /skye dang snyun dang bsnyengs las nges byung zhing / /gtso bo grags pa rgya chen rab grags pa/ /drang srong bdud rtsi'i cha las thugs rjes gnong / /zhes gsol to/ /
246a6('dul ba): de nas yi ge de tshong pa de rnams kyis khyer nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
246a7('dul ba): te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs cig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa sing ga la'i gling na sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid yi ge gsol ba 'di
246a8('dul ba): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mu tig can gyi 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas nyid kyis blangs te blags so/ /blags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag slar 'dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe nga'i snyan du gsol cig /
246b1('dul ba): btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo / /de nas zong bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zong thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol pa/ bcom
246b2('dul ba): ldan 'das bdag cag mchi na bdag cag gis mu tig can la ji skad bgyi bka' stsal par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin du legs par byi dor byas pa'i ras dang ri mo mkhan dag khug shig /de rnams
246b3('dul ba): kyis ras dang ri mo mkhan dag bkug nas phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris shig /ri mo mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri
246b4('dul ba): bar brtsams pa las de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin pas ri mo mkhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
246b5('dul ba): ras ston cig dang 'od gtang ngo / /de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyis tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan
246b6('dul ba): gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
246b7('dul ba): bris so/ /gong du ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom bar bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod
246b8('dul ba): pas/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bris nas sing ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yig spring ba/ ras la ri mor bris pa ngas mu tig
247a1('dul ba): can la skyes su bskur ba yin gyis/ khyod kyis de las phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar sing ga la'i gling na gnas ba'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus la/ bkur sti chen pos ras 'di khrom shig /tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal
247a2('dul ba): te mu tig can 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na de dag ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga
247a3('dul ba): rnams dang / lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o/ /'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /
247a4('dul ba): gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na spro bar bya ba yin te/ gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus
247a5('dul ba): rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas
247a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ zong khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song ste/ rim gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa ngal
247a7('dul ba): sos te/ rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te yi ge byin no/ /rgyal pos yi ge blags te blags nas grong khyer de rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan
247a8('dul ba): bsgreng / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ shin du dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag /me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsogs nas/ de nas bkur sti chen po byas te grong
247b1('dul ba): khyer gyi dbus su rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams te/ ras phye ba dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bstod de smras so/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu
247b2('dul ba): tig can dad pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gis ba spu zing zhes byed cing mig mchi mas gang bas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te tshong pa rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyis smra bar brtsams pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
247b3('dul ba): de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lags so/ /'og ma 'di dag ci yin/ 'di ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa
247b4('dul ba): dang ldog pa'o/ /'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags so/ /gong ma 'di ci yin/ spro bar bgyi ba lags te/ gang zhig skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te lugs dang 'thun pa dang
247b5('dul ba): lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas mu tig can gyis
247b6('dul ba): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa bsam par brtsams te/ ji srid lan gsum du ma bzlas pa de'i bar du des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi
247b7('dul ba): rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas/ /gang la 'di 'dra'i gsos mnga'
247b8('dul ba): ba/ /sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /lta ba'i ri bo drungs phyung ste/ /lta ba'i zug rngu sel mdzad pa/ /sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pas smras nas tshong
248a1('dul ba): pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag khyed cag nam 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig /de nas tshong pa rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zong rnams khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung du song ste/ lha mo bdag cag mchi na bdag
248a2('dul ba): cag gis ci zhig bgyi bar bka' stsal par gsol/ /des smras pa/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshol la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba
248a3('dul ba): dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad de/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la
248a4('dul ba): brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags rnams las ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag /'khor ba las ni rgyang bsrings/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song
248a5('dul ba): gi sgo ni bskum/ mtho ris thar pa'i sgo ni phye/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa
248a6('dul ba): bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/ dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang
248a7('dul ba): bsdos de skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes gsol la/ mu tig bre gsum po 'di khyer la cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni chos la/ cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul cig /de nas tshong pa de rnams kyis
248a8('dul ba): zong dang bskur ba yang khyer de dong nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas ji skad spring ba bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas
248b1('dul ba): 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /btsun pa skyes su phul ba'i mu tig bre gsum po 'di lags te/ mu tig cha gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni chos la/ cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun
248b2('dul ba): dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skyes 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shAkya ming chen gyi mngag gzhug ma bskyed ma zhes bya ba nga las chos mnyan nas song
248b3('dul ba): ba las/ lam kar ba drus mas bsad pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /des nga la sems dang ba bskyed de shi bas sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can zhes bya bar gyur te/ bden pa mthong nas des skyes bskur ba 'di yin no/ /
248b4('dul ba): 'di las sangs rgyas kyi skal ba gang yin pa des dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal byos shig /chos kyi gang yin pa de ni chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgos shig /
248b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mu tig can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na des na bran mor gyur lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na des rgyal po phyug po'i
248b6('dul ba): rigs su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa
248b7('dul ba): gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol
248b8('dul ba): gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung
249a1('dul ba): po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /
249a2('dul ba): dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
249a3('dul ba): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du bA rA Na sIr phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
249a4('dul ba): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po kr-i kis de'i sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis spungs te/ spungs nas bkur sti chen pos bsregs te me de 'o mas bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gser gyi bum par blugs
249a5('dul ba): te/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsigs nas dus mchod chen po btsugs so/ /bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon phyug
249a6('dul ba): pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan
249a7('dul ba): cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang de la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas bdag gi
249a8('dul ba): k hyim du nor phal po che bsags kyang bdag la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bu med do zhes byas te rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa de la dge slong
249b1('dul ba): dang bram ze dang / grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / bltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mnyes par byos shig dang khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /de bu med de bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan
249b2('dul ba): dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa gzhan yang lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i
249b3('dul ba): lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos 'thun pa pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba 'debs so/ /'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyus bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten na de skad du grags pa yod
249b4('dul ba): de/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur na ni re re yang dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gnas gsum gang zhe na
249b5('dul ba): pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing lhan cig 'dus pa dang / ma mngal rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas de gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na des bu
249b6('dul ba): yod pa'i las ma byas pas des na de la bu pho dang bu mo med do/ /ji tsam na de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur to/ /
249b7('dul ba): de nas de'i chung mas bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim na nor phal mo che bsags pa ni bdag la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med la/ bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ da ni gal te 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam rgyags
249b8('dul ba): ma blangs na nor zas 'di thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes byas nas rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de'i mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba mgul na thogs pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
250a1('dul ba): mchod rten de la dri dang byug pas byugs nas mchod pa byas te btags nas dad pa drag pos drung du gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba dang sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug po'i
250a2('dul ba): rigs su skyes shing yon tan 'di lta bu yang thob cing ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni
250a3('dul ba): mu tig can 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing btsas pa na mu tig gi
250a4('dul ba): char bab bo/ /nga'i bstan pa la yang dad pa bskyed pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /gzhan yang tshong dpon nor mang du bsags pa de'i
250a5('dul ba): chung mar gyur pa na de na 'dis dbang phyug gi grags pas rgyags nas spyod yul na gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes smras pas/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs mang por bran mor gyur to/ /dge slong
250a6('dul ba): dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin zhing / gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar la/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/ /de bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag
250a7('dul ba): pa'i las rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi cha gang yin pa de ni chos smra ba'i gang zag
250a8('dul ba): rnams kyi yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de nas mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo / /'dul
250b1('dul ba): ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nang gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo / /ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis
250b2('dul ba): smras pa/ kho bo cag ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo zhes de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo
250b3('dul ba): 'dzin pa rnams 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma 'thab shig /mtshang ma 'dru shig /'thab
250b4('dul ba): mo ma byed cig / ma 'gyed cig /dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni rtsod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang / gdam ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o/ /'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang
250b5('dul ba): zhe na/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra pa/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi 'phrod par smra ba/ mi mthun pa kun tu mi dga' ba/ rgyud gcig tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo
250b6('dul ba): dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o/ /gdam ngag med pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag gzhag pa gang yin pa de las
