288b1('dul ba): dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun du snang bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po'i bu klu mnyam skyong ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po
288b2('dul ba): klu mnyam skyong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kri ki zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
288b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes
288b4('dul ba): bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir sngon smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ /gau ta ma
288b5('dul ba): dag rgyal po kri ki'i bu legs skyes so/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po legs skyes kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes
288b6('dul ba): bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ gau ta ma dang / ba ra dwa dza'o/ /de gnyis las gau ta ma ni mngon par 'byung bar dga'o/ /ba ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o/ /des pa chos dang chos ma yin
288b7('dul ba): pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus la bab
288b8('dul ba): ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/ yab mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni dad pas
289a1('dul ba): khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched yin te/ nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil
289a2('dul ba): du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thog go/ /de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas rgyal pos gal
289a3('dul ba): gyis gcu bar shes nas gnang ngo / /de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas drang srong mdog gnag
289a4('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis bdag rab tu phyung shig /des de rab tu phyung ngo / /drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang /
289a5('dul ba): rtsa ba dang / chu 'thung bas de yang drang srong gau ta ma drang srong gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas/ gzhon nu ba ra dwa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang
289a6('dul ba): srong gau ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po dgon pa'i zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu rung gis grong ngam dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin
289a7('dul ba): gyis/ khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil po byos la 'dug shig /mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong gau ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer
289a8('dul ba): gru 'dzin na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/ des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro/ /des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ yang mi
289b1('dul ba): gzhan zhig kAr Sha pA Na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' mgur spyod kyis tshur shog / des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na kAr Sha pA Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs
289b2('dul ba): pa ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re shig bdag la skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras so/ /mi de yang bya ba mang po
289b3('dul ba): zhig yin pas de dang de dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo / /des bsams pa/ nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bdag gis bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba/ pad ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song
289b4('dul ba): la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na/ bskyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi jo mo skad cig la skabs med skad cig la skabs yod ce 'am/ bu mo de de
289b5('dul ba): dang rigs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa/ rje'i sras skabs ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyis de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/ /de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang
289b6('dul ba): yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i rtsa lag na re bskyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig /des song nas bzang
289b7('dul ba): mo la smras pa dang / de nas de bskyed mos tshal du song ba dang skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par rigs sam/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras de ni
289b8('dul ba): bdag gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig /de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do/ /de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad do/ /jo mo bsad do
290a1('dul ba): zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang / de ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gnas so/ /de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta
290a2('dul ba): ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de ral gri khrag can mthong nas rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do zhes de nas drang srong gau ta ma de bskor te mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kwa'i rab tu
290a3('dul ba): byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/ des smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do/ /des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed
290a4('dul ba): do zhes des zhi ba smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa phying ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so/ /rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog
290a5('dul ba): pa yin pas des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis gsal shing la shon cig /de nas rab tu byung ba de me tog ka ra bi ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa/ lag na mtshon
290a6('dul ba): thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon
290a7('dul ba): no/ /de'i mkhan po mdog nag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon par mthong
290a8('dul ba): nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig /des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yi chad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan
290b1('dul ba): po gzhan ci lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu rma phyung ba'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang mkhan po bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no/ /bu ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig /bden pa
290b2('dul ba): dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i lpags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa 'di gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig /bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i
290b3('dul ba): bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog gnag gi lpags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /kun du drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog
290b4('dul ba): ces bya bar gyur to/ /de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to/ /de nas drang srong gau ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang / tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bram ze rnams na re bu med pa rnams
290b5('dul ba): la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na khyod kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gis bu bskyed pa lta
290b6('dul ba): ga la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig /mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na/
290b7('dul ba): ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa dang rlung grang mos reg pas sdug
290b8('dul ba): bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pas rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/ /gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo / /bsam gyis mi
291a1('dul ba): khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/ /khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgong nga
291a2('dul ba): gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang khye'u gnyis shig byung nas/ de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis zhugs so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad bcu gcig
291a3('dul ba): pa/ de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin du tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/ /de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na sgong nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig
291a4('dul ba): 'dug nas de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo / /des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong gau ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag
291a5('dul ba): par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bsnyod de/ de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi
291a6('dul ba): ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa gau ta ma gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /bu ram
291a7('dul ba): shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bur ram shing pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra dwa dza bu med par shi nas blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag da su zhig
291a8('dul ba): rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'os pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas
291b1('dul ba): drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste son pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gau ta ma gang du mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de
291b2('dul ba): mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o/ /ma nongs so/ /des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhog shig /
291b3('dul ba): des sdig pa'i las ci byas/ 'di dang 'di'o/ /skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig ba'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do/ /de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/
291b4('dul ba): drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma lags kyi bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du gtam smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po
291b5('dul ba): khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas pa rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar
291b6('dul ba): skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang bu med par shi'o/ /de nas gcig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas/ de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing
291b7('dul ba): pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes
291b8('dul ba): po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gdong dang / lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no/ /dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa
292a1('dul ba): 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khong
292a2('dul ba): du chud cing mi 'dug / lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/ ci'i slad du rje'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod
292a3('dul ba): na nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur lha dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo/ /ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de de rnams
292a4('dul ba): kyis brtags te rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu rgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba khug shig /de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog
292a5('dul ba): mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/ /gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha bkra shis par gyur cig /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags
292a6('dul ba): skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang
292a7('dul ba): phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/ mchis la lha la snyan du gdags par gsol lo zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon
292a8('dul ba): nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no/ /lha don de la nges pa ma mchis te/ re shig btsun mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa
292b1('dul ba): dang dgyes dgur spyod par mdzod cig dang / de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ ci ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long shig /de rnams dong nas bsu ste/
292b2('dul ba): ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
292b3('dul ba): spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas
292b4('dul ba): ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bya bar btags
292b5('dul ba): so/ /khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/
292b6('dul ba): des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub mo dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring ba khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin
292b7('dul ba): pa des sdod cig / kho bo der 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar brlag go/ /rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar
292b8('dul ba): bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang
293a1('dul ba): bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid
293a2('dul ba): dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur la gzhon nu de rnams ni spyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug /lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman
293a3('dul ba): par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma bgyis pa yang spyug la/ skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni bzhag go/ /rgyal pos btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /blon po
293a4('dul ba): rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs
293a5('dul ba): bris par shin du dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag / dar gyi chun phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go/ /de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa
293a6('dul ba): rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo / /blon po rnams bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i bskyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis
293a7('dul ba): smras pa/ lha'i lags so/ /de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig /ci'i phyir slar ldog /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i bskyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga la
293a8('dul ba): rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di 'gal ba ci mchis de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bskyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags
293b1('dul ba): kyis/ lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so/ /rgyal po chas pa dang bskyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bskyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug /blon po
293b2('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so/ /gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/ /blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin
293b3('dul ba): du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal ba'i rigs so/ /
293b4('dul ba): rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la
293b5('dul ba): smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na sgo chod cig /de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan
293b6('dul ba): shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil po dag byas te gnas btab ste ri dgas bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i
293b7('dul ba): bsti gnas su dong bar byed do/ /lang tsho dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin du nyen te sha bri ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed
293b8('dul ba): cag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin du nyen pas so/ /des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spongs la/ mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig
294a1('dul ba): 'dug shig / drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo / /de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis
294a2('dul ba): nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa
294a3('dul ba): na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser skya'i sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o/ /
294a4('dul ba): drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so/ /drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig /bdag cag gzhan du mchi na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig
294a5('dul ba): bdag la phog shig / shes ldan dag rung ngo / /drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag
294a6('dul ba): bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so/ /drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i
294a7('dul ba): tshogs chen por gyur te dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/ /lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der song ste grong khyer gcig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lhas
294a8('dul ba): bstan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na
294b1('dul ba): bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/ /de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma gcig len gyi rigs mnyam pa las chung ma gnyis pa ni mi len to/ /de nas
294b2('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran te blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag gzhon nu de rnams da lta gang na 'dug /de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig las spyugs pa las de
294b3('dul ba): rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams
294b4('dul ba): dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so/ /grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam/ lha rngo thog lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes
294b5('dul ba): pos ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyang ste ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no/ /kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin du phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu
294b6('dul ba): rnams ni phod pa yin no/ /kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin du phod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur
294b7('dul ba): to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ /de yang bu med par shi nas lag rna rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par
294b8('dul ba): shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur te/ de'i bu gnas 'jog go/ /gau ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir
295a1('dul ba): byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal
295a2('dul ba): dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no/ /gau ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge'i 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgra'o/ /gau ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags
295a3('dul ba): so/ /gau ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / tshad med zas so/ /bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre bo ma dang / tshad med ma'o/ /zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang /
295a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o/ /tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan
295a5('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo dang / lha sbyin no/ /gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do/ /dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no/ /bre mo ma'i bu ni bzang len no/ /tshad med ma'i bu dge 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan zin yin te/
295a6('dul ba): gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur ba'i rgyud tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i breng rgyun chad/ skye ba'i 'khor ba zad de/ da ni yang srid pa med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i
295a7('dul ba): gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu legs so/ /legs so/ /maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun
295a8('dul ba): du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so/ /maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang /
295b1('dul ba): des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis sngon gyi shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi
295b2('dul ba): gtam chongs shig / zung shig /lhogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas/ tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/
295b3('dul ba): dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klag pa'i rigs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
295b4('dul ba): par dga' ste rjes su yid rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/
295b5('dul ba): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang
295b6('dul ba): ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang /
295b7('dul ba): lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs
295b8('dul ba): pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do/ /lhas bstan na khyim
296a1('dul ba): bdag phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras
296a2('dul ba): bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su
296a3('dul ba): myong bar byed do/ /lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos
296a4('dul ba): na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /
296a5('dul ba): rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig
296a6('dul ba): gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas
296a7('dul ba): de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ / mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang
296a8('dul ba): bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun
296b1('dul ba): gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams
296b2('dul ba): su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o/ /gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs
296b3('dul ba): pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so/ /bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar
296b4('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
296b5('dul ba): byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang mo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/
296b6('dul ba): sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ /blon po rnams kyis
296b7('dul ba): smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu
296b8('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu
297a1('dul ba): mo gnyis shig btsa' ba ni sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung
297a2('dul ba): bstan to/ /gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu
297a3('dul ba): zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
297a4('dul ba): kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa re shig 'dod do/ /cig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o/ /des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bskri'o/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams
297a5('dul ba): kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas lha skya bseng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/
297a6('dul ba): shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ /lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa de sbyin pa lta na gtong ngo / /
297a7('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta'o/ /de nas shAkya
297a8('dul ba): rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta' lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo/ /shes ldan dag
297b1('dul ba): shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bca' ba sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/ /lha ci khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin du bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa
297b2('dul ba): gcig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no/ /lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas kho bos tshogs la brtags zin gyis/ bu mo cig shos kyang
297b3('dul ba): dkri shig / des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang dkri ste gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor
297b4('dul ba): pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang /
