297b6('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la
297b7('dul ba): gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa'
297b8('dul ba): dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res
298a1('dul ba): 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs
298a2('dul ba): so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thogs ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas
298a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems
298a4('dul ba): dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slongs mo pa brgya 'du
298a5('dul ba): ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ yul dbus 'di ni bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/
298a6('dul ba): slongs mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul 'tha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur
298a7('dul ba): bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa
298a8('dul ba): 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs
298b1('dul ba): pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig du 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la mi
298b2('dul ba): rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri
298b3('dul ba): thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/ blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/
298b4('dul ba): tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams
298b5('dul ba): sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras
298b6('dul ba): bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du
298b7('dul ba): dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs
298b8('dul ba): te/ shAkya'i rigs brgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi
299a1('dul ba): 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas
299a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang
299a3('dul ba): chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan
299a4('dul ba): pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la rigs 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin
299a5('dul ba): nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag
299a6('dul ba): can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi
299a7('dul ba): yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar
299a8('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do/ /
299b1('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpas gzigs pa lnga gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi
299b2('dul ba): chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la de'i bur gyur te bdud rtsi rtogs par byas/ khyod cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig /de skad ces bka'
299b3('dul ba): stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig /da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/
299b4('dul ba): 'dzam bu'i gling rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/ /de la rtog ge pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /
299b5('dul ba): smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang / kA t+yA'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/ /rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze rgyus rgyal dang / bram ze gnas rdeg dang /
299b6('dul ba): bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dang / kun
299b7('dul ba): du rgyu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can no/ /'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing bdag cag
299b8('dul ba): 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub
300a1('dul ba): par bgyi bar sems lags so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig /dga' ldan gyi ris
300a2('dul ba): kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs pa dang byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs po dag 'di la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so/ /grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad
300a3('dul ba): thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par byas te bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par
300a4('dul ba): bya'o/ /mi rtag pa'i dung 'bud par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/ /bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/ /rdo rje gcig gis
300a5('dul ba): brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig / brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ /nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ /grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying
300a6('dul ba): mtshams sbyor ba long shig / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis/ ma la bdag gis de la
300a7('dul ba): gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na
300a8('dul ba): bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas nam gyi gung thun la glang po cher bstan te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so/ /smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir
300b1('dul ba): dam bzhes nas/ /lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te/ /nang par sprin rum nyi ma gsar 'char ltar/ /de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums su zhugs/ /'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/ glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi
300b2('dul ba): rum dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / ri brag chen po la 'dzeg pa dang / bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o/ /des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag rmi lam
300b3('dul ba): ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug shig /de dag gis rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos de rnams la rmi lam bsnyad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan bcos las
300b4('dul ba): ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs
300b5('dul ba): nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /
300b6('dul ba): bar sdom la/ 'chi 'pho lha dang rin po che/ /zur brgyad dub dang brtul zhugs brtan/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin du g.yos
300b7('dul ba): par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus
300b8('dul ba): pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can
301a1('dul ba): gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so shes bya bar shes so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
301a2('dul ba): byin gyis de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems
301a3('dul ba): dpa' yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa ni mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi
301a4('dul ba): gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang /
301a5('dul ba): mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs pas ma sbags so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa
301a6('dul ba): mthong ngo / /dper na nor bu rin po che ni bai dUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po'i rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ dri ma med pa tshon skud sna lnga sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan la brgyus pa de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas
301a7('dul ba): mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/ /'di ni nor bu'o/ /skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su
301a8('dul ba): rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas ngal ba 'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/ /
301b1('dul ba): chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum deng phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/
301b2('dul ba): srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/ /ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ sbyar ba'i chang dang 'bru'i chang myos par
301b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do/ /srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / /brdzun du mi smra chang la mi brkam dang / /'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ /'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/ chos
301b4('dul ba): nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/ /nyon mongs rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /
301b5('dul ba): de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ /de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ /skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam
301b6('dul ba): nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu
301b7('dul ba): rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/ sras yan lag ma
301b8('dul ba): tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga ming zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya 'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun du rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de
302a1('dul ba): rgyal pos bkug nas bsgo ba dang / des de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan te chu blud pa dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma
302a2('dul ba): btson thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos btson thams cad thar bar byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o
302a3('dul ba): snyam pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag gis bskyed mos tshal blta'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos bskyed
302a4('dul ba): mos tshal bstan nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma bdag bskyed mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal po legs par rab sad la lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i bskyed
302a5('dul ba): mos tshal yod nas de la rgyal po zas gtsang gis spring ba/ khyod kyi bu mo bskyed mos tshal du 'gro bar 'dod kyis bskyed mos tshal byi dor byos shig /des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag bskyed mos tshal byi dor byos shig /de
302a6('dul ba): rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas so/ /de nas de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dong ngo / /de nas des lum bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa na shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin du rgyas pa zhig mthong ste/ de bltam par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa
302a7('dul ba): dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas des rlung dang char drag po cig sprul
302a8('dul ba): nas des skye bo'i tshogs de kun du bros so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang / des bltam par brtsams so/ / byang chub sems
302b1('dul ba): dpa' bltam pa dang / brgya byin gyis lpags pa'i gleb mos bzung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas bdag nyid
302b2('dul ba): rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka nga thong shig /thong shig /phar thong shig /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
302b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di yang g.yos par gyur zhes bya ba nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// // //
302b4('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi　/ bam po brgyad bcu gnyis pa/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang /
302b5('dul ba): khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug mi nyal 'greng bzhin du rgyal
302b6('dul ba): rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun 'dor zhing tshig tu yang gsungs pa/ 'di ni shar phyogs
302b7('dul ba): yin te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o/ /'di ni lho phyogs yin te/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o/ /'di ni nub phyogs yin te/ nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni byang phyogs
302b8('dul ba): yin te/ srid pa'i mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ /de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la bar snang las chu bsil
303a1('dul ba): ba gcig dang / chu dron po gcig ste chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la bskrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung
303a2('dul ba): nas 'bab par gyur te/ de la de'i yum chus chu'i bya ba byed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la lhas bar snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos
303a3('dul ba): kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyis kyang sgra 'byin to/ /gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /bar sdom la/ bltam dang bzhengs dang gom pa
303a4('dul ba): bdun/ /chu rgyun gnyis dang chu mig lha/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe rgyal po bzhi yang bu btsas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems
303a5('dul ba): te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/
303a6('dul ba): bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /kau sham bi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na de 'di
303a7('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa na de 'di
303a8('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron ma ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te de ni de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/ /ri bo kun
303b1('dul ba): 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i tsha bo ni mes byin zhes bya'o/ /des de la dus dus su 'jig pa'i gtam dang 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas de de las rab tu byung
303b2('dul ba): ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa na 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe mes byin phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na des snang ba de mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa/
303b3('dul ba): mkhan po/ 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag /gcig char byung bar gyur tam ci/ /'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/ /'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/ /nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du rno/ /bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/ /
303b4('dul ba): yan lag reg na 'od bsil bas/ /nges par thub pa de yi 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen yin/ /nges par lhums nas bltam gyur la/ /bltam nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/ /'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/ /dri ma med pa
303b5('dul ba): 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas/ /mes byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' ltar mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dang / dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing
303b6('dul ba): bzhugs pas gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /gang gi nyi ma
303b7('dul ba): kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang / rim gro ma rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya btsas so/ /ba glang mo
303b8('dul ba): lnga brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang 'brangs so/ /gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo / /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos bsams
304a1('dul ba): pa/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/
304a2('dul ba): 'di lta ste don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ /shAkya rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u 'am bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya
304a3('dul ba): 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams
304a4('dul ba): kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can/ rtsub pa/ btsam
304a5('dul ba): pa med pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lums can btsam pa med pa
304a6('dul ba): yin na gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa 'di lta ste shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin
304a7('dul ba): shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs
304a8('dul ba): pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so/ /rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la
304b1('dul ba): gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de bas na gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa btags pa 'di lta ste lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i
304b2('dul ba): mod la yab dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu la dus dus su bsku mnye byos shig / dus dus su khrus byos shig /dus dus su zas byin cig /dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig /
304b3('dul ba): ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su bsku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yang de'i tshe dri shin du yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo nyid gang
304b4('dul ba): yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
304b5('dul ba): bltam pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas shes ldan dag ji ga gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/
304b6('dul ba): de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste 'di lta ste/
304b7('dul ba): 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/ /bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/
304b8('dul ba): pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun pas legs par phab te gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
305a1('dul ba): gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig
305a2('dul ba): rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nam/ shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig
305a3('dul ba): rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po gang dag yin/ lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin du gnas pa lags so/ /zhabs gnyis shin du gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam
305a4('dul ba): par 'bab ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha 'di
305a5('dul ba): ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags
305a6('dul ba): pa ni dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin no/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas
305a7('dul ba): 'brel ba ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no/ /lha 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku mdud pa
305a8('dul ba): dang / sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i
305b1('dul ba): 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni dper na glang po cang shes kyi 'am rta cang shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no/ /lha 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni sku ji srid par 'dom yang de srid
305b2('dul ba): la 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni sku ro stod spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang
305b3('dul ba): mthing ka la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil par skye lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni mdog gser dang 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / lpags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba
305b4('dul ba): lags te/ lpags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang / zhabs
305b5('dul ba): gnyis dang / dpung mgo gnyis dang / ltag pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang /
305b6('dul ba): dpung mgo shin du zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin du dkar ba dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha 'di ni
305b7('dul ba): gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin du ring zhing srab pa lags te/ ljags shin du ring ba nyid dang srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil
305b8('dul ba): 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i
306a1('dul ba): dbyangs can lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod pu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su
306a2('dul ba): 'khyil ba lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes
306a3('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis lags so/ /gal te gzhon nu rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
306a4('dul ba): bltam nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de bskrun pa'i yum nongs par 'gyur te/ nongs ma thag tu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris gya nom par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang
306a5('dul ba): ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las mgar ba mkhas
306a6('dul ba): pas rgyan brdungs pa la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin du gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das
306a7('dul ba): shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par sbed pa ni dper
306a8('dul ba): na ston ka'i pad ma ni skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no/ /bar sdom la/ mig mi 'dzums dang rnam smin dang / /
306b1('dul ba): gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas pa bsdus/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la blta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin
306b2('dul ba): no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas des na de nyin dang mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu gzigs so/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub
306b3('dul ba): sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems
306b4('dul ba): dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa rgyud las 'byung ba'i
306b5('dul ba): shes rab dpyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dang shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/ /de nas mes byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po byang chub
306b6('dul ba): sems dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i mtshan yang gsum btags kyis/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir bzhud do/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin bya'o/ /de gnyis chas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus rdzu
306b7('dul ba): 'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor son pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong
306b8('dul ba): nyon mongs med lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig / de song nas rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs
307a1('dul ba): shig / de zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod yon sbreng bas mchod nas stan bstabs te 'dug pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshes pa'i gtam gyis kun du dga' bar byas
307a2('dul ba): nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa/ /khyod kyi sras ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras
307a3('dul ba): pa/ gal te de lta na gzhon nu nyal gyis ma sad kyi bar du re shig skad cig sdod cig /des smras pa/ lha mnal log pa nyid blta'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /des ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' mig ma btsums par gzugs rnams la blta
307a4('dul ba): ba mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ /mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi gnyid/ /mig la yun ring mi gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod kyi
307a5('dul ba): ma mas pang du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis gyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la bstan lags sam/ rgyal
307a6('dul ba): pos smras pa/ bstan to/ /de rnams kyis ji skad du lung bstan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med
307a7('dul ba): kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ /rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/ /nyes las rnam par rgyal nas
307a8('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /thub dbang mtshan ni shin du gsal bas na/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo 'gyur/ /zhes smras nas bdag nyid
307b1('dul ba): kyi tshe'i mtha' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdud rtsi thob
307b2('dul ba): par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /bdag ni bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur bar mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis gang
307b3('dul ba): mthong na/ /ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas/ /drang srong chen po ci slad ngu bzhin gyur/ /ga las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa 'am/ /tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi
307b4('dul ba): gnas grang / /de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros/ /khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar 'gyur/ /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las/ /rdo rje ser
307b5('dul ba): drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku las ba spu ni/ /nyag ma gcig kyang g.yo bar mi nus so/ /me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / /mtshon cha rnon po shin du mi bzad dang / /drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi
307b6('dul ba): dug rnon dag / gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/ /thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na/ /mi dbang
307b7('dul ba): 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ /tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa/ /mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /mi dbang
307b8('dul ba): bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni/ /gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag sdug mod/ /chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni/ /don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang dag smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa/ /'di yi chos
308a1('dul ba): thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang / /rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag /skyid cing bsod nams ldan la rims nad bral/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus bdag gi rdzu 'phrul
308a2('dul ba): nyams te gal te bdag gi rkang gis song na skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang rgyal pos 'phya bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa/ lha khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o drang srong nyon mongs med rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung
308a3('dul ba): snyam pa'i dgongs pa bskyed pa/ bdag gis rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te da ni rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gis khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang / grong khyer byi dor bgyid du stsol cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan
308a4('dul ba): dag deng la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lam stor du chug la lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa
308a5('dul ba): gang yin pa de byos shig ces dril sgrogs shig / lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin
308a6('dul ba): du zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya shes ldan
308a7('dul ba): dag nyon cig / drang srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gis/ khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig /de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs
308a8('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / ser skya na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag du ma rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste/ grong khyer ser skya'i sgor byung nas rgyal po slar bzlog ste
308b1('dul ba): ji ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang / de de la 'dzegs nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs zhig tu 'dug go/ /de nas de lam gyis dub pa
308b2('dul ba): ngal bso ste/ bsam gtan bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur
308b3('dul ba): byas na 'on kyang phyir thu bar gyur to/ /de nas mes byin gyis de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag cag rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni bdud rtsi'i ched dang / bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir lags
308b4('dul ba): na/ gal te mkhan pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na bdud rtsi de las bdag cag la yang bgos shig /des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi'i ched dang / bdud rtsi btsal ba'i
308b5('dul ba): phyir yin na/ kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ma rtogs so/ /de lta mod kyi shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu gang yin pa des bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur zhing / bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshim par byed par 'gyur gyis de'i drung du rab tu
308b6('dul ba): byung shig / khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya/ rus brjod par mi bya/ bram ze'i khye'u brjod par mi bya ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing / bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ba'i
308b7('dul ba): phyir brtson par bya'o/ /de nas khyed kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na/ /shar gyi phyogs su khyod 'dug dang / /yang dag sangs rgyas grags
308b8('dul ba): ldan pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba smras nas/ /bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /
309a1('dul ba): zhes smras te/ dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas mes byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas bA rA Na sIr song ste gnas so/ /de de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ /
309a2('dul ba): mes byin gyi rus kA t+yA ya na yin pas de'i ming kA t+yA'i bu kA t+yA'i bu zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa na spyan sngar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kA t+yA'i bu de la gdam ngag phog
309a3('dul ba): nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ shin du mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa las 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ni kA t+yA'i bu chen po kA t+yA'i bu chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig
309a4('dul ba): na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring po ma lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol ba na/ de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang /
309a5('dul ba): dbrog par ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des kyang ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la
309a6('dul ba): bsgo ba na de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus so/ /de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis/ ma la bdag gi mdzub mo
309a7('dul ba): bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong
309a8('dul ba): pa dbrog par ma nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na/ gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub
309b1('dul ba): kyis de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so/ / //bar sdom la/ khye'u dang rtsed mo dag dang ni/ /rig pa khang bzangs nyid dang ni/ /ngang pa mtshon cha dge ba'i snying / /
309b2('dul ba): dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par gtad nas/ yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa'
309b3('dul ba): la yi ge bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes so/ /de nas de yi ge gnyis dang / gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag kyang
309b4('dul ba): ngas shes kyis gzhan dag smros shig / srin bu go chas smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/
309b5('dul ba): yi ge 'di'i ming ci yin smros shig /des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /
309b6('dul ba): nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di shes pa ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
309b7('dul ba): 'am 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ /byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blags pa la nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur
309b8('dul ba): to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i zhang po bzang len zhes bya ba des glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa bslabs nas 'phong gi slob dpon lhar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga
310a1('dul ba): brgya dang spyod pa slob pa la zhugs pa na bzang len gyis lhar bcas la smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin du gzhon nu gzhan dag ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad slobs shig /lha
310a2('dul ba): sbyin 'di ni gdug pa'i las byed pa yin gyis 'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur na mi rung gis 'di la gnad du snun pa ma bstan cig / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la legs par bslabs pas
310a3('dul ba): gnas lnga po 'di lta ste/ rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun du sgra grags pa shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu
310a4('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byi rnams kyis glang po che'i mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang
310a5('dul ba): gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po rin po che 'di byung gis dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam nas/ de rnams kyis glang po rin po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid
310a6('dul ba): de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas de des phrag
310a7('dul ba): dog chen po skyes te/ de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang po dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs
310a8('dul ba): rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ /lha sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re shig de 'khor los sgyur bar ma gyur par rje khyed cag de la glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/ /
310b1('dul ba): ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas sbyin gyis so/ /des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la lha sbyin gyi mthu sad kyis ma la
310b2('dul ba): bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar bya bar mtha' gcig tu bor ro/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di
310b3('dul ba): gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /sus bsad/ lhas byin gyis so/ /'gron rnams la 'gron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /phyogs gang du bsad/ 'o nir ro/ /'di sus 'dir khyer te 'ongs/
310b4('dul ba): dga' bos so/ /des dgongs pa/ gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis/ ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs
310b5('dul ba): rim pa bdun las bzlas te bor ro/ /de lhung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i gshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas deng sang du yang dge slong
310b6('dul ba): mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do/ /'dir smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/ /dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer/ /byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/ /rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang rings
310b7('dul ba): 'phangs/ /gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/ gcod pa byed du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams phyir byung ba byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa byed du phyir 'byung ngo / /gzhon nu rnams 'bras rnga ba bzhin
310b8('dul ba): du gcod par byed de/ de rnams kyis shing bcad cing bcad pa rnams 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni bre'i kha gcod pa bzhin du gcod par mdzad do/ /des shing bcad cing bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/ de bzhin du
311a1('dul ba): 'dug pa dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la byang ngo zhes thos na 'di gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/ 'di bdag cag
311a2('dul ba): bas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de thams cad ni 'gyel la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon
311a3('dul ba): par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang bzo la byang ba ma shes pas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham
311a4('dul ba): par bya'o snyam nas/ des de dang 'thun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas des shing de dag thams cad chem chem zer nas 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /de rnams tshabs byed pa la zhugs te/
311a5('dul ba): de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag btsugs so/ /lha sbyin gyis rkang thabs byas te lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyi shing ta la gcig phigs so/ /dga' bos gnyis la 'o/ /
311a6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang shing ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag las thal nas lcags kyi mda' de sa la zug pa klus phyung ba dang chu ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'thung
311a7('dul ba): bar brtsams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/ /gzhon nu rnams shing rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i
311a8('dul ba): gzhir zhugs pa dang mtshan mkhan grong khyer nas phyir byung ba de rnams kyis gzhon nu shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs pa nas nang du zhugs pa la lung bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na gdon mi
311b1('dul ba): za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to zhes bya ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te shAkya rnams bsogs nas smras pa/
311b2('dul ba): shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so/ /gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis su rab tu
311b3('dul ba): ma byung ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/ bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin 'dong gis 'di khyim phub cig /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer
311b4('dul ba): ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gzhon nu la bud med thams cad bstan la 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o/ /de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu ni sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams
311b5('dul ba): bud med la stsol du stsal la/ de gang la mgu bar skyed par gyur pa de btsun mor blang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig /blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches spras pa'i phung po spungs
311b6('dul ba): so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang grong khyer phyag dar dang byi dor byed du bcug nas rgyu skar dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dag bstun te gdan seng ge'i khri bshams pa la gzhon nu shAkya thub pa bzhag nas seng
311b7('dul ba): ge'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te blon po rnams dang / gzhan yang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du zhugs so/ /de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang
311b8('dul ba): 'thun pa'i cha byad dang / rgyan dang gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan de dag de rnams la byin no/ /shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba dang /
312a1('dul ba): lang tso la bab pa/ de ma song nas shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rgyan sbyin gyis song shig /des smras pa/ yab ci 'o skol cag la rgyan ma mchis sam/ bu rgyan med pa ni
312a2('dul ba): ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa de 'dam par mdzad do/ /yab 'dam yang rung mi 'dam yang rung / de kho na bdag gi sdum thab lags so/ /bu gal te de lta na shin du 'gro dgos pas song shig /de nas grags
312a3('dul ba): 'dzin ma na tshod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/ bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid dang ldan pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan
312a4('dul ba): sngar 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpas rgyan thams cad byin nas sor gdub brgya kho na lus pa byang chub sems dpas de la bstan pa dang / des thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas pa des seng ge'i khri'i skas la 'dzegs
312a5('dul ba): nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nas rang gis phyung ngo / /blon po rnams dang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/
312a6('dul ba): 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus pas 'di blang bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe
312a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar 'gyur te/ de nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye bar 'gyur la/ ji tsam nyi ma ma shar ba de srid du ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la/
312a8('dul ba): nyi ma shar nas ni mtshon gyis kyang mi chod cing mes kyang mi tshig pa zhig ser skya'i gzhi dang lhas bstan gyi bar na 'bab chu ro hi ka zhes bya ba'i 'gram na skyes te/ dus dus su chu brug pas de'i rtsa ba brus nas rlung gi shugs kyis
312b1('dul ba): 'gyel te gags bzhin du chu bcad de 'dug go/ /de nas chus rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi yul ni chu med pas ma rung la/ zas gtsang gi yang chus ma rung ste/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring ba/ shing
312b2('dul ba): dge ba'i snying po 'gyel nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i gags su gyur te mchis na gzhon nu mthu dang ldan zhes thos kyis de btang ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo gzhon nu la bka' mi stsol lo/ /'dun pas smras
312b3('dul ba): pa/ lha bdag la gnang ba 'ba' zhig stsol cig /ci nas kyang gzhon nu la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so/ /'dun pas 'bab chu
312b4('dul ba): ro hi ka'i 'gram du gzhon nu rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal re re brtsigs nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag bskyed mos tshal du 'dong / de rnams so so'i shing rtar zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal du dong ba las lha byin gyi bskyed mos tshal
312b5('dul ba): gyi steng nas ngang pa zhig 'phur ba de lha sbyin gyis mdas bsnun nas byang chub sems dpa'i bskyed mos tshal du lhung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste sman gyis glan nas sos so/ /lha sbyin gyis byang chub
312b6('dul ba): sems dpa' la spring ba/ ngang pa'o ni sngar ngas bzung ba yin gyis skur cig /byang chub sems dpas slar spring ba/ ngas gang gi tshe kho na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems
312b7('dul ba): bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe ngas sems can thams cad bzung ba yin no/ /der byang chub sems dpa' dang lha sbyin lhan cig srid pa tha ma la thog mar sha khon de byung ste/ srid pa gzhan rnams su ni phal mo che zhig kyang byung ngo / /legs
312b8('dul ba): par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnams shing dge ba'i snying po dbyung ba'i phyir lhags so zhes thos nas des skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngags te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang sgra mthon po grag nas byang chub sems
313a1('dul ba): dpas smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang / sgra mthon po grag pa 'di ci zhig /'dun pas ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ gal te de lta na 'byin du
313a2('dul ba): 'dong ngo zhes byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig dong ba dang / ji tsam na khung nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du byung ba dang 'char kas byang chub sems dpa' thal bar glags su 'gyur du 'ong
313a3('dul ba): zhes mtshon rnon pos rked du bcad pa las de'i dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog pas 'char ka nag por gyur nas/ de'i ming 'char ka nag po 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis shing dge ba'i snying
313a4('dul ba): po 'byin pa la zhugs pa na lha sbyin gyis 'bad pa dang cung zad cig g.yos so/ /dga' bos ni cung zad cig bteg go/ /byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad kyi thams cad du steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs te dum bu gnyis su
313a5('dul ba): chag nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i tshu rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig / pha rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig lhung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs la gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil
313a6('dul ba): ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas 'khris pa'i nad dang / shu ba dang / phol mig byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis/ dum bu dum bur byos la khyer cig /gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi shing rtar zhugs te bskyed mos tshal gyis
313a7('dul ba): n as ser skya'i gzhir dong nas grong khyer du zhugs pa na byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs pa la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te 'di lo bdun rab tu ma byung bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung
313a8('dul ba): bstan no/ /shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug pa byang chub sems dpas gzigs so/ /gzigs ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthe bos shing rta mnan nas mi g.yo bar gyur pa dang /
313b1('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas sa 'tsho ma la brtag par brtsams so/ /sa 'tsho mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa 'tsho ma la rtog pa na phyag na lcags kyi mda' bsnams pa de phyer brlags so/ /sa 'tsho
313b2('dul ba): ma yang byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos khang bzangs kyi gzhi brtol to/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dang sa 'tsho ma la phan tshun du rtog par byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pa skyes
313b3('dul ba): par gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ bud med 'di 'dra ba 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so/ /gtam de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas de 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i
313b4('dul ba): btsun mor blangs so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms
313b5('dul ba): shig dang / der nga zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /
313b6('dul ba): der nga zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te/ byang chub sems
313b7('dul ba): dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/
313b8('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgu bo
314a1('dul ba): ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la rten cing 'dar zhing 'gro ba/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba gcig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo
314a2('dul ba): sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu bo ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la rten zhing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ lha mi 'di ni rgas
314a3('dul ba): pa zhes bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das
314a4('dul ba): sam/ lha yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas nga rgas pa las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don
314a5('dul ba): de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas nga yang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing
314a6('dul ba): thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ dar yol rgas shing sgur la mgo skya ba/ /lag na 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/ /'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan
314a7('dul ba): dgongs par mdzad de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung 'am/ bskyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' 'am
314a8('dul ba): lha ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha gzhon nu bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu bo ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la rten zhing lus 'dar zhing
314b1('dul ba): mchis la de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kha lo sgyur ba mi rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ sgur po phyam dgu bo
314b2('dul ba): ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun na 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /lha 'di ni rgas pa zhes
314b3('dul ba): bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsung ste/ kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas lha de ni rgas pa zhes bya'o/ /de 'di skad
314b4('dul ba): ces gsung ste/ kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /de 'di skad ces
314b5('dul ba): gsung ste/ kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di ltar pho brang du phyin nas nga rgas pa las ma 'das shes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /lha gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/ de nas
314b6('dul ba): nga yang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur
314b7('dul ba): grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che
314b8('dul ba): zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo zhig byin te/ ci nas kyang 'di
315a1('dul ba): la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ shAkya thub pa'i yab ste zas gtsang des/ /kha lo sgyur las tshig de thos nas ni/ /de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug phyir/ /'dod pa'i
315a2('dul ba): yon tan lnga las yang byin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / de la nga
315a3('dul ba): zhon nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /de la nga zhon nas skyed
315a4('dul ba): mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na
315a5('dul ba): ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
315a6('dul ba): shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas/ mi skya bo rbab rbab po/ /rid pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang
315a7('dul ba): po'i mig gis lta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ / //gcig zhus kun dga'o dang gnyis/ gnyis zhus sngags dpal ldan/ gsum zhus snar thang dpon slob pas/ dri tshogs spangs nas dag par byas te/
315a8('dul ba): dge'o/ / // // // // // // // //
